story:
The Leyef and Art Foundation Charity Fashion Show Facebook Page


Charity # 336769

visit our website at www.theleyefandartfoundation.com 


Short Summary of WHO WE ARE

Hi there! My name is Destiny Ezurs and I am the founder of The Leyef and Art Foundation. First off, I'm going to tell you a little bit about myself and how my dream of owning a charity came to life. Growing up I experienced what no child, nor human for that matter, should have to face. I was born into an abusive, drug infected home and then placed into the foster care system by social services who deemed my living situation inadequate. Unfortunately, what I experienced in the foster system was no better than my previous living situation. At seven years-old I was adopted, but later emancipated myself from my adoptive family when they began to both mentally and verbally abuse me. My childhood was a constant battle, I suffered and I watched children around me suffer, and for that reason I created this charity. Despite the neglect I suffered, I consider myself fortunate because it brought me to where I am today. If it had not been for the childhood I had lived, I may not have created this charity. Since the day I learned what a charity was, I knew it was something I wanted to create. Not so much for myself, but for the suffering children I met in the foster care system. 

Although I lived a life that was more difficult then most, I still managed to successfully start my own business and I continue to live my life as a role model for those that need inspiration. I know I have many things and people to thank for my success. Influential friends whom had healthy thriving homes, gymnastics which taught me discipline and helped me realize my worth and books that helped my mind and imagination grow. As well as a funding program provided by Social Services that supported me through college.

My charity is bringing these crucial things together to create a system that supports children and young adults being affected by abuse, neglect or have been orphaned.

Teaming with Dreams in Motion, The Leyef and Art Foundation will be touring public schools to inform children that we are here to help them if they need. It is our plan to inform children of what abuse is, how it can be prevented and how one can heal from such circumstances. They will be given the opportunity to reach out to us through, phone, email or letter to inform of us of how they need our help and support. After assessing a child's needs, they will be asked to read a book from a large list of inspiring books that The Leyef and Art Foundation believes help nourish the mind, esteem and soul. They will then be asked to write a letter explaining their needs and asked to fill out an application that opens communication and helps us understand their situation. I know personally that communication is key to successfully helping anyone in times of need.

The Leyef and Art Foundation will fund the dreams, passions and god given rights of those affected by neglect or abuse and because of my personal background in fitness, we will focus on making sure these kids are living well, eating healthy and being active. 


As you can see from the video posted we already had our first charity event in May 2013. Unfortunately after all this hard work, the charity broke even because of two things I didn't factor into this when planning this event:
A) The total cost
B) The devastating impact of a low attendance.
Even so the show went on and the people who attended LOVED IT. The talent, beauty and pure entertainment was undeniable. People had never seen anything quite like it before. Except for on the television when they were watching The Victorias Secret Fashion Show. I guess most first time charity events are not the best and this is something I was unaware of but learned quickly. All of the performers seen the potential that the show had to create funds for people in need and agreed to perform at the next show. I was encouraged by those that attended to push forward with another show and promised that now that people had caught wind of the charity show and its cause that it would do better its second time round. The guests wanted to know when the next one was and how they could help make sure it happened. And this is exactly how: Donate. 



What We Need & What You Get

  • We need this money to have the 2nd Annual Charity Fashion Show. This is a highly entertaining way of coming together for a good cause. In doing so, it showcases the arts and talents of gifted people in a big way and encourages artists and performers to follow their dreams and passions. This charity creates an event that, before people like you and I, had only wished we could go to. Because lets be honest, we all wish we could go to the Victorias Secret Fashion Show and I believe we all wish we could go in support of a good cause rather than that of a multibillion dollar corporation. We are looking to hold the next event in Calgary, Alberta during the world renowned Calgary Stampede at the Hotel Arts. The Calgary Stampede attendance totals over 1 million guests during its 10 days, averaging at about 150,000 people a day. 
  • We plan on making this event so successful that we can tour Canada and then hopefully make our way world wide. But we need your help in doing so!
  • I almost gave up on my ability to help the people I always dreamed of helping. After the long hard work of creating the show and not being able to donate a dollar, I wanted to throw in the towel. But I've learned that in business and life, to become successful, often you have to try over and over again. So here I am reaching out to the world to help me, help others.

Similar as to what is listed above we will need :

$1500 for advertising

$1500 to create a video for future advertising as well as a place to make honorary mentions of the largest donors and supporters.

Up to $1000 for lights, sound system and piano.

$15,000 for the rental of the Hotel Arts Spectrum Ballroom. 

$6,400 for additional wings and supplies to make more wings and costumes.($400 per model - 16 models) 
$2000 for red carpet ,drapery and stage rentals.
$6,400 for high brand name lingerie that IS NOT MADE IN A SWEATSHOP ($400 per model)(Our local lingerie stores have been in trouble in the past for having fabrics made in places that do not pay or under pay and use child labour.)
NOTE: The lingerie and wings will not need to be purchased again after these purchases and will be used for future shows so that charity profit is increased and expenditure decreased.
$6,000 for food, travel and accommodations for most of the performers and models who are from out of town.
Transportation for models and performers from Edmonton on a Charter Bus discounted from Red Arrow $4,000.
TOTAL of $43,800.00

PROFITS

Event will hold 600 guests

Ticket Sales 100 VIP tickets at $220 = $22,000

General Tickets at 500 tickets at $110 = $55,000

Calendars ($30 profit) and Photos sold of models (20$) =raise approx : $10,000 

ESTIMATED FUNDS RAISED = $87,000 +

We will also be accepting generous donations at the door that may bring in X amount of monies.

The Impact

This will help our charity get its feet up off the ground and become a recognized and self sufficient cause that has funds to assist in all of the ways it was created for. 

  • Once we make this cause and show known worldwide, we will be able to hold these events as often as 2-3 times a year. Large events like this can raise such large amounts of dollars (upwards of a quarter million dollars or more) for children, youth and young adults that have been affected by abuse or neglect of any kind If we have it sell out in venues that hold at least 2200 people.
  • We have already put in so much work and effort to run the first event now we just need the help and support of you to help awaken others to the good thing that the many performers and models have come together to create. We know we care and we have our hearts and minds in the right place, now we just need assistance worldwide to help catapult this charity event into the first of its kind. We envision creating an event that raises money worldwide through an entertaining show that many people truly enjoy. One that can help showcase the passions of people who follow their dreams regardless of their past.
  • We will be able to tour schools freely and offer students our assistance. Educate them on abuse and neglect and assist them in in the multiple ways that they need. This means feeding them nutritious food when their own family is unable to, or pay for extracurricular activities when their family cannot etc. We will also be building an office space where the youth can seek help from a counsellor or others like myself who have experienced abuse or neglect and know first hand how to properly deal with situations. 

Objectives of the Leyef & Art Foundation

·  To educate the public by providing courses, seminars and workshops about health and wellness, self improvement and ways to seek help with this, if help is needed.
·  To educate youth by providing leadership training programs and workshops.
·  To educate children about safety issues by providing appropriate level courses, seminars and workshops o abuse and neglect as well as health and nutrition.
·  To advance education by providing scholarships, bursaries, awards and other forms of financial aid assistance to people under the age of 30 whom are financially disadvantaged and seeking advancement of education.
·  To provide funding for athletic and recreational programs to disadvantaged children and low income families.
·  To establish appropriate and maintain a long-term group home that offers health and wellness and recreational programs to troubled and orphaned youth.
·  To relieve poverty by providing basic amenities such as; food, clothing, and shelter to the underprivileged, low income and anyone needing financial assistance in a time of need.
·  To provide athletic and recreational programs to support the physical mental  and emotional well-being of children who have been neglected or abused

List of Performers

James Jones breakdancing at The 1st Annual Show

Host  - Conway Kootenay – Owner Of Red Power Squad – MC, musician, dancer and aboriginal motivational speaker

www.redpowersquad.ca

Toxic Elegance Dance Crew – Chelsea Ann, Brittany Reinbold, Rachel Weir

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lQoPLc7JHEA


United 1ne – Bboy Dance Crew – Sean Arceta , Conway, James Jones

http://vimeo.com/80770287

www.united1ne.com


James Jones – Owner of Dreams in Motion  & Traditionill – Aboriginal Motivational speaker and traditional aboriginal hoop dancer

www.thedreamsproject.com

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZnMNByFhrsc

Lukas Lock – Owner of 3rd Street Beat + team

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HsRWD9q0ap0

www.3rdstreetbeat.com


Samantha Rose  -Owner of Soul2pole -  1st Runner up at Alberta Pole Dance Championships and Ariel Hoop Artist

https://www.facebook.com/Soul2Pole


Twilla and Greg – Owners of Booming Tree Taiko – Drummers

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lYtZlfOWprg&feature=player_embedded



Humberly Gonzalez – Vocalist/Actress/Guitarist

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=av82BIP0lDo



Eva La Prairie – Vocalist/Guitarist

Shannon Norman - Drummer - No Photo Available

Shamar - Vocalist


Models: Kathryn, 


Alisha


Carlee, 

 Rhaea

Humberly

 

Caithleen


Anastasia, 


Talisha


Emily 


Sophie

Kora

Chancee


Chelsea

 Rosina

 



This list of performers/models is not complete and is forever growing, expanding and changing. We are always open to new talent who are interested in helping raise donations!

Courtney, Roxy and Rosina Backstage at the 1st Annual Show


LAST YEAR'S REVIEWS

I had the pleasure of attending The 1st Annual Leyef and Art Charity Fashion Show and to say I was really impressed would be an understatement. I've never seen anything like this show before and I really enjoyed myself. The pre-show mixer was very elegant, the décor was nice and classy and they served several choices of Wines and Hors d'oeuvre that I quite enjoyed. When the show began I really wasn’t sure what to expect, but as one act finished and the other began I found myself captivated by it all. I simply couldn’t wait to see what was next to come and I kept hoping that there was more. I felt like I was at a glamorous fashion show in Paris or Milan. From runway models in beautiful outfits to professional dancers and acrobatics, this show featured a little bit for everyone. I came to watch the show with a certain expectation in mind and my expectations were not only met but they were exceeded. I would recommend this show to anyone and everyone. If you enjoy Glamorous evenings with captivating performances that will keep you excited all night this one is a must see.

--

Bashar Ramahi


I've attended my fair share of charity events, enough to know what to expect from them. So I was surprised at the excitement and diversity I experienced at Destiny's show. From beginning to end it captured everyone's attention, and was easy to see the imagination and planning that went into everything. I look forward to attending her second show!

 - Shane Pretzer


What a show! I have never attended a charity event with so many different acts going on. One minute I was enjoying a break dance show, and the next minute I was being stunned by beautiful models. There was such a wide range of entertainment on stage that anybody would love this event. I will definitely be attending again.

 - Brody Stredick


Other Ways You Can Help

SHARE THIS WITH YOUR FRIENDS!

or Donate your Airmiles or Aeroplan miles to fly models or performers into Calgary.

story:
Short Summary

Hi! My name is Anna Drummond and my late grandma (R.I.P. <3), Bonny Drummond had been mixing her own beautiful nail polish since she was a girl. She taught me how to make it, and told me her dream was to sell it. Sadly, she never got to see that dream come true, but I want to make that happen for her. So I am trying to build a business named after her, through which I can share her magic with the world!

What We Need & What You Get

I'd like to raise enough money to cover all of my initial costs. I need the ingredients. (Shhh! Can't tell! That's a secret! lol) I need bottles and labels, and I need to start a website and get shipping and all of that set up. With your donation, I can make all of that happen!

$5000 should be enough to give me a great head-start. If I don't reach the goal, then I will use the money I do receive to bottle and start selling what I can without any extra trappings! lol

The Impact

My grandma's recipe was the best nail polish anyone who tried it had ever seen. The colors are brilliant, there is no bad smell, and they are water-proof but wash off easily with soap or polish remover, though you won't need that stuff when you can just use soap! :)

I think it would make my grandma Bonny super happy to know that we are making her dream come true if she could see us right now. It's been my family's little secret for too long! It's time for her to get the recognition she deserves! Also, the recipe really is amazing, and it would make me happy to share it with the world!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you don't donate, then share my campaign with someone else who might love to participate! Everyone is looking for a better nail polish, and some people might just want to help a girl make her grandma's dreams come true! :D

story:
Order your Lyfy masks directly on  Lyfy.co!

 

 

 

We have worked with love and passion to allow you to be:
  • free to breathe deeply
  • free to exercise and train freely
  • free to express yourself with several mask options

We breathe more than 10,000 liters of air every day. But air not only keeps us alive - it also transports a variety of particles that can be harmful to our health.

Have you ever had an allergic reaction to pollen in the air? Infected yourself during flu season? Do you live in a large city, smelling traffic fumes every day?

Just like food or water, the quality of the air we breathe daily affects our health and well being. In our ever more crowded environment, air quality has constantly decreased.

This is why we created SportsMask, built on the vision to create a world where everyone can breathe clean and healthy air. We believe that people who want to breathe healthy, should have a reliable and fashionable way to do so.

Drawbacks of Existing Masks

Each of these mask types suffers from the following three issues.

Poor face seals: Existing masks don't always achieve an adequate seal on the face, resulting in decreased protection [1]

High waste and cost: N95 masks are intended to be changed regularly, which is inconvenient and expensive in many use cases

Scalability of manufacturing: Face masks cannot be produced fast enough to meet the demands of both the health care system and general public

Cotton masks often have leakage problems and filter only twelve percent of pollution particles, Disposable masks have leakage problems and they are uncomfortable to wear.

Air Leakage is very common for disposable masks.

The Problem

9 out of 10 people now breathe air containing high levels of pollution. Updated estimates reveal an alarming death toll of 7 million people every year due to outdoor and house air pollution.

 

Air pollution, dusty neighborhood, contaminated environment... you need to wear a  mask. But do all anti-air pollution air filter masks or face masks ensure the same level of protection?

In order for a face mask to be effective, it needs to be well sealed, and dense enough to filter out tiny particles as small as 0.1μm. While large amounts of pollution are visible to the naked eye (eg. smoke), they are still present in harmful quantities when not visible.

Order your Lyfy masks directly on  Lyfy.co!   We have worked with love and passion to allow you to be:

free to breathe deeply

free to exercise and train freely


free to express yourself with several mask options


We breathe more than 10,000 liters of air every day. But air not only keeps us alive - it also transports a variety of particles that can be harmful to our health.Have you ever had an allergic reaction to pollen in the air? Infected yourself during flu season? Do you live in a large city, smelling traffic fumes every day?Just like food or water, the quality of the air we breathe daily affects our health and well being. In our ever more crowded environment, air quality has constantly decreased.This is why we created SportsMask, built on the vision to create a world where everyone can breathe clean and healthy air. We believe that people who want to breathe healthy, should have a reliable and fashionable way to do so.Drawbacks of Existing MasksEach of these mask types suffers from the following three issues.Poor face seals: Existing masks don't always achieve an adequate seal on the face, resulting in decreased protection [1]High waste and cost: N95 masks are intended to be changed regularly, which is inconvenient and expensive in many use casesScalability of manufacturing: Face masks cannot be produced fast enough to meet the demands of both the health care system and general publicCotton masks often have leakage problems and filter only twelve percent of pollution particles, Disposable masks have leakage problems and they are uncomfortable to wear.Air Leakage is very common for disposable masks.The Problem9 out of 10 people now breathe air containing high levels of pollution. story:
Our Story

I was just 9 years old when I started learning to sew; first from my mom and aunt, and then by trial and error.  There was no formal instruction available for children my age.  Instead, you needed to wait until highschool or college to learn in structured classes, taught as part of a larger curriculum.  I knew at that early age that I had a passion for this pursuit, so inevitably I turned my early instruction into a career in fashion; attending the Fashion Institute of Design and Merchandising (FIDM), eventually striking out on my own and designing evening gowns for the Hollywood crowd, bridal gowns, and ultimately becoming a costume designer on feature films.

Several years ago, the recession affected the film industry, leaving many crew members in L.A. in need of other pursuits.  My work became a little sparse, and typically involved traveling to other locations for film shoots.  I became engaged and decided to move east with my fiance' with his work.  I found myself in the charming town of Mooresville, NC, a rapidly growing community of about 35,000.  Around that time I was reading the book "One Month to Live" by Pastor Kerry Shook, and gave some serious thought to what I would want to do if I only had one month to live.  

 I realized that I would want to somehow pass on my knowledge and passion for my craft and that this could be my special ministry and contribution.   Because I had no children of my own, and my fiances' children were grown, I began to think of a way to teach the next generation in a studio environment.    With young families, good schools and a vibrant community, this seemed a perfect place to set up a studio and teach sewing and fashion design to children of all ages.  Fashion was becoming very main-stream in the media with shows like "What Not To Wear" and particularly the show "Project Runway" had many little girls dreaming of becoming fashion designers and, seeing that many of the designers on the show were young, they had better start learning!  This was the birth of the concept of Future Fashion Designers (FFD).  We opened in January 2010.

The community is excited that FFD is here, and we have been enthusiastically received. I get calls from all over NC and even other states to see if we have anything available in their location.  The studio is in the downtown area full of history and foot traffic!  A few months after opening, FFD was featured in the popular local Lake Norman Magazine, with one of my students gracing the cover in one of the evening gowns I created.  That article really opened things up.  The studio was new and exciting for the town and we were building and formulating our lesson plans and offerings in anticipation of even more rapid growth following the recession.  This remains our expectation.

 FFD began with a personal investment, credit cards and a $10,000 loan which had been expended with equipment, advertising, and overhead costs of the startup.  There are many loyal students and families eager to continue classes.  We are seeking creative ways to maintain through these temporary economical challenges.

Consideration has been given for turning FFD into a non-profit venture, which will enable us to do more advertising and special projects like fashion shows and other events.  Attaining non-profit status is a lengthy process, and will cost about $800 for the fee just to apply. I think it's a good way to go and exciting to have a educatiuonal non-profit for kids who want to investigate the fashion world.  There are almost no fashion schools for kids and very few sewing schools especially focused on kids who want to learn, surprisingly since the schools don't offer it anymore.  Sewing is becoming a dying art and such a necessary foundation for anyone who wants to have a career in fashion.  Plus, designing and sewing is a great way to build self-esteem in young girls.  They get so elated when they see themselves creating something from nothing.  They think it, design it and then create. it.                                            

You can find out more about the school at www.FutureFashionDesigners.com and more about my film background at www.Shawnelle.com

 


The Impact

Learning to sew and learning about fashion design is not only fun for kids but a very useful skill that can lead to a lifelong career.  Currently there are almost no fashion schools for kids and very few sewing schools that are focused on kids who want to learn.  Most curriculum-based schools have eliminated sewing in favor of other classes.  If no family member is availabe to teach, any child who wishes to learn has to seek out instruction elsewhere, and typically misses the opportunity for rapid learning that youth presents.  All of these combine to present a unique and exciting opportunity to fill a much needed niche market.

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

We need an additional $10,000 to continue to provide the unique studio space, with a rent of $1000 a month and all the bills that go with it; electricity, phone, liability, part-time instructors, and materials used for the classes.  Most importantly it will help us to do more advertising especially for summer camps which can help us even more if we can get the camps full.  A little more advertising would help considerably as each additional student places FFD in a firmer position to continue.  Also, it will help us to get the non-profit status that will enable us to find grants and community donations to grow and be able to offer even more programs and events like fashion shows and special events for the kids.  We are pursuing the non-profit status and plan to submit in the next few months. The students truly love the studio atmosphere and the space to spread out and create.  I just love their faces when they come in to the studio for the first time, their mouths open in awe and their eyes light up, "A studio just for them!"....so cute!  Your support will help keep that excitement alive, teach young girls and boys valuable skills and help build our next generation of fashion designers.

 

 

Other Ways You Can He

(Unleash the DIWO! -- 'Do It With Others' by asking folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign. Don't forget to remind them about the share tools!)

We need an additional $10,000 to continue to provide the unique studio space, with a rent of $1000 a month and all the bills that go with it; electricity, phone, liability, part-time instructors, and materials used for the classes.  Most importantly it will help us to do more advertising especially for summer camps which can help us even more if we can get the camps full.  A little more advertising would help considerably as each additional student places FFD in a firmer position to continue.  Also, it will help us to get the non-profit status that will enable us to find grants and community donations to grow and be able to offer even more programs and events like fashion shows and special events for the kids.  We are pursuing the non-profit status and plan to submit in the next few months. The students truly love the studio atmosphere and the space to spread out and create.  I just love their faces when they come in to the studio for the first time, their mouths open in awe and their eyes light up, "A studio just for them!"....so cute!  Your support will help keep that excitement alive, teach young girls and boys valuable skills and help build our next generation of fashion designers.
 
 


Other Ways You Can He
(Unleash the DIWO! -- 'Do It With Others' by asking folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign. Don't forget to remind them about the share tools!)

story:
Hey!

 

We are the Main River Academy Warriors Volleyball team. We are currently fundraising for our trip to Port Rexton, NL for the Boys A Volleyball Provincial Tournament and need your help!

 

So far this year we have played in three tournaments:

 

VolleyWest:  This was our first tournament of the year! We were very excited to start playing and ended up taking home a Silver Medal in Tier 2 at NLVA VolleyWest in Corner Brook. NL. What a time!

 

MSB Wildcats Invitational: We were invited to participate in an invitational tournament in Middle Arm, NL hosted by MSB Regional Academy. The atmosphere at the school was amazing, the food was delicious and we had a great time! We finished first at the tournament and returned to Pollard's Point with gold medals around our necks! Thanks to MSB for inviting us to this tournament, it was a blast!

 

Boys A Volleyball Qualifier: Our most recent tournament was in Hampden, NL playing for the chance to compete in the Provincial tournament sponsored by SSNL (School Sports Newfoundland an Labrador). We played our hearts out and successfully brought home the Boys A Regional Volleyball banner to Main River Academy. The teams here showed great sportsmanship and were a pleasure to play against!

 

As you can imagine, all of these tournaments cost quite a bit of money. This is where we need your help! You can donate of any amount, every bit counts!  With varying donation amounts you will receive certain items or services provided by the MRA Boys Volleyball team. See the Donation Levels for details! 

Even if you cannot support us by donation, you can still help us by sharing this with as many people as you can! 

 

We greatly appreciate your support, GO WARRIORS!

story:
Bijoux connectés


Today the market is saturated  of bracelets and other connected devices. We offer you the opportunity to be a reference in the field of luxury connected objects. The marriage between noble materials and technology will be a reality. Chic, elegant, contemporary ... Jewelry for all tastes, with the same base: luxury. The finest materials are the focus of these jewels, leaving aside the plastic or other synthetic materials.

Aujourd'hui le marché est saturé de bracelets et bien d'autres objets connectés. Nous vous offrons l'opportunité d'être une référence dans le domaine des objets connectés de luxe. Le mariage entre matières nobles et technologie sera désormais une réalité. Chics, élégants, contemporains ... Des bijoux pour tous les goûts, ayant pour point commun le luxe. Les matières nobles sont au centre de ces bijoux, qui laissent de côté le plastique ou tout autres matières synthétiques.


Hoy en dia el mercado esta saturado de pulceras y otros objetos conectados. Nosotros les ofrecemos la oportunidad de ser una referencia tener los objetos conectados de lujo. El compromiso entre materias nobles y la tecnologia sera de hoy en adelante una realidad. Chics, elegantes, contemporaneos... Las joyas para todos los gustos, teniendo un punto en comun: El Lujo. Las materias nobles son el centro de las joyas, dejando a un lado el plástico y todo tipo de materias sintéticas.


Different sensors are arranged at the request of the customer, the business of this prestigious jewelry. From a formation of the Ecole Boulle (France), this young designer combines the latest technology with high-end materials such as gold, platinum, silver, rubies, sapphires ... . Materials chosen with the utmost care and highest requirement, while providing the means to assess various physiological aspects of your body through your jewelry and your smartphone.

Différents capteurs sont disposés, à la demande du client, sur les bijoux de prestige de cette entreprise. Issu d'une formation de l' école Boulle (France), ce jeune créateur marie la pointe de la technologie avec des matières haut de gamme telles que l'or, le platine, l'argent, les rubis, les saphirs.... Matières choisis avec le plus grand soin et la plus haute exigence, tout en vous offrant le moyen d'évaluer différents aspects physiologiques de votre corps à travers votre bijou et votre smartphone. 

Diferentes captores estan a la disposicion y al deseo del cliente sobre las joyas de prestigio de ésta empresa. Un joven creador de la escuela Boulle en Francia reune lo mejor de la tecnologia y materiales de alta categoria como el Oro, el Platino, la Plata, los Rubies, los Safiros... Materiales escojidos con el mas grande cuidado y la mas alta exigencia ofreciendoles al mismo tiempo el medio de evaluar diferentes aspectos fisiologicos de vuestro cuerpo a travez de su joya y su smartphone.  


You will discover a unique interface with an application that allows you to use all the capabilities provided by your jewel. Easy , intuitive ... Let the luxury and elegance invade every corner of your body. The application will allow you to connect your pulse, sport ( by calculating the number of calories burned during the day) , exposure of ultraviolet rays that bombard your body and many other utilities that will make you feel special and new way of life.

Vous découvrirez une interface unique grâce à une application qui vous permettra d'utiliser toutes les capacités que vous offre votre bijou. Facile, intuitif... Laissez le luxe et l'élégance envahir chaque recoin de votre corps. L'application vous permettra de connecter votre pouls, votre activité sportive (en calculant le nombre de calories brûlées durant la journée), l'exposition des rayons ultraviolets qui bombardent votre corps et bien d'autres utilités qui vous feront ressentir une extraordinaire et nouvelle façon de vivre.

Vais a descubrir una interface unica gracias a una aplicacion que les permitira utilizar todas las capacidades que les ofrece vuestra joya. Facil, intuitivo... Deje el lujo y la elegancia invadir cada esquina de vuestro cuerpo. La aplicacion le permitira conectar su pulso, su actividad deportiva (calculando la cantidad de calorias quemadas en el dia), la exposicion de rayos ultravioletas  que bombardean su piel... y muchas cosas mas que les ofrecera una extraordianria y nueva manera de vivir.

story:
THE VISION

Our mission at NoneLikeMe is to create a clothing line that truly embodies what it means to be an individual. 

But... We also recognize that together we are all part of a bigger picture, so it was important to us that NoneLikeMe be about more than just clothes. 

As the project developed, we realized it was important that we serve as a platform for progress & social change. 

We took a look at other social entrepreneurship companies like TOMS Shoes who donate one pair of shoes for every pair of shoes purchased or Warby Parker who donate a pair of eyeglasses for every purchase and noticed one major commonality... 

They are all offering their products as donations. While we agree that's wonderful, we made the decision to make Cash Donations directly to charitable organizations that are already making a major impact.

And whether or not you decide to make a donation, we appreciate you taking the time to check us out :)

IMPORTANT!!

Many of you have asked how you can get our tees & apparel right now...

All you have to do is click here and make a donation of $25 and you will receive one of our tees as a reward for your donation.

THE CAUSES

Human Rights Watch

The Human Rights Watch is dedicated to defending and protecting all human rights. They give a voice to the oppressed and hold oppressors accountable for their crimes.

For more than 30 years, Human Rights Watch has worked tenaciously to lay the legal and moral groundwork for deep-rooted change and has fought to bring greater justice and security to people around the world.

Invisible Children

Invisible Children believes in the equal and inherent value of all human life. They understand that a worldview bound by borders is outdated and that stopping injustice anywhere is the responsibility of humanity everywhere.

They work tirelessly to rehabilitate children directly affected by the Lords Resistance Army and invest in education and economic recovery programs in the post-conflict region to promote lasting peace.

Ronald McDonald House Charities

The mission of Ronald McDonald House Charities is to create, find and support programs that directly improve the health and well being of children.

RMHC holds a special place in our hearts because in 2011, when our founders younger brother at the age of 13 collapsed at school and went into cardiac arrest as the result of a heart defect, it was the incredible staff of doctors & nurses at Rady Children's Hospital Ronald McDonald House in San Diego that was in part, responsible for saving his life. Click here to read the story

MORE INFORMATION ABOUT OUR CAUSES...

What's the first cause NoneLikeMe will be donating to?

We've centered our complete first design collection around human rights issues, and will be giving our first donation proceeds to the Human Rights Watch. 

Why the Human Rights Watch??

Because they are one of the world’s leading independent organizations dedicated to defending and protecting human rights for all. 

What makes us different from other clothing for causes brands?

What we feel part of what makes us different is that rather than sticking with just a single cause to design for & donate to, our team decided we wanted to be able to further help as many causes as we possibly could with our clothing. 

Which is why we made the decision to change our partner cause every 6 months. A part of our long term goal is to partner with the organizations we want to design for because as NoneLikeMe grows in awareness and recognition, so will the profound messages of our partner causes. 

How do we pick our causes?

There are so many amazing causes currently making innovative changes in society & making an impact around the world, so it was really hard to pick which one to design for and donate to first. The causes we're seeking to partner with are those that go beyond simply raising awareness, but are actively helping to make changes in the lives of those they come into contact with.

THE CLOTHES

We've only just begun.

Our first collection is still growing, and our wonderful team of designers & creatives are hard at work developing new design concepts for our t-shirts & apparel.

     

While creating our 1st collection, we wanted to make sure of a few very important details:

  • That our designs always reflect our partner causes in an inspiring, artistic & thought provoking way.
  • That the fabrics we use are made from high-quality, ethically made certified organic cotton.
  • Which is why we print our shirts on fabric exclusively from Alternative Apparel.


VISIT THE GALLERY TO CHECK OUT MORE OF OUR CURRENT DESIGNS. 

      

   

OUR CAMPAIGN GOAL

$25,000 will help us accomplish several important project milestones. 

Phase 1: After the campaign is over, priority #1 will be to ensure fulfillment of  your reward requests, then shortly after our online store www.nonelikeme.me (under construction) will launch.


Phase 2: While an online presence in important, we are excited at the opportunity to serve our customers in person, which will be done by offering "Pop-up" stores all through-out the United States. Which will of course require heavy travel for our team.


Phase 3: To expand our reach across the country, and then across the globe. This will be achieved through continued strategic partnerships with philanthropic organizations worldwide.


   But in order for any of that to happen we need your help.

           

NoneLikeMe can’t happen without you. You make a donation and choose a reward. You tell your friends to make a donation and choose a reward and some incredible things begin to happen...

  • We reach our goal
  • We start printing NoneLikeMe tees & apparel
  • You get NoneLikeMe tees & apparel
  • Your friends get NoneLikeMe tees & apparel
  • Amazing causes receive much needed funding 
  • You feel so great to have helped fund amazing causes

When you decide what you want to donate just select from one of the packages from the list below. 

                        

Please note: For all Perks, shipping is free within the U.S. We will ask for your color choice, size, and shipping address at the end of the campaign. Please add an additional $15 to your reward for Canada and $25 for international shipping. 

RISKS & CHALLENGES

1. The challenges of NoneLikeMe will be getting the word out, and convincing IndieGogo to participate. With so many wonderful projects to choose from, we hope that ours will stand apart from the rest. 

2. To reach as many people as possible, we are asking friends, families, and various blogs to help spread the word.

3. A major part of what will make NoneLikeMe a success will be forming solid partnerships with the causes we want to design for & donate to.

4. Once the funding is in place, the challenge will be producing on a large scale. Depending on outside help is difficult, but we have been dealing with a local design printer and have established a solid relationship, which has given us a lot of confidence in them.



OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

If you are unable to make a donation at this time don't worry. There are other ways you can help show your support to the campaign. 

                                           
Visit us on the web & TELL YOUR FRIENDS & FAMILY about our campaign video or share the link!!

       

          Facebook                       Instagram                        Twitter

EVERY SHARE REALLY DOES MAKE A DIFFERENCE!
FROM ALL OF US AT NoneLikeMe, THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR ALL OF YOUR SUPPORT!

story:
Seattle Superfans is a sports apparel company specializing in high fashion, top quality Seattle sports teams designs. Help us launch our first LIMITED EDITION Seahawks 12th man collection!

About The Project

The Seahawks 12th man fan base is one of the loudest, proudest and most loyal fan bases in the world.

There are a lot of great shirts out there to fly your blue and green colors but we wanted to take that extra step and offer a more fashion forward set of designs that you won't find anywhere else.

These designs will be in LIMITED EDITION quantities so you will have a unique shirt to wear not just on game day but everyday.

We will be introducing NEW designs to the collection on a continuous basis but we will be starting with these eight designs.

About The Shirts

The shirts will be waterbased discharge ink printed on a very high quality lightweight 100% Ringspun cotton shirt by Next Level Apparel and We will also be printing on unique Womens styles from Next Level as well! (see examples below) Each shirt will be decorated with a custom printed tag and a woven 12 sleeve tag to add that added high quality finishing touch.

The goal is to provide you the fans with a super comfortable, unique, fashion forward LIMITED EDITION tee that will become your favorite tee not just on game day but for all occasions as well!

 


 The Designs

 


The Rewards

The main point of the rewards is to get the shirts in your hands! So while there are various reward levels, they are all basically just quantities of shirts. You can get one of each, you can mix and match, just pick the reward level that corresponds with the total number of shirts you want.

There's also magnets a LOUD & PROUD wristband and a LIMITED EDITION pullover hoodie available. The complete magnet collection, and wristband will come with the shirts. starting at just the 1 quantity shirt level you will get ALL 8 MAGNETS and A WRISTBAND!

Over and Above Goals

If the project goes over and above our goal, we will be adding the two stretch goal designs and some "extras" to make the campaign even more cool, like upgraded shirt styles, hoodies, snapback hats, etc.

Note:

- Apparel images here are mockups. Actual products may vary slightly from the mockups in color tone, graphic size/positioning.

How you can help

1. Back the project! We have some cool incentives for those of you who do (listed on the right side of the page!).

2. Spread the word! Share our project with friends and family - and on social media!

Over and Above GoalsIf the project goes over and above our goal, we will be adding the two stretch goal designs and some "extras" to make the campaign even more cool, like upgraded shirt styles, hoodies, snapback hats, etc.Note:- Apparel images here are mockups. Actual products may vary slightly from the mockups in color tone, graphic size/positioning.How you can help1. Back the project! We have some cool incentives for those of you who do (listed on the right side of the page!).2. Spread the word! Share our project with friends and family - and on social media!

story:
We are a registered nonprofit business in the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania and are establishing our Board of Directors now.  Please read on!

The Transient Design is a small conscious clothing company seeking to raise funds to produce our summer line.  As you can see from a few of our pieces above (scroll to the bottom of the page to see more!), things are looking good.  Now we need your help to fund production ($5000 will cover half... we are on the road now wholesaling to stores to cover the rest!).  Please take a moment to watch our video to see what we are about.

Our first batch of clothing was produced by a volunteer on a second hand sewing machine in a bamboo hut at a small homeless shelter.  We weren't on a mission to change the world, we were simply working hard to provide a little funding to get over a few important financial hurdles for the shelter.

^Wildflower Home Women's Shelter.  Fall fundraiser 2009

It worked.  And we were able to donate several thousand dollars to thier cause.  Those who were fortunate enough to recieve a pair of the shorts we made spoke about the potential... so we listened. 

It's been a rollercoaster of a startup piecing this together... Learning the local customs, fine tuning our designs, maxing out credit cards and selling most everything we own to fund this endeavor.  But it's worked -To the tune of over $10,000 funneled to three different charities supporting at-risk women in the north of Thailand so far.

Just as we push on, Wildflower Home has seen incredible growth as well.  When we came onboard in 2009, Wildflower Home had only 2 permanent buildings... now they have 6!

^Rooftop grow project. Just one way Wildflower Home continues efforts to remain self sustainable.  They have grown their own food from startup on.

We have well-established ourselves after 3 years of working with companies that care about people.  We source traditional fabrics from authentic sources and speak the local languages to ensure that our impact is a positive one... For the businesses we work with and for the people we serve.

^Noppamart, hand weaving in the traditional Karen Style.  This picture was taken from a visit to Baan Papae Village while we were sourcing fabrics for our line.

What we stand for:

The Transient Design was created by a volunteer who saw desperate need. Because of this we will always remain strong with our roots in service and...

-Promote style by bringing well-made unique clothing to you.

-Promote abundance by living a balanced financial existence, offering ALL financial energy that is above operating costs to aid humanity through EMPOWERMENT and NUTRITION.

-Promote truth by creating an internal organizational culture based on honesty and service so that business decisions see to the well-being of our local and global communities.

-Promote conscious industry by spreading the word and potential of new and emerging charitable business models

Now for the fun stuff!  The perks of donating!

We have spent the last 3 months designing our summer line from scratch.  We use natural fabrics like cotton and linen.  As much as we are able, we use 100% organic and ecologically harvested dyes from trees native to the jungles of northern Thailand (lots this year!).  Also, we are offering a variety of hand woven fabrics, produced the same way that fabric has been made for thousands of years... by hand on a wooden loom.

 

You can check out specifics of each piece on our website: www.thetransientdesign.com

Please read!

  *****Once our campaign ends, we will contact you for your sizing needs.  All of our sizing can be viewed online at our website.  *Please ensure that the piece you are claiming comes in your size before donating!  Also, colors of product will vary based on our current offerings.  In some cases, pictures of product are only samples.  If you have chosen a color that is no longer offered we will contact you with an alternate choice.

A huge thank you to all of you who have been rocking our threads for years... a huge hello to all of you who are now jumping on board.  Thank you!

story:
Short Summary

Hello, my name is Wyatt.  I am a University Student and Entrepreneur.  I enjoy making business work.  I am committed to making a product or service someone has bought from me to be a really great buying experience.  Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.  My campaign is important to meas it is going to help me get the products I have envisioned and the plans I have laid out get set into motion.  Once this campaign is completed my store page and all distributors and designers will be creating interesting and fashion forward products for you!  All contributors to this project will help achieve, finalizing of designs, manufacturing and distribution of products and also the the opening of my company's online store-front.  

UPDATE: So far we have raised $120 towards the campaign.  This is great news!  Tell your friends about it.  


What We Need & What You Get

For this project to be complete and ready to go I will be needing a total of $10,000. The funding will be going to clothing production, fees for keeping the website and shipping paid and any extra will be going towards advertising.  The perks include items that I will be creating in my company's store.  The items include, stickers with logo, T-shirts with logo, Hoodies with logo and Fatigue hat with logo.  For each perk you get the included items from the previous perk.  The funds that are not directly used on getting clothes produced will be set aside in the company account to be used if any other costs not covered by sales show up, such as new designs and different/new products being made.

The Impact

To you as the contributor it is valuable because you are helping a new and fashion forward company get off the ground and into the fast paced world of fashion.  We are online meaning we can always be changing to new ideas and designs quicker and be restocking our storefront a lot quicker than traditional stores.  

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.  I have set up connections with shipping, design and production for our products.  These include, Amazon Shipping and Jakprints Inc.  They have ways of ensuring everyone is notified if any challenges in getting a product to a customer arise.  If these challenges occur, I will directly contact any customers that are included in that shipment and notify them of the issue and also notify them when there are updates and when the shipment is back on track.  

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't or are currently unable to contribute money to this campaign you can get the word out about this campaign for me which would mean a whole lot to this campaign and my company.  If you do share this whether you donate or not, you can use the Indiegogo share tools to share this campaign to people.

story:
Hawaii's First Fashion Incubator

The Hawaii Fashion Incubator (Hifi) is a sponsored project of Fractured Atlas, a 501(c)(3) non-profit arts services organization. Since 2006, Hifi has helped scores of local designers and fashion professionals gain exposure through our events, membership program, and pop-up boutique. We provide resources for students and emerging designers, and collaborate with many key players from Hawaii and the international fashion industry.  Earlier this year, Hifi hosted a 10-day pop-up fashion incubator event at Ala Moana to test the concept of a permanent fashion incubator. The event was a huge success, with 18 local designers selling their work and over 25 fashion events, classes, and workshops on the calendar.  The event demonstrated how a physical space can bring the community together around fashion and gave us the confidence to move forward with our long-held goal of a permanent fashion incubator space in Honolulu. 

 

TODAY, WITH YOUR HELP, WE ARE REALIZING THAT DREAM.

 

We just got the keys to what will be Hawaii's first physical Fashion Incubator, at Ward Warehouse Shopping Center in the heart of Honolulu's shopping district. Demolition and construction has begun with a design team from Collaborative Design Workshop, Unleash Studio and Retail Therapy to develop 1,500 square feet into a dynamic hub for fashion. In the plans: a retail space for local design & fashion events, a studio for classes & shared workspace, a library, photography studio, and more. As a supporter of Hifi, you can be among the first to see the space in its raw form and weigh in on how we can help you fast track your project and together create a go-to spot for fashion in Hawaii. 

 

By contributing to our funding campaign (and hopefully becoming a Hifi member), you'll benefit from all Hifi has to offer AND have a hand in writing the next chapter in HI fashion. 


What We Need & What You Get

In order to get the incubator space spruced up and ready for action, we're looking to raise community generated funding for materials & manpower.

Current needs and estimated costs are listed below.  Wherever possible we will be using donated and recycled materials, so keep in mind that in-kind donations of materials, equipment, and furniture will be happily accepted, and may also be tax deductible.

 

Lighting & Electrical Work - $3000

Paint & Flooring - $2000

Signage/Window Graphics to promote members and partners - $1000

Retail Fixtures - $1500 (racks, mirrors, displays, storage, fitting rooms, etc)

Furniture & Shelving - $1500 (for lounge, reception desk, storage, library, lockers for members to store tools)

A/V Equipment - $1000 (screen, laptop, stereo system, design software, shared camera equipment)

Workstations - $2000 (sewing tables, chairs, desk lamps)

Sewing Machines & Notions - $1500 -10 sewing machines (home and industrial), scissors, pattern paper, thread, muslin, dress forms, elastic, trims, rotary cutters/mats, etc.

Library - $500 - fashion/sewing books, magazine subscriptions

 

Please see the perky packages for our generous donors. Help create the space and then come down and use it to your own benefit. Connect with others who have similar needs and watch your projects fly. 


Other Ways You Can Help


(1) Join Hifi - If you consider yourself a member of Hawaii's fashion community OR a serious supporter, Hifi membership makes good sense.  It'll give you a listing in our member directory and access to the incubator space for hosting meetings, photo shoots, events, classes, and more. Not to mention discounts on workspace and events.  Check out www.hawaiifashion.org/join to learn more.

 

(2) Use The Space - Make Hifi your go-to place for all your upcoming events - trunk shows, launch parties, classes, meetings, mixers, etc. Host a making-party for yourself or your kids. Or drop in and work on a project. Just e-mail us with your ideas and check the website and Facebook page for upcoming events.

 

(3) Spread the Word - Know anyone who likes sewing, photography, art, crafting, or just likes being around other creative people? How about someone with a creative skill & a knack for teaching it? What about someone with sewing equipment they're not using? Tell them about Hifi, and share this Indie GoGo campaign with all your social networks. 

 

(4) Offer a Perk - Sometimes it takes a little extra carrot to make the difference.  If you support Hifi and want the world to know it, offer a perk to potential members and donors.  Let others know that the community wants this incubator in a big way.

story:
Who We Are

First of all, GRANI - is people: a  small team of jewelry and design enthusiasts, whose common ideas, interests and desires led to the formation of a small jewelry brand right in the the heart of Russia - Moscow
 
www.grani-store.com
 
Once the idea of creating the first collection was born in March 2016, we asked ourselves two questions, answers to which have became basic principles and philosophy of the brand: 
 
"How can we make our environmental impact during the production?"
 
  • Precious metal mining can have a negative impact on environment - that is why we do not buy silver from mining companies, we use  100% recycled metals and natural stones only, ECO-friendly packaging materials, such as Italian linen, eco-suede and organic recycled paper products. We have also developed and continue to improve a concept of the most comfortable online-shoping platform, that enables you to try a jewelry on without visiting the store thus eliminating car trips and associated carbon emissions, saving on electricity needed for store provision and saving your personal time that you can now spend for the benefit of nature.

 


"What does a woman want from a jewelry?"

  • Every woman wants to have a unique piece of jewelry created especially for her rather than pay for mass-market products - that is why we design our jewelry in an unusual, but elegant way

 

 
  • Every woman wants to be sure, that her jewelry is worth it's price - that is why we use only precious recycled metals and natural semi-precious stones. We attach great importance to the quality of our jewelry, that is why every model is produced by hand and thoroughly tested before shipping

 

  • Every woman wants to choose - that is why we create our each model in two colors: Silver (sterling silver) and Black (ruthenium plated sterling silver - one of the most durable finishing ever)

  • Finally, every woman wants to try a jewelry on before buying it even from online stores - that is why we have developed an iOS and Android Virtual Fitting Room app that you can download  from App Store or Google Play using links below or by a search request for "Grani Jewelry"

 

Why Do We Need Your Support?

Despite the fact that the first collection and our Virtual Fitting Room app is ready, we still need support for the following:

  • materials for further production of the first collection  (wax, silver, stones, packaging materials) - every model is created and processed by hand using recycled precious metals and rare semi-precious stones - as we do not work with mining companies it is quite hard to find a good metal that is worth its price and a good stone even for a small ring. Every packaging material (linen, eco-suede) is also hard to find in a good quality, that is why we order 100% linen and a high-quality eco-suede from Italy - then every pouch and cloth is sewn by hand in our studio

  • materials for developing and producing the collection of alternative stones - we want you to choose not only from silver colors, but different stones as well

  • developing more realistic Virtual Fitting Room app that will help bring a virtual process closer to the real one

 

What We Can Offer

We offer a 30% discount for our jewelry for a limited time of the campaign - 30 days and 35% discount for our Valentine's Day perks.

Each piece comes with a hand-sewn 100% Italian pouch and eco-suede cloth.

Every pouch is packed in a safe bubble-envelope for international delivery.

Each perk includes a free international delivery with a postal tracking number.

Just pick a piece and color you are in love with and for rings and bracelets - the size using one of our size charts bellow. Size options for necklaces chains: from 15 to 20 inches.

If you did not find you size in the chat - just specify it in the order!

 

rings

Each model is exclusively made by hand for every backer

    We wish you a Marry Christmas and a Happy New Year!

    We know that Christmas time is a special time for everyone and ,of course, we do not want to leave you and your loved ones without gifts on this magical time. We really regret about missing a chance to deliver every piece before Christmas and that is why specially for those who want to present our jewelry as a Christmas gift we designed a series of unique Greeting Cards with a personal 20% discount promo code for the next order and ,of course, our best wishes! Just right us the name of the person you would like to congratulate with mailing address  as soon as you backed and we will deliver the Card before Christmas! 
     

    P.S. If you buy our jewelry for yourself  - we will send the same Greeting Card especially for you!
    Merry Christmas!
     
     

    St. Valentine's Day

    If you want to make a really exclusive present for your beloved - chose one of our St. Valentine's day perks. Each perk includes free Valentine's Day delivery and a special present from our team: a hand-painted greeting card with one of the symbols of this day of your choice: Roses, Flamingos or Peppers-Heart (for rings, earrings, brooches or necklaces Valentine's Day perks) or a hand-painted greeting card with the portrait from your own photo (for bracelets and custom Valentine's Day perks). You can put your own worm wishes on the back side of any card. Each card will be delivered along with your jewelry right before February 14th!

     

    Custom Jewelry

    For those who like GRANI Jewelry style, but still wants to make something that will differ from existing collection - we offer a Custom Jewelry perk that includes no limit Skype sessions or personal meetings in Moscow to create a personal piece of jewelry made of sterling silver and one of semi-precious stones of your choice!

    Please, notice that Valentine's Day custom perk is very limited so that we could create and deliver every piece before February 14th.

    An example of custom ring created for Etxart&Panno Russian

    Look Book

    Our Stretch Goals

    Our Team

    Risks & Challenges

      Other Ways You May Help

      Follow us on Instagram

      You can use #granijewelry hashtag to mark us under your photos or reviews!

      We also welcome you to join our Telegram Channel for staying updated with the latest news
story_txt:
Who We Are
First of all, GRANI - is people: a  small team of jewelry and design enthusiasts, whose common ideas, interests and desires led to the formation of a small jewelry brand right in the the heart of Russia - Moscow
 

www.grani-store.com
 
Once the idea of creating the first collection was born in March 2016, we asked ourselves two questions, answers to which have became basic principles and philosophy of the brand: 
 
"How can we make our environmental impact during the production?"
 

Precious metal mining can have a negative impact on environment - that is why we do not buy silver from mining companies, we use  100% recycled metals and natural stones only, ECO-friendly packaging materials, such as Italian linen, eco-suede and organic recycled paper products. We have also developed and continue to improve a concept of the most comfortable online-shoping platform, that enables you to try a jewelry on without visiting the store thus eliminating car trips and associated carbon emissions, saving on electricity needed for store provision and saving your personal time that you can now spend for the benefit of nature.
 

"What does a woman want from a jewelry?"


Every woman wants to have a unique piece of jewelry created especially for her rather than pay for mass-market products - that is why we design our jewelry in an unusual, but elegant way
 



 

Every woman wants to be sure, that her jewelry is worth it's price - that is why we use only precious recycled metals and natural semi-precious stones. We attach great importance to the quality of our jewelry, that is why every model is produced by hand and thoroughly tested before shipping



 


Every woman wants to choose - that is why we create our each model in two colors: Silver (sterling silver) and Black (ruthenium plated sterling silver - one of the most durable finishing ever)



Finally, every woman wants to try a jewelry on before buying it even from online stores - that is why we have developed an iOS and Android Virtual Fitting Room app that you can download  from App Store or Google Play using links below or by a search request for "Grani Jewelry"





 



Why Do We Need Your Support?
Despite the fact that the first collection and our Virtual Fitting Room app is ready, we still need support for the following:
materials for further production of the first collection  (wax, silver, stones, packaging materials) - every model is created and processed by hand using recycled precious metals and rare semi-precious stones - as we do not work with mining companies it is quite hard to find a good metal that is worth its price and a good stone even for a small ring. Every packaging material (linen, eco-suede) is also hard to find in a good quality, that is why we order 100% linen and a high-quality eco-suede from Italy - then every pouch and cloth is sewn by hand in our studio

materials for developing and producing the collection of alternative stones - we want you to choose not only from silver colors, but different stones as well

developing more realistic Virtual Fitting Room app that will help bring a virtual process closer to the real one

 
What We Can Offer
We offer a 30% discount for our jewelry for a limited time of the campaign - 30 days and 35% discount for our Valentine's Day perks.
Each piece comes with a hand-sewn 100% Italian pouch and eco-suede cloth.
Every pouch is packed in a safe bubble-envelope for international delivery.
Each perk includes a free international delivery with a postal tracking number.


Just pick a piece and color you are in love with and for rings and bracelets - the size using one of our size charts bellow. Size options for necklaces chains: from 15 to 20 inches.


If you did not find you size in the chat - just specify it in the order!

We wish you a Marry Christmas and a Happy New Year!
We know that Christmas time is a special time for everyone and ,of course, we do not want to leave you and your loved ones without gifts on this magical time. We really regret about missing a chance to deliver every piece before Christmas and that is why specially for those who want to present our jewelry as a Christmas gift we designed a series of unique Greeting Cards with a personal 20% discount promo code for the next order and ,of course, our best wishes! Just right us the name of the person you would like to congratulate with mailing address  as soon as you backed and we will deliver the Card before Christmas! 
 


P.S. If you buy our jewelry for yourself  - we will send the same Greeting Card especially for you!
Merry Christmas!

 
 
St. Valentine's Day
If you want to make a really exclusive present for your beloved - chose one of our St. Valentine's day perks. Each perk includes free Valentine's Day delivery and a special present from our team: a hand-painted greeting card with one of the symbols of this day of your choice: Roses, Flamingos or Peppers-Heart (for rings, earrings, brooches or necklaces Valentine's Day perks) or a hand-painted greeting card with the portrait from your own photo (for bracelets and custom Valentine's Day perks). You can put your own worm wishes on the back side of any card. Each card will be delivered along with your jewelry right before February 14th!

 
Custom Jewelry
For those who like GRANI Jewelry style, but still wants to make something that will differ from existing collection - we offer a Custom Jewelry perk that includes no limit Skype sessions or personal meetings in Moscow to create a personal piece of jewelry made of sterling silver and one of semi-precious stones of your choice!
Please, notice that Valentine's Day custom perk is very limited so that we could create and deliver every piece before February 14th.

Every backer gets a personal digital Look Book designed especially for IndieGoGo campaign!

​Darya Fartushnyak, who is responsible for graphic design: https://www.facebook.com/dashafarsh
 

Dmitry Shingarev, who is responsible for application development control: https://www.facebook.com/dmitry.shingarev.7

Anna Andreevna - Valentins's Day greeting cards designer and painter: 
https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=1000054...
 
Risks & Challenges 
The one and only risk that can appear - is order overfulfillment plan. That is why for those bakers, who have backed after us had reached the 7 000$ goal -  the delivery will be slightly increased, still we will try to deliver every piece even earlier!

story:
Haikara is a smartwatch reimagined. It’s all about self-expression and simplicity, not feature overload.

Haikara is the only watch that combines the premium feel of mechanical watches with the most essential digital features.

Haikara is the smartwatch for fashion lovers. Pure style, no distractions.  

Swipe the screen to change designer watch faces on a stunning high-res display. Change straps with ease. Make the watch match your outfit, mood or personality. Forget about daily charging with up to 7-day battery life.

Made in Finland.

The Haikara watch body is made of high quality stainless steel. Both lightweight and durable, the watch will serve you for years to come.

Choose between four elegant finishes including Matte Black, Polished Steel, Rose Gold, and Gold.

And if you really want to make a statement, we've got you covered! The special edition Zirconia Crystal Haikara Watch is meant to get you noticed. 

You get ready and pick your look every day. Some days you're busy, others relaxed. With Haikara you can quickly change the straps to match your outfit and watch face.

We offer a large selection of high-quality straps hand-picked by Harri Koskinen. Choose the right materials and colours to make the watch feel truly yours. You can even use any of your existing 22mm straps.

Our lives are full of distractions and notifications fighting for our attention. Smartwatches promised to make your life simpler, but became a distraction on their own. They duplicate your phone, bombard you with alerts and make you read emails from a small screen.

Haikara watch makes your life simpler and removes distractions. 

Haikara is the smart way to make peace with your connected world, allowing you to limit your notifications. It helps you reclaim your time and live in the moment.

Use the Haikara app to select only the most important alert of the day - a phone call, email, event or an instant message. The watch will notify you when it happens, so you can focus on what's truly important. 

Haikara is about enjoying the precious moments in your life. If you're in a meeting or enjoying the time with your family, simply put your phone on silent by tapping the watch.

Time is too precious to spend it on looking for your phone. Simply tap your Haikara watch twice to make the phone ring if you lost it.

For generations wristwatches have been the staples of self-expression. They became our trusted companions. They make a statement and tell the world what you stand for.

At Haikara we wanted to create a smartwatch that would represent who you are. A timepiece that blends seamlessly into your life, but makes you stand out when you want to.

Created by a renowned designer Harri Koskinen, Haikara is the definition of functional minimalism.

Simply swipe the watch to change beautiful watch faces. Find the one that fits your outfit, mood, or personality. No compromises.

Easily change straps to create unique combinations. Smart, casual, or chic? Haikara is all about you.

Wear it. Customize it. Make it yours.

Harri’s works pay tribute to traditional Finnish industrial design, fused with a modern Scandinavian feel.

To Harri good design is about understanding the users. His creations not only have beautiful aesthetics, but also solve real problems.

The Haikara watch is a reflection of Harri’s passion for simplicity. It strikes a delicate balance between beautiful looks and essential functionality.

We've noticed that most faces created for other smartwatches don't look great. We wanted to preserve the premium Haikara feel by hand-picking the designers to create faces for your watch.

Each Haikara watch comes with 20 beautiful faces designed by Harri Koskinen. They were inspired by both Scandinavian and Japanese design elements. Simply swipe the screen until you find the one that feels right. 

You can download more faces from our mobile app. We plan to partner up with other top designers to bring you a variety of styles for every occasion and personality.

Haikara watch is designed to be a seamless part of your life. There are no buttons or crown to press, and no extra components in the operating system. We reimagined the smartwatch experience, leaving only the essentials.

We wanted to build a slim and stylish watch with a week-long battery life, so we left out the fitness trackers. At under 10mm, Haikara is the thinnest smartwatch on the market.

We wanted to remove all distractions, so we got rid of the apps and built our own lightweight operating system with 1/1000 the footprint of Android Wear.

Forget about buttons or tiny icons. Simply control the watch with intuitive swiping gestures. Tap the watch to put your phone on silent, tap twice to make it ring.

Haikara watch was designed with the users in mind. We built a strong online community on Facebook, Instagram, and Telegram. Haikara fans helped us make important design and UX decisions, and encouraged us along the way.

We asked for your opinion on everything - from watch faces to the final price. Thank you for making it happen!

 

 

The perfect smartwatch has to be fast and power-efficient. That's why we partnered up with Korulab to develop an incredibly fast and efficient OS.

Taking only 512 kB of RAM (1/1000 of Android Wear), the system is able to sleep 98% of the time while updating the clock every second. Watch faces are updated at 50FPS for a smooth experience.

Haikara watch OS has no power draining components that usually come with Android Wear. That enabled us to prolong the battery life and make the watch thinner.

The operating system supports over-the-air upgrades, so your watch will always stay up to date.

Haikara watches come with a beautiful iOS and Android app. Use it to set the most important alert of the day, or download more designer watch faces from the marketplace.

THANK YOU for helping us reach our campaign goal in less than 24 hours. Help us reach these stretch goals in time and we will reward all backers with the following:

*You will be able to choose a preferred colour for the straps and buckles.

The word Haikara has two meanings. In Finnish it means "stork", a graceful bird that travels long distances. The Japanese translation has decades of history behind it.

When foreigners flowed into Japan after the war, many of them wore fashionable high collar shirts. The locals admired their style, and wanted to copy the look. Over time “high collar” transformed to “haikara", which now stands for cool and stylish.

Haikara blends Scandinavian design with top-notch technology that is synonymous with Japan. This watch will not only serve you for a long time, but also make you look great wearing it.

Haikara team members and advisors come from leading companies such as Nokia, Suunto and Iittala. We have decades of experience in hardware, software, sourcing, and marketing. Together with our online community we’re here to build the ultimate smartwatch.

After almost two years of work and working prototypes, the Haikara team is close to the finish line. Your funds will help us finalize the components and manufacture the watch. A big part of the work has already been done, and we are just six months away from putting the Haikara watch on your wrist. 

Thank you for your support!

FAQ

What is Haikara watch?

Haikara is a smartwatch for fashion lovers. It was designed and made in Finland.

Why is Haikara special?

Haikara is a smartwatch focused on design and simplicity, instead of the usual feature overload. Swipe the screen to change designer watch faces on a stunning high-res display. Make the watch match your outfit, mood or personality. Easily replace straps. Forget about daily charging with up to 7-day battery life. Get only the most important notifications. At under 10mm, Haikara is also the thinnest smartwatch on the market.

Why is Haikara on Indiegogo?

After almost two years of work and working prototypes, the Haikara team is close to the finish line. Your funds will help us to finalize the components and manufacture the watch. A big part of the work has already been done, and we are just six months away from putting the Haikara watch on your wrist.

How does the Haikara watch work?

Haikara has a high-resolution 400x400px touch screen that allows you to change watch faces by swiping. Each watch comes pre-installed with 20 designer faces, and you can download more from the mobile app.

What are the smart features?

Haikara watch only has the most important digital features. Use the Haikara app to set the most important alerts, such as emails or calls. The watch will vibrate when they happen, and let you stay focused until then. You can also find your phone or put it on silent by tapping the watch screen.

How long is the battery life?

While most smartwatches require daily charging, the Haikara watch works for up to 7 days at a time. We achieved this by eliminating the unnecessary sensors and using a lightweight operating system.

How to charge Haikara?

Simply put it on the supplied contact charger overnight. When you wake up the watch will be ready to go for another week!

What operating system is Haikara running on?

The perfect smartwatch has to be fast and power-efficient. That's why we partnered up with Korulab to develop an incredibly fast and efficient OS. Taking only 512 kB of RAM (1/1000 of Android Wear), the system is able to sleep 98% of the time while updating the clock every second. Watch faces are updated at 50FPS for a smooth experience. Haikara watch OS has no power draining components that usually come with Android Wear. That enabled us to prolong the battery life and make the watch thinner. The operating system supports over-the-air upgrades, so your watch will always stay up to date.

Is it waterproof?

Haikara watch is IP68 water resistant up to 20 meters.

How many watch faces does it have?

Each watch comes pre-installed with 20 designer faces, and you can download more from the mobile app.

Can I design my own watch faces?

We've noticed that most faces created by amateurs for other smartwatches don't look great. We want to preserve the premium feel by hand-picking the designers to create watch faces for you. We've partnered up with top Scandinavian designers to bring you a variety of styles for every occasion and personality.

When will it ship?

We plan to start shipping pre-orders in December 2017.

Is there a shipping fee?

We offer free international courier shipping on all orders.

What are the app requirements?

The Haikara app will be released for iOS and Android smartphones.

How do I choose the watch colour and shipping address?

We will contact you after the campaign ends to confirm your shipping preferences.

Will Haikara support third party APIs?

We have received multiple requests for API integrations. Our R&D team is currently evaluating this. Stay tuned!

Is there GPS or a fitness tracker inside Haikara?

Haikara watch was designed to be slim, minimalist and beautiful. Embedding extra sensors would significantly reduce the battery life and increase the thickness.

What are the warranty and return conditions?

We offer a 2-year international warranty. You can return the watch within 14-days, provided that it has not been used.

 

MEDIA KIT
