We achieved this by eliminating the unnecessary sensors and using a lightweight operating system.How to charge Haikara?Simply put it on the supplied contact charger overnight. When you wake up the watch will be ready to go for another week!What operating system is Haikara running on?The perfect smartwatch has to be fast and power-efficient. That's why we partnered up with Korulab to develop an incredibly fast and efficient OS. Taking only 512 kB of RAM (1/1000 of Android Wear), the system is able to sleep 98% of the time while updating the clock every second. Watch faces are updated at 50FPS for a smooth experience. Haikara watch OS has no power draining components that usually come with Android Wear. That enabled us to prolong the battery life and make the watch thinner. The operating system supports over-the-air upgrades, so your watch will always stay up to date.Is it waterproof?Haikara watch is IP68 water resistant up to 20 meters.How many watch faces does it have?Each watch comes pre-installed with 20 designer faces, and you can download more from the mobile app.Can I design my own watch faces?We've noticed that most faces created by amateurs for other smartwatches don't look great. We want to preserve the premium feel by hand-picking the designers to create watch faces for you. We've partnered up with top Scandinavian designers to bring you a variety of styles for every occasion and personality.When will it ship?We plan to start shipping pre-orders in December 2017.Is there a shipping fee?We offer free international courier shipping on all orders.What are the app requirements?The Haikara app will be released for iOS and Android smartphones.How do I choose the watch colour and shipping address?We will contact you after the campaign ends to confirm your shipping preferences.Will Haikara support third party APIs?We have received multiple requests for API integrations. Our R&D team is currently evaluating this. Stay tuned!Is there GPS or a fitness tracker inside Haikara?Haikara watch was designed to be slim, minimalist and beautiful. Embedding extra sensors would significantly reduce the battery life and increase the thickness.What are the warranty and return conditions?We offer a 2-year international warranty. You can return the watch within 14-days, provided that it has not been used. MEDIA KIT

story:
Short Summary

Problem

Sexual assault and rape is a global tragedy. At Fury Defense Robotics, we have dedicated ourselves to doing something about it. According to the Center for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), about 19.3% (>23M) of women have been raped at least once in their lives. Although annual estimates vary, the CDC estimates that 1.6% of women were raped in the 12 months prior to its extensive 2013 survey. Outside of sexual assault, the FBI estimates that 156K strong-arm robberies occur annually. We believe that through technology and education we can help people live without fear. 97% of all rapist never spend one night in jail

Solution

Fury Personal Drone is an easily deployed, point of attack drone that provides a victim with immediate protection from an attacker, as well as summons help and provides post-attack identification support. The drone avoids the challenges of many existing protective devices by being able to function after deployment without any control or training from the victim. It is designed to be out of the reach of the attacker to prevent it from being disarmed and is smart enough to not attack the victim. Fury also will provide valuable input to law enforcement officials and security personnel by identifying the location of the attack and taking and sending photos of the attacker.

What We Need & What You Get

  • We anticipate that we will need to raise US$350,000 in financing to fund an initial workforce, factory set-up, manufacturing and marketing efforts. We anticipate this will come from sales and crowdfunding. We are using off the shelf technology bound together with our unique patent pending software, firmware and hardware.
  • The largest initial investment will receive The Fury Defense Drone (Patent Pending) Production run #1 This will be the first production fury self-defense drone, forever. You will be able to show your family and friends that you lead the way to making the world safe for our daughters. Donations in descending order will receive the next 100 production drones. 
  • Please look at the Perks down below for more benefits.
  • All contributors will have their name (if provided) on our "Wall of Heroes" Plaque. The Heroes plaque will greet each visitor as they enter our office.
  • We have a chance to change the world for our daughters. Please help us. You will look back with us; happy that we helped.
  • A less than total subscription ($350,000) will mean a smaller assembly line and slower sales. It will not stop the project.

The Impact

The Fury Personal Drone (Patent Pending) is an easily deployed, point of attack drone that provides a victim with immediate protection from an attacker, as well as summons help and provides post-attack identification support. The drone avoids the challenges of many existing protective devices by being able to function after deployment without any control or training from the victim. It is designed to be out of the reach of the attacker to prevent it from being disarmed and is smart enough to not attack the victim. The Fury also provides valuable input to law enforcement officials and security personnel by identifying the location of the attack and taking and sending photos of the attacker. 

The Fury Personal Drone is designed to be portable, accessible and easy to operate. To ensure effectiveness, Fury has the capability to initiate a series of actions to ward off the attacker and to summon help. Upon deployment, the device will fly 8 to 10 feet in the air, flashing a bright light at the attacker and taking the attacker’s picture. Concurrently it sets off a siren noise and instantly sends the aggressor’s picture to the closest police station or Fury’s Communication and Storage Center. Fury then dials 911 and puts the operator on its speaker phone. At that point Fury sprays the attacker with a non-lethal chemical designed to incapacitate the attacker (Optional, depending on State Laws). Unlike pepper spray canisters or stun guns, Fury does not need to be aimed and held on the target while firing.

Fury will empower women. It will help to make them feel safe and help them to be safe where they did not and were not before. We can make things better and safer for those that we love.

Risks & Challenges

The Fury Drone (Patent Pending) is unique in this market as a robotic personal defense device, but faces competition from existing non-lethal self-defense products. These include non-lethal chemical sprays, stun guns, whistles and sirens and various other growing segments, such as phone apps. Fury differentiates itself by being safe, easy to deploy, self aiming and the most effective non-lethal device on the market.

Other Ways You Can Help

Tell you friends... share and follow our postings on Facebook and twitter.

story:
Hi I’m Monica and I’m a Costume Designer!

As a young child, I taught myself how to sew on an old in-table Singer that my mother thought was broken. I fixed it and started making all kinds of costumes, for myself, my Barbie’s, and my friends. I made two out of three of my prom dresses (yes… I went to prom three times…) one of which I created my own pattern without the knowledge I later obtained in college. I ended up pursuing fashion design when I attended the Fashion Institute of Design & Merchandising, and then followed my Associates degree with a Bachelor of Science in Business Management. This past year I had a fantastic experience styling the costumes for a short film called Olivia Martha Ilse, which has successfully gone on to multiple film festivals here in the US as well as in Europe (Cannes!)

My campaign here on IndieGoGo is simply to help raise the startup funds needed to construct beautiful, high quality costumes under the name Boxcar Boutique, LLC, for all the history lovers out there! This venture is incredibly important to me because creating costumes that correlate with different times in history is a true passion of mine and what’s better than doing what you love?! My goal for the first year with your generous contributions is to create, finish, and sell 10-15 full garments. Your contribution will help me create one-of-a-kind garments for women who attend historical conferences, are involved in reenactments, and who just like to go all out for Halloween! With your help, I also have plans to design historically inspired gowns for special occasions, such as weddings. I've already acquired two bridal clients!

Let’s break it down…

In order to get the ball rolling, I will need $20,000 for the first year. This amount includes many things essential to the success and operation of Boxcar Boutique:

  • Rent ($4,000) I have already put my time and money into acquiring the workshop I’ll be building out of, I just need the funds to continue paying the rent!
  • Equipment ($2000) I have an at-home sewing machine, a cheap-o iron, and a size 4 dress form [on a terrible stand...], however in order to achieve the results I desire for my garments I will need to upgrade to the industry standards! This will cover a new machine, a gravity iron/steamer, and a full body form in a larger size to better serve my market.
  • Materials ($4,000) I will be using high quality fabrics and each garment will need a considerable amount of material.
  • Notions and embellishments ($1000) The gowns of the 18th through the early 20th century are heavily embellished and most require notions such as beads, ribbons, eyelets, hooks, busks, boning, Etc.
  • Draping/drafting materials ($1000) I start all of my pieces from the form, so I need the right materials to drape and draft accurate patterns. This means LOTS of muslin, interfacing, canvas, paper, and manila.
  • Time/labor ($5000) I would like to pay myself at least something for the extra time and labor that goes into creating such elaborate outfits. This will also make it possible to eat if I need to put the sale of my garments back into the business (in the case I don’t sell all 15.)
  • Website & business cards ($200) This is the amount needed to secure a domain name, host the website, as well as purchase business cards to get the Boxcar Boutique’s name out there!
  • Government fees ($900) This is set aside for the fees required to register an LLC with the state of California. It's an annual fee.
  • Marketing ($500) I have to get my name out there somehow, and believe it or not, those Facebook campaigns aren't free. I'll also be looking into other means of marketing.
  • Accounting service ($1000) Let's face it, I'm no accountant. I need to hire a professional! I want to do this right, so I must to pay for the right services!
  • Miscellaneous ($500). For any unexpected costs that may arise. And the do.

These amounts are totals needed for the whole first year, and I plan on selling each garment for $900-$2000 depending of course on the varying amount of time/labor, detail, and fabrics used. The level of quality I plan on producing requires many years of practice and skill and I have 18 years under my belt ("she's so young, how's that possible?" I know right! It helps when you start as a 6 year old..)

While I am hoping to fully reach my goal, the fees needed to the government are most important and I will not be able to continue without them, however, I can’t make an 18th century Polonaise gown without material! I will assure you though, that any contributions made will be put to use for the advancement of Boxcar Boutique, LLC!

Here’s what you’ll get!

There will be a semi-wide array of perks for all my contributors! I am a seamstress so most of my perks are garment related; for the most part I’ll make you anything you want! I can make doll’s clothes if you need a child’s gift. I’ll even help out with any odd jobs you might need done around the house (assuming you live in Los Angeles, that is!) I don’t have much to give in return, but I am crafty as hell!

Risks & Challenges

Ok, so there are some risks involved… I may not be able to sell all 15 of my gorgeous costumes in the first year, which means I might not break even. There is a large market for historical costumes and I know I will be able to make many sales, but I am aware I may not see all my pieces sold. Do not be deterred by this small risk though, my plan is to put the profits made from any sales back into the company to continue business as usual! I may have more years of experience as a seamstress, but I do have a business management degree! (Ha! College.)

Other Ways You Can Help

I know some of you out there don’t have the means to help out, and that’s ok! But there is something Big you can do still: SHARE! The more eyes that see this campaign, the more likely Boxcar Boutique will reach its goal! There are so many forms of social media out there in the world today; I guarantee you use one (or more) of them! Please do me a huge, gigantic favor and share this with your friends, family, coworkers and acquaintances, or at least people you think would find interest in what I’m trying to accomplish. Thank you so much for taking the time to hear my pitch and I hope to all goodness some of you are willing and able to contribute! Have an Amazing day, I Love you all! :-P

story:
Who We are And Our Mission

Beautiful Underneath, LLC is a small in-home lingerie boutique.  Danielle and Kelly bring their product into their customer homes whether for a one-on-one fitting, a small intimate bridal shower, or a party in their home with all of their closest friends.  

Their mission aims to be the premier intimate apparel and swimwear store in Oregon. Customers will enhance their silhouette through accurate fittings for comfort, fit, shape, support and style.  While providing an atmosphere for the customer that is comfortable, personable and enjoyable.  

The desire to open a specialty lingerie boutique was born as the founders of Beautiful Underneath, Danielle and Kelly, suffered from discomfort in locally ill-fitted bras.  They were amazed at the immediate difference they felt after accurately being fit at the nearest lingerie boutique that was an hours drive from Salem.  They soon were educated on the proper fitting bra and how it can trim the figure visually by five pounds, gives confidence, and for larger women, helps relieve severe back pain and migraines caused by improperly or unsupported breast tissue.  So impacted, the heartbeat of Beautiful Underneath was started as the founders understood the need.

The need is great.  Everyone they talked to in town agreed Salem lacks a lingerie boutique that allows every woman the ability to find what she needs, not just those that fit into "popular sizes".  They anxiously await to fill this void by opening the doors of this project to serve the women of the Mid-Willamette Valley with Beautiful Underneath's services and products.  Supporting them today will help open the doors sooner to a mobile fashion truck, which plans to grow into a brick and mortar boutique within a couple of years.  This is where you can come in by supporting Beautiful Underneath as they take their first steps financially and through word of mouth advertising.

If you can’t financially support us, can you help us spread the word, so that we can start helping to support all the unsupported boobies in our area?

Goals and Expenses

The startup costs for mobile retail shop are less than those of a traditional boutique.   $41,000 will help fund the purchase and renovation of the stepvan.  The money we raise will go towards these expenses:

·  The purchase of a stepvan.  What is a stepvan?  A stepvan is the type of truck that         FedEx and UPS use

·  Repairs and tune up of stepvan

·  Add lighting to the stepvan

·  Painting the exterior and vinyl wrap

·  Build Out of interior (prepare inside of stepvan for decoration

·  Décor (Shelving, racks, wallpaper, etc.)

·  Inventory

·  POS System

·  Insurance and Permit

·  Legal Costs

Beautiful Underneath's gift back to you  

Some fun and fabulous perks were created, as a thank you in this financial support endeavor, just for you you will love.that Check them out below.

$10.00 -  The Socialite

Show us your support and join us for the ride.  Receive 20% off one item and a shout out on our Social Media Network.  We will also keep you up to date on the campaign and any specials that come up.

$25.00 – She’s Got Legs

Receive 20% off one item and gift basket of our beautiful hosiery.  We will contact you via email to find out if you want the regular size or plus size. FREE SHIPPING (in the United States, please read the F.A.Q.)

$50.00 – I See London, I See France

Receive 10% off for a YEAR and a pair of Tia Lyn Panties.  We will contact you via email at the end of the campaign to find out what size and style you would like.  Your choices are size S, M, L, 1X, 2X, 3X and a thong, short or hipster panty.  FREE SHIPPING (in the United States, please read the F.A.Q.)


$100.00 –  Ooh LaLa!

Receive 10% off for a YEAR, a pair of Tia Lyn Panties, and a sample of our hosiery line.  We will contact you via email at the end of the campaign to find out what size and style panty you would like.  Your choices are size S, M, L, 1X, 2X, 3X and a thong, short or hipster panty.   We will also need to know if you would like regular or plus size hosiery. FREE SHIPPING (in the United States, please read the F.A.Q.)

$250.00 – Oh! Baby!

A beautiful black and white Tia Lyn chemise with a bottle of White or Red Wine and a beautiful pair of champagne glasses, plus 10% off for a year.  We will contact you via email at the end of the campaign to find out what size chemise you would like. Your choices are size S, M, L, 1X, 2X, 3X.  We will also let your know your choices of wine.  FREE SHIPPING (in the United States, please read the F.A.Q.)



$500.00 – Lingerie Diva

An evening of private shopping for you and your special someone in a relaxed and fun atmosphere.  Top the evening off with a dinner for two at Bentley’s Grill in Salem, Oregon.  Also, receive 10% off for an entire year. 

$1000.00 – Inside the Armoire 

Enjoy a private group party or bachelorette/bridal party for 20.  You will receive handmade invitations, beautiful decorations and wonderful refreshments just for you and your friends in our place or yours.  You will receive 10% off for a year and your friends will each receive 10% off one item at the party. 

$1500.00 – The Big Tease

A professional photo shoot just for you with a local photographer.  You will also have professional hair and makeup done, a new piece of lingerie of your choice, and refreshments.  You will also receive 10% off for an entire year.

$2500.00 – The Jessica Rabbit Package

VIP treatment all the way!  You will be provided with your own personal shopper, early admission to our grand opening for you and a friend.  You will receive 25% off the night of the opening, 10% off for your friend, upfront seating at the runway show, swag bag and 10% off for life.

BE MORE and SHARE

Share!  If you can’t contribute financially, you can still help our campaign out by sharing about it on social media (Facebook, Twitter, etc.).  There are some really great Indiegogo tools that you can use to easily share our campaign! 

Are you a blogger or journalist?  Or do you know someone that is a blogger or journalist?  We would love to have you write about us!  If you have any questions please just contact one of us.  We would love to work with you.


  • F.A.Q.
  • How much is shipping? All launch perks include FREE U.S. Shipping. Please add $10 shipping for Canadian orders and $15 for orders to other countries.
  • When will I receive my products? We expect to have all our  products ready to ship to contributors in no later than the end of May 2014. 
  • How do I receive my non-product perks?  Remember we are located in Salem, Oregon and non-product perks will need to be claimed in the Salem area.  You will be sent a gift certificate or invitation no later than April 20th.

If you can’t financially support us, can you help us spread
the word, so that we can start helping to support all the unsupported boobies
in our area?
Goals and Expenses
The startup costs for mobile retail
shop are less than those of a traditional boutique.   $41,000 will help fund the
purchase and renovation of the stepvan. 
The money we raise will go towards these expenses:
· 
The
purchase of a stepvan.  What is a
stepvan?  A stepvan is the type of truck
that         FedEx and UPS use
· 
Repairs
and tune up of stepvan
· 
Add lighting to the stepvan
· 
Painting
the exterior and vinyl wrap
· 
Build
Out of interior (prepare inside of stepvan for decoration
· 
Décor
(Shelving, racks, wallpaper, etc.)
· 
Inventory
· 
POS
System
· 
Insurance
and Permit
· 
Legal
Costs
Beautiful Underneath's gift back to you  Some fun and fabulous perks were created, as a thank you in this financial support endeavor, just for you you will love.that Check them out below.
$10.00 -  The
Socialite 
Show us your support and join us for the ride.  Receive 20% off one item and a shout out on
our Social Media Network.  We will also
keep you up to date on the campaign and any specials that come up.
$25.00 – She’s Got Legs
Receive 20% off one item and gift basket of our beautiful
hosiery.  We will contact you via email
to find out if you want the regular size or plus size. FREE SHIPPING (in the
United States, please read the F.A.Q.) 
$50.00 – I See London, I See France
Receive 10% off for a YEAR and a pair of Tia Lyn
Panties.  We will contact you via email
at the end of the campaign to find out what size and style you would like.  Your choices are size S, M, L, 1X, 2X, 3X and
a thong, short or hipster panty.  FREE
SHIPPING (in the United States, please read the F.A.Q.)
$100.00 –  Ooh LaLa!
Receive 10% off for a YEAR, a pair of Tia Lyn Panties, and a
sample of our hosiery line.  We will
contact you via email at the end of the campaign to find out what size and
style panty you would like.  Your choices
are size S, M, L, 1X, 2X, 3X and a thong, short or hipster panty.   We
will also need to know if you would like regular or plus size hosiery. FREE
SHIPPING (in the United States, please read the F.A.Q.)
$250.00 – Oh! Baby!
A beautiful black and white Tia Lyn chemise with a bottle of
White or Red Wine and a beautiful pair of champagne glasses, plus 10% off for a
year.  We will contact you via email at
the end of the campaign to find out what size chemise you would like. Your
choices are size S, M, L, 1X, 2X, 3X.  We
will also let your know your choices of wine. 
FREE SHIPPING (in the United States, please read the F.A.Q.)
$500.00 – Lingerie Diva
An evening of private shopping for you and your special
someone in a relaxed and fun atmosphere. 
Top the evening off with a dinner for two at Bentley’s Grill in Salem,
Oregon.  Also, receive 10% off for an
entire year.  
$1000.00 – Inside the Armoire  
Enjoy a private group party or bachelorette/bridal party for
20.  You will receive handmade
invitations, beautiful decorations and wonderful refreshments just for you and
your friends in our place or yours.  You
will receive 10% off for a year and your friends will each receive 10% off one
item at the party.  
$1500.00 – The Big Tease
A professional photo shoot just for you with a local
photographer.  You will also have
professional hair and makeup done, a new piece of lingerie of your choice, and
refreshments.  You will also receive 10%
off for an entire year.
$2500.00 – The Jessica Rabbit Package 
VIP treatment all the way! 
You will be provided with your own personal shopper, early admission to
our grand opening for you and a friend. 
You will receive 25% off the night of the opening, 10% off for your
friend, upfront seating at the runway show, swag bag and 10% off for life.
BE MORE and SHARE
Share!  If you can’t contribute financially, you can
still help our campaign out by sharing about it on social media (Facebook,
Twitter, etc.).  There are some really
great Indiegogo tools that you can use to easily share our campaign!  
Are you a
blogger or journalist?  Or do you know
someone that is a blogger or journalist? 
We would love to have you write about us!  If you have any questions please just contact
one of us.  We would love to work with
you.

F.A.Q.

How much is shipping? All launch perks include FREE U.S. Shipping. Please add $10 shipping for Canadian orders and $15 for orders to other countries.
When will I receive my products? We expect to have all our  products ready to ship to contributors in no later than the end of May 2014. 
How do I receive my non-product perks?  Remember we are located in Salem, Oregon and non-product perks will need to be claimed in the Salem area.  You will be sent a gift certificate or invitation no later than April 20th.

story:
!!HOODIES ARE PRODUCED AND READY FOR                                 HOLIDAY DELIVERY!!

                     

                    IDEAL HOLIDAY GIFT

  

Our Story

Hi Everyone!
We are two open minded, humble and creative ( at least we think that ) friends, we love to travel, imagine, dream and that is why we came up with our idea and eventually our product.
Here is our short story:
It all started some time ago in the buses of Los Angeles, Domo was commuting a lot and noticed working people, students, regular citizens...commuting and just struggling with keeping awake and struggling with how and where to put their heads. So as he was struggling as well.                                                          

He then thought of what he thought was a great the idea. A helmet! Helmet that you will stick up to a window ( same way you stick a towel hanger on bathroom tails ) or velcro it around the pole!

He met Mark and told him the story! The reaction was dreadful! Mark cracked up and started heavily laughing.  He told Domo: "Are you out of your mind?  Who in the World would buy that?". They then started cracking up and started throwing jokes how people would just use The Helmet and would just recharge themselves wherever needed, like cell phones.  However the seed stayed in their heads.  On their numerous travels, Mark would usually drive, Domo was a passenger.  That day Domo was wearing a hoodie, and was whining about his helmet, they were talking

       

AND WALLLAAAA!!! THE IDEA WAS BORN!!! Why don't we put some cushions on the side of the hood!  Where?  On the ears! So it subtly dampens the noise down as well!  But we need something more!  What? How? Where?  Why don't we hang more cushions, pillows on the lace of the hood. Why don't we! They went to first arts and crafts store, ripped the hood, filled it up with polyester pillow material, they hanged couple of cushions on the lace of the hood and LOGZ HOODIE WAS BORN!!!    


Where are We now, What We need and What You get 

After uncountable uses and tests of our prototype and after detailed search for the best material, we were just able to complete the production of couple of hundreds high quality fleece LogZ hoodies.  Hoodies are ready for IMMEDIATE delivery ( INCLUDING THIS HOLIDAY SEASON!!!! ) however we would like to get to the next level.  So we are reaching out to You.

We will use Your contributions to fund our future production ( we are in co-operation with very well known garment manufacturer! ), we want to fund more hoodie collections, we want to produce more LogZ products that we already have ideas and sketches, we will introduce LogZ hoodie to schools, colleges, sport teams, travel companies, musicians, actors, every day people, whoever needs sleep, whoever needs that little power nap to recharge and continue with a day....We will include you in our process, we will listen to your suggestions, we will make your travel, commute, chilling in the lounge before tennis match or exam, movie or beach day, watching your kid playing a game on the bleachers with your loved one......a LogZ experience. You will work, play, perform, feel better. 

We want to develop a LogZ brand!

ON THE RIGHT YOU CAN ORDER OUR HOODIES, SELECT ONE OF OUR FEATURED PERKS OR CONTRIBUTE YOUR OWN AMOUNT ACCORDING TO YOUR WISHES AND CAPABILITIES ( ON THE RIGHT ABOVE PERKS)!  THANK YOU!


Features and benefits:

LogZ's unique head and ear cushions give your head and neck extra comfort and in a subtling manner decrease the noises around you.  Patented detachable hanging pillows give you additional comfort and you can position them in the most suitable places for your complete satisfaction.  LogZ hoodie is made of fleece, soft and comfy material that will keep you warm and cozy wherever you are.  There is another little secret cushion on the hoodie. The whole process will develop a unique experience that we call - LOGZING OUT!

Uses of LogZ hoodie ( Performance booster ):

TRAVEL ( plane, train, bus, car, college van, school bus... )



                                              Feel Better! Perform better! 


COMMUTE ( Take that so needed power nap )


         OUTDOORS                               LOUNGE                        SPORT EVENT

                      

    

             MOVIES                                    BEACH                              EVEN WHILE 

                                                                                                 STANDING AND WALKING


ONE NOTE!

AS A FORMER PROFESSIONAL ATHLETES WE ARE CONFIDENT THAT OUR HOODIE CAN AFFECT YOUR PERFORMANCE AND CAN MAKE YOU FEEL BETTER, REST BETTER IN THOSE LONG UNCOMFORTABLE WAITS FOR YOUR MATCH, GAME, ART GIG OR ANY OTHER PERFORMANCE! 

                                                 

                                                                JUST LOGZ OUT!


Different ways of wearing LogZ hoodie + photo of packaging

             HOOD ON                              FLIP IT                             DETACH IT  

             


HOOD ON - with option to position hanging pillows wherever you like

   


FLIP IT - in couple of seconds flip hanging pillows bellow the hood and have a neck pillow

                     

                                          

                            

                                               

                                                






DETACH IT - wear it without hanging pillows and have "wallet to go" handy with most important things  ( ID, bank card, little cash, lipstick.... ) - convenient when you do not want to have your regular wallet with many extra things/cards with you.                                                                     

                                                                   

                

                                              


                              WITH UNIQUE "WALLET TO GO" FEATURE 

                                                              


SO FAR, LOGZ HOODIE COMES IN THREE DIFFERNET COLORS:

AND FOUR DIFFERENT SIZES:

SMALL, MEDIUM, LARGE AND EXTRA LARGE


AND EVEN OUR PACKAGING IS UNIQUE!


                   !!!IDEAL HOLIDAY GIFT!!!


So No More

  

     


 Just


Challenges

We have spent significant amount of time to find a good and reliable manufacturer and in renowned garment company Gerson&Gerson ( Bonnie Jean ) we found it. We are completely ecstatic and confident in their support and we are looking forward to a long term cooperation with them.

Other Ways You Can Help

Share our idea, tell your friends, give us a suggestion, we look forward to hear from you. Join LogZ Community!

          

           LOGZ STARTED WITH A DREAM AND WE WANT TO MAKE IT A REALITY.

story:
MEET SOUL WALLET

The first wireless charging wallet with smart tracking & anti-lost protection

Have you ever had your phone run out of power just when you needed it most? Maybe you forgot the charging cable or find yourself somewhere with no power source. What if you had a super easy way to charge your phone without wires or adapters? What if this device could be integrated into something that you carry with you every day?

At Soul Lab, this was our vision. We wanted to make simple, portable, wireless phone charging for everyone. The result is this incredible gadget – Soul Wallet.

With Soul Wallet, charging your mobile phone becomes effortless. Simply place your phone onto Soul Wallet and it begins to safely charge, wirelessly and quickly. Powered by Qi 1.2 Wireless Charging Technology, charging can now take place anytime and anywhere.

The Qi 1.2 protocol is the most popular and well-tested wireless charging protocol available and the latest phones from Apple, Samsung and LG all have Qi built-in. It works by converting energy into an electromagnetic field that can travel wirelessly to quickly, safely and reliably charge your phone without the need for cables, plugs, or adapters.

Just grab your Soul and go wherever your day takes you. Your smartphone can be fully charged and ready for you in no time!

Soul Wallet is perfectly compatible with the latest phones from Apple. It uses the QI 1.2 wireless charging protocol that is already built into iPhone X and iPhone 8. With Soul Wallet, you can enjoy your new iPhone for extended, on-the-go use.

Protection for you and your valuable mobile devices is built-in to Soul Wallet. Smart sensors automatically monitor charging and protect from overheating, overvoltage and short-circuit conditions for safe, dependable power.

If your smartphone supports Qi 1.2 and above wireless charging, you can charge your cell phone by simply placing it on top of Soul wallet.

Check this site to see if your phone is Qi enabled.

 http://www.qinside.biz/en/support/qi-enabled-phones-2017

Use with a Wireless Charging Receiver

If your phone doesn’t support Qi Wireless Charging, you can still use Soul Wallet with a wireless charging receiver. You can make any phone Soul Wallet friendly and enjoy the wallet and its other great features.

*Due to shipment issues, we don't sell the Wireless Receiver separately. When purchased along with a wallet perk, we'll deliver the receiver together with your Soul Wallet.

Soul remains electronically tethered to your smartphone so you never need to worry about losing it, the Soul App will send out a loss-alert to your phone if you stray too far from it, keeping your valuables safe.

As a charger, battery backup, carry-all and wallet in one, Soul Wallet is extremely versatile. It has multiple interior pockets and slots for money, credit cards, coins, and other daily essentials. The zippered closure keeps all your important items safely stowed and at hand when you need them.

Show off your individuality with the color and material that best fits your personal style. Soul Wallet is ready for business, leisure and fun.

 

 

Tech Specs

Specification Description
Charge In 5V 2A
Charge Out 5V 1.2 A
Power Bank 6000 Mah
Wireless Charging Certificate QI 1.2 Certified
Overload Protection Included
Bluetooth Bluetooth 4.1
Composition Premium Leather
Dimensions 210mm*120mm*30mm
Weight 370g
Available Colors Elephant Gray
Ocean Blue
Tangerine Flyknit
Emerald
Camo
Storage Main Cavit *2
Card Slots *8
Invoice Slots *2
Zip Pocket * 1
What's in the box Soul Wallet *1
Micro USB Cable *1
User Manual *1

 

Is Soul Wallet safe to use? Soul is safe to use. Every Soul Wallet is equipped with protection sensors. It will automatically reduce the power output if the battery is overheating or the voltage is too high. It will automatically turn OFF if necessary.
How do I know if Soul Wallet can charge my phone? Check this site to see if your phone is Qi enabled. www.qinside.biz/en/support/qi-enabled-phones-2017
If you still have questions, please leave us a message on the comment section or email to service@euumoo.com
My phone doesn't support Qi Wireless charging. Can I still us Soul Wallet? Yes. We offer a wireless charging receiver to make your phone wireless charging capable. The receiver is available with micro USB/ Lightning/ Type-C connector.
Can I use Soul Wallet to charge devices other than a smart phone? Soul is designed to charge Smartphones. We do not recommend using Soul to charge other devices even if they are Qi enabled.
Can I buy more wireless receivers? Yes. You can buy extra receivers with your choice of connector. However we do not sell the receiver separately due to shipment fee issues.
How long does is take to charge my phone? It depends on the battery capacity of your phone. For reference, it takes 2.5 hours to fully charge an iPhone7.
How long does it take for Soul Wallet be fully charged?​ Soul is equipped with a 6000 mAh battery. It takes 3 hours to fully charge Soul Wallet.
Can I replace the battery or repair Soul myself?

For safety reasons, please do not try to replace the battery or repair the wallet by yourself. If you encounter a problem, please email us at: service@euumoo.com

We'll offer you professional assistance from the manufacturer.
What versions of Bluetooth does Soul Wallet support?​ Bluetooth 4.1
What's the difference between the Standard version and the Premium version?​ Soul Wallet Standard and Premium share the same specs and features. The Standard version uses a simple elegant exterior with a graffiti inner design, while the Premium version has a more customized and unique exterior with a simple inner design.
When will it be shipped? We estimate the first batch shipment will be in early March, 2018.

What's in the box
Soul Wallet *1Micro USB Cable *1User Manual *1

 

Is Soul Wallet safe to use?
Soul is safe to use. Every Soul Wallet is equipped with protection sensors. It will automatically reduce the power output if the battery is overheating or the voltage is too high. It will automatically turn OFF if necessary.


How do I know if Soul Wallet can charge my phone?
Check this site to see if your phone is Qi enabled. www.qinside.biz/en/support/qi-enabled-phones-2017If you still have questions, please leave us a message on the comment section or email to service@euumoo.com



My phone doesn't support Qi Wireless charging. Can I still us Soul Wallet?
Yes. We offer a wireless charging receiver to make your phone wireless charging capable. The receiver is available with micro USB/ Lightning/ Type-C connector.


Can I use Soul Wallet to charge devices other than a smart phone?
Soul is designed to charge Smartphones. We do not recommend using Soul to charge other devices even if they are Qi enabled.


Can I buy more wireless receivers?
Yes. You can buy extra receivers with your choice of connector. However we do not sell the receiver separately due to shipment fee issues.


How long does is take to charge my phone?
It depends on the battery capacity of your phone. For reference, it takes 2.5 hours to fully charge an iPhone7.


How long does it take for Soul Wallet be fully charged?​
Soul is equipped with a 6000 mAh battery. It takes 3 hours to fully charge Soul Wallet.


Can I replace the battery or repair Soul myself?

For safety reasons, please do not try to replace the battery or repair the wallet by yourself. If you encounter a problem, please email us at: service@euumoo.com
We'll offer you professional assistance from the manufacturer.



What versions of Bluetooth does Soul Wallet support?​
Bluetooth 4.1


What's the difference between the Standard version and the Premium version?​
Soul Wallet Standard and Premium share the same specs and features. The Standard version uses a simple elegant exterior with a graffiti inner design, while the Premium version has a more customized and unique exterior with a simple inner design.


When will it be shipped?
We estimate the first batch shipment will be in early March, 2018.

story:
NOW AVAILABLE ON ETUGEN.CO!

High-quality cashmere products with simple, elegant designs at a fraction of the price of comparable items.

A Mongolian startup selling its products directly to consumers, bypassing cashmere industry supply chain inefficiencies.

 

The Multipurpose Cashmere Wrap & Cashmere Scarf

by Etugen Cashmere 

Natural benefits of fine cashmere: Incredible warmth and softness, light weight, breathability, understated elegance. 

 

The Multipurpose Cashmere Wrap:

4 items in ONE luxurious cashmere piece

Ideal for: Travel, cold weather, cold indoor spaces such as offices with blazing AC’s, and chilly evenings in any season.

___________________________

The Cashmere Scarf:

Pure cashmere for Him & Her

A good cashmere scarf should not cost you several hundred dollars!

Ideal for: Men & Women. Cold Weather.  Perfect for wearing over and under any type of outerwear. 

___________________________

 

WE SHIP WORLDWIDE

___________________________

 

Cashmere & High-Quality Cashmere

 

Cashmere is a natural fiber that comes from the soft undercoat of cashmere goats. Cashmere goats produce this undercoat to be warm in the winter but shed them in the spring. When the fibers are processed and spun into yarns, they can be knit or woven into a luxurious material used for making garments.

Cashmere is naturally soft, warm, breathable and light. Unlike synthetic fabrics, cashmere does not trap moisture. Moreover, cashmere is much softer, lighter and more insulating than cotton or wool.   

Cashmere fibers are classified into Grades A, B and C, based on the length and width of the fibers. The longest and thinnest fibers produce the highest quality fabric. Etugen Cashmere uses Grade A cashmere in its products.

Garments made of lower quality cashmere using inferior technology are cheaper and are prone to excessive stretching and pilling.   

Mongolia is the world’s leading supplier of cashmere, supplying 40% of the world’s cashmere. Rural nomadic herders raise cashmere goats across the vast steppes of Mongolia following a thousands-year-old tradition of nomadic animal husbandry.

Mongolian cashmere goats produce the finest quality cashmere because they are raised in a unique climate characterized by hot summers and extremely cold winters. Annual temperatures range from 102°F (39°C) to -40°F (-40°C) in Mongolia.

___________________________

 

Cashmere Supply Chain

 

Luxury brands that produce cashmere garments source their cashmere from Mongolia.

Unfortunately, most of Mongolia’s cashmere gets exported as raw fibers instead of finished garments. This means Mongolia does not benefit from the value created in the production and sale of cashmere goods

 

 

Traditionally, high-quality pure cashmere garments have been very expensive. This is because cashmere passes 6-8 middle men, across 3-5 national borders before reaching end consumers in the form of finished products.

Prices are inflated due to supply chain inefficiencies and wasteful spending by brands on expensive storefronts and excessive marketing campaigns.

The industry’s practices are unfair to the consumer, who need to pay inflated prices for decent quality products. It is also unfair to the humble Mongolian nomadic herders who supply that cashmere.

 

 

Etugen Cashmere brings a solution to these problems by producing finished products within Mongolia, bypassing the middlemen and reaching consumers directly. 

 

___________________________

 

Our Philosophy

 

Etugen Cashmere’s definition of quality goes beyond high-quality material and workmanship. Our products are made with a natural biodegradable material, obtained cruelty-free from goats grazing freely across the vast steppes of Mongolia. They are made in a Mongolian manufacturing facility, where we know workers are treated with dignity, provided healthy working conditions and paid living wages.

Our brand name Etugen Cashmere originates from the old Mongolian expression Etügen Ekh, meaning Mother Nature. It stands for our commitment to protecting the environment and nurturing life on earth.

Love, respect and awe of Mother Nature have been integral parts of nomadic Mongolian culture for thousands of years. As a Mongolian company, we live by those values.

 

As Mentioned By

 

Click to read Italia Innovation's Feature on Etugen Cashmere

___________________________

 

MONGOLIA

 

Mongolia is a Central Asian country located between Russia and China. It is the 19th largest country in the world by territory. Its population of 3 million makes Mongolia the least densely populated country in the world.

1/3 of the population of Mongolia are rural nomads.

Nomadic herders of Mongolia raise 60 million herd animals—25 million goats, 28 million sheep, 4 million yaks, 3.5 million horses and 0.5 million camels—lovingly referred to as the Five Snouts or the Five Jewels by Mongolians.

The sale of agricultural products such as wool and cashmere is the source of livelihood for nomadic Mongolian people. 

___________________________

 

Mongolian Nomadic Animal Husbandry

 

Mongolian people have raised and lived alongside the Five Snouts for thousands of years. Mongolians do not refer to nomadic animal husbandry as farming because it is a different way of co-existing with animals.

The life of a nomadic Mongolian herder revolves around taking care of the herd from dawn till dusk all year round.

Mongolian traditional homes (known as gers) are built from felt and can be taken down and re-built just as easily as tents. That is because a nomad family moves every few months, following the herd as the seasons change. In the winter, they’ll move toward the mountains where there is shelter from the harsh wind and cold. During the summer, they’ll move closer to rivers and lakes so that the herd has easier access to water.

___________________________

 

YOUR Impact

 

By supporting Etugen Cashmere, you are helping a Mongolian startup brand with the mission to make high-quality cashmere accessible to people around world and committed to conducting its business in accordance with traditional Mongolian heritage and values.

In return, we will send you elegantly designed, high-quality cashmere products, made in Mongolia with the finest Mongolian cashmere.

Visit our online store at etugen.co

___________________________

 

Who Is Ariunaa?

 

Ariunaa Bayaraa is the Founder and CEO of Etugen Cashmere. Named to Forbes Mongolia’s 30 Under 30 list in 2015, she has ten years of entrepreneurial leadership experience in startups of various sizes. She is passionate about human-centered design and sustainable manufacturing.

She was born and raised in her home country of Mongolia. She received her undergraduate degree from the American University in Bulgaria and her MBA from UCLA Anderson School of Management in Los Angeles.

___________________________

FAQ

SHIPPING

We ship Worldwide.

 

WHY CASHMERE?

Cashmere is soft, warm, breathable, light and unpretentiously elegant.

It is a natural fabric. Unlike synthetic fabrics, it cozies up to you and does not feel clammy. It is also biodegradable.

Please read the section titled Cashmere & High-Quality Cashmere for more details.

 

WHAT IS WOVEN CASHMERE?

Cashmere yarns can be made into fabric in two different ways: woven or knit. Etugen Cashmere’s Multipurpose Cashmere Wrap and Cashmere Scarf are woven to maximize comfort & durability.

Woven: multiple threads interlaced perpendicularly to one another, as can be seen in the fabric close-up photos.

Knit: a single thread inter-looped in a manner similar to hand-knitting.

story:
Short Summary

In 2015,  I participated in the national breast cancer screening program and irregularities were found. That's where the idea began and originated.  Monica, wife, mother, in between jobs, strong believer in Why not! I had just finished my job, time to move on. Confronted with the consequences of breast cancer up close, I got lucky, breast-conserving surgery, but what if it had been a breast amputation, which options would I have. Google search, a lot. Talking to women, breast cancer survivors, how external breast prostheses change your live. What stuck was  the feeling I got then. Like yes there are products, prostheses available but men are they heavy and warm and sweaty and chafing the skin. Lot's of them on the market but all look-a-likes, confection made, same materials same techniques so no real choice for women!  This had to change! New ideas/design, new technologies, new materials, online platform, cosmetic device - why not.

So from that moment it was 2017 I first pitched the idea at The Limburgse Versnellingstafels to accelerate the idea and receive backing from entrepreneurs. Here I met my co-founder and our fellow team members After this we pitched at the Brightland Innovation Factory (established at the Chemelot Campus) and were accepted into the program. December 2017 Shap3d Up was founded as a start up.  

  • Give women a choice
  • Customize and personalize breast prostheses
  • Create awareness
  • Bring breast prostheses into the world of technology
  • Explore new materials

In October, breast cancer month, the Indiegogo Crowdfunding campaign starts for Comfyboobs. Super-soft comfortable breast prostheses made of bamboo. The Comfyboobs are ideal in the period immediately after the mastectomy, during the treatments and later when exercising or when chilling on the couch. Both prosthesis and filling are pure nature. Bamboo has antibacterial properties. This causes odors to occur less quickly and gives a fresh and dry feeling, even when perspiringation. In addition, bamboo also has hypoallergenic properties so that skin irritations do not occur and are even reduced.

I have two goals with this campaign. Firstly,  offer women a beautiful and natural alternative for the already existing in the field of breast prostheses. Secondly, come into contact with power women who want to share their experiences after wearing the Comfyboobs.
Comfyboobs is the start.

"By women, for women" that's the thought. The knowledge and input women share in the community will be used for a second product line: Printboobs. These are custom-printed, external, personalized breast prostheses. The development of Printboobs is currently in full swing, research on materials, 3D techniques for scanning and printing techniques are being selected so are the and selecting materials.
Printboobs are on the way.

I want to offer women a wider range in the field of breast prostheses and strives to put an end to daily discomfort after a mastectomy. A woman must feel confident again and be confident in life. In addition to offering breast prostheses, I want to draw attention to women who are affected by breast cancer and help them to resume their role as a woman, mother and colleague. Break the silence about breast amputations and their consequences.
The introduction of Comfyboobs is proof of this. 

You can help us in making this happen. How - easy, just talk about it , share the idea. Support us with your story or experiences, make a financial statement by contributing to this campaign and gain our never ending gratitude. 

With $ 1.000,- we can realize the production and shipment of the first pré-ordered Comfyboobs and from our backers we hope to learn a lot from their experiences.

After this we will invest the fundings in developing a 3D scanning app, software engineering, 3D printing process and research on new materials. 

Choose your perk and back us at Indiegogo - Give women a choice!​

story:
Beauty is in the details, yet design plays a crucial role too. At the confluence of these two values, something amazing happens, something that touches us on a deep level, that comes to mean a great deal to us just by virtue of its momentary, immediate, emotional impact. We can’t help but feel it, experiencing its raw power on a wholly subconscious level.

We have poured our hearts and souls into these watches, developing products that we ourselves would be proud to wear. Suitable for any and all occasions, these are watches on the cutting edge, with all the wonder of true design innovation combined with the freedom that comes when you have found a great deal. After months of design and prototype work, we are proud to announce that we have finally completed our masterwork, a high-end watch whose design is one of a kind.

This is the power of ARGO.

ARGO - AR01

ARGO - AR02

ARGO - AR03

ARGO - AR04

ARGO - AR05

ARGO - AR06

ARGO - BRONZE EDITION

ARGO - GUNMETAL EDITION

The design pays a tribute to the Argo constellation and it is inspired by the ancient sextants used for celestial navigation.

In mythology, Argus was a shipwright, and he and his crew on the Argo had the protection of the goddess Hera. Legend had it that even beyond this divine protection, there was a magical piece of timber from the sacred forest of Dodona in the ship's prow.

After the success of the journey, Argo was consecrated to Poseidon. It was then transported to the sky and transformed into the Argo Navis constellation.

Argo Navis - Uranographia by Johannes Hevelius - 1687

We started our project taking inspiration from an astrolabe, as we wanted our watch to be a tribute to the Argo constellation, but we later decided to give it a different twist, opting for a sextant instead, a more recent instrument which is also more in line with our concept of minimal beauty and design. 

The Sextant

We have designed a double dial watch, engraved in different points and have chosen two color shades, Deep Blue and Black Sea, in honor of Argo's mythical adventures.

Argo's Deep Blue Dial

Argo's Black Sea Dial

The most complex part in the project was to carry out a design recalling the sextant on the watch dial without any sketches. 

Initially, a bas-relief was considered, but after running a few tests, it has been noticed it was not the desired outcome for the timepiece, therefore it has been decided to use a double dial, with an engrave dial on a plain one, to make the final design memorable. 

Details of Sextant

Details of Black Sea Dial

Details of the Back Case

Aluminum Diamond Cut Hands

We proudly announce the successful nomination of our design at the prestigious international event "A Design Award & Competition 2020" Category No. 49 Jewelry, Eyewear and Watch Design, with a vote of 8 out of 10 from the preliminary jury.

Despite the final vote, we consider this achievement a victory we want to share with you!

Argo's heart beats thanks to a Swiss Ronda 705 quartz movement, while the sapphire glass and the strong 316L brushed steel used for the case ensure even more resistance.

All of this to guarantee high quality, for an excellent product which is as light and thin as possible.

The best way to test its quality and functions is by wearing it! 

Despite its 40 mm case, Argo is as light as significantly smaller watches. We created three different color options (gold, silver and black) for the case; two (Deep Blue and Black Sea) for the dial and also six straps in two different materials (mesh and leather) and six different colors. 

We wanted to make Argo as customizable as possible, so that it can fully represent the person wearing it.

Argo by Gravithin Watches also features quick release straps for your convenience. True innovations in the field of watchmaking, these watches are ready to hit the market immediately – with your help.

Our genuine Italian leather straps are made with high attention to details and the utmost care. Genuine Italian leather might feature small creases, stretch marks and pores, which are signs of the leather authenticity and which add uniqueness and beauty to each strap.
The buckle is made of solid polished stainless steel and has been designed so that the leather strap fits neatly into it, and thanks to a recessed shape, it is even more comfortable to wear. The buckle tongue is also made from solid stainless steel, for a strong and secure fastening.
When it comes to presents, holding the package is the moment when the surprise and excitement start, that’s why opening a present isn’t only about what’s inside, but it’s also about the emotions you feel during the entire experience.

As the watch box is the first thing you see, we wanted to tip you off a little bit on the design of what is inside. We wanted the packaging design to show some of the features characterizing our watch. Therefore, we took into consideration even the smallest details, so that every single presentation aspect was addressed and in line with our design concept.

We decided to step away from the traditional watch packaging designs, the ones you can find everywhere, and opted instead for a more creative one, which is able to start telling Argo’s story and fully embraces our concept of beauty.

Our comparative graph shows the difference in the pricing policy between our early bird price and the retailer price. With your help, we'll have the opportunity to offer you the best price possible, avoiding any distribution and retail markups and cutting our own profit.

Our Kickstarter backers will have the sweetest deals! We have the possibility to offer the best price on our watches as well as make this deal even more profitable.

Gravithin is a modern watch brand founded in 2017 and based in Italy.

We conceived our designs keeping our feet on the ground, while reaching for the stars. Gravithin watches take inspiration from the universe and the celestial bodies, combining both minimal features and unconventional design for a versatile and modern timepiece.

The word “Gravithin” blends the concepts of gravity and thin together, to emphasise on the lightness of our products, their fine workmanship, the high quality materials and our attention to modern trends.

We stand behind our products and are committed to fast and high-quality service. Each Gravithin watch comes with a limited warranty covering flaws in workmanship and materials for a period of two (2) years after the original purchase.

Shipping worldwide, please note: customs duties and taxes are the buyer’s responsibility upon delivery.

Postage costs cover national postal services. Please contact us at support@gravithin.com if you require a specific courier service.

We appreciate all your support and we thank you all for taking the time to view this project. We hope that you are as passionate about Gravithin watches as we are and that you'll make a pledge to get your unique Argo!

Beyond making a contribution to this campaign, you can show your support for the project by sharing a link to this campaign on any social media platforms you use. The more people know about ARGO, the smoother the next year will go for us.

After months of design and prototype work, we are proud to announce that we have finally completed our masterwork, a high-end watch whose design is one of a kind.This is the power of ARGO.ARGO - AR01ARGO - AR02ARGO - AR03ARGO - AR04ARGO - AR05ARGO - AR06ARGO - BRONZE EDITIONARGO - GUNMETAL EDITIONThe design pays a tribute to the Argo constellation and it is inspired by the ancient sextants used for celestial navigation.In mythology, Argus was a shipwright, and he and his crew on the Argo had the protection of the goddess Hera. Legend had it that even beyond this divine protection, there was a magical piece of timber from the sacred forest of Dodona in the ship's prow.After the success of the journey, Argo was consecrated to Poseidon. It was then transported to the sky and transformed into the Argo Navis constellation.Argo Navis - Uranographia by Johannes Hevelius - 1687We started our project taking inspiration from an astrolabe, as we wanted our watch to be a tribute to the Argo constellation, but we later decided to give it a different twist, opting for a sextant instead, a more recent instrument which is also more in line with our concept of minimal beauty and design. The SextantWe have designed a double dial watch, engraved in different points and have chosen two color shades, Deep Blue and Black Sea, in honor of Argo's mythical adventures.Argo's Deep Blue DialArgo's Black Sea DialThe most complex part in the project was to carry out a design recalling the sextant on the watch dial without any sketches. Initially, a bas-relief was considered, but after running a few tests, it has been noticed it was not the desired outcome for the timepiece, therefore it has been decided to use a double dial, with an engrave dial on a plain one, to make the final design memorable. Details of SextantDetails of Black Sea DialDetails of the Back CaseAluminum Diamond Cut HandsWe proudly announce the successful nomination of our design at the prestigious international event "A Design Award & Competition 2020" Category No. 49 Jewelry, Eyewear and Watch Design, with a vote of 8 out of 10 from the preliminary jury.Despite the final vote, we consider this achievement a victory we want to share with you!Argo's heart beats thanks to a Swiss Ronda 705 quartz movement, while the sapphire glass and the strong 316L brushed steel used for the case ensure even more resistance.All of this to guarantee high quality, for an excellent product which is as light and thin as possible.The best way to test its quality and functions is by wearing it! Despite its 40 mm case, Argo is as light as significantly smaller watches. We created three different color options (gold, silver and black) for the case; two (Deep Blue and Black Sea) for the dial and also six straps in two different materials (mesh and leather) and six different colors. We wanted to make Argo as customizable as possible, so that it can fully represent the person wearing it.Argo by Gravithin Watches also features quick release straps for your convenience. True innovations in the field of watchmaking, these watches are ready to hit the market immediately – with your help.Our genuine Italian leather straps are made with high attention to details and the utmost care. Genuine Italian leather might feature small creases, stretch marks and pores, which are signs of the leather authenticity and which add uniqueness and beauty to each strap.The buckle is made of solid polished stainless steel and has been designed so that the leather strap fits neatly into it, and thanks to a recessed shape, it is even more comfortable to wear. The buckle tongue is also made from solid stainless steel, for a strong and secure fastening.When it comes to presents, holding the package is the moment when the surprise and excitement start, that’s why opening a present isn’t only about what’s inside, but it’s also about the emotions you feel during the entire experience.
As the watch box is the first thing you see, we wanted to tip you off a little bit on the design of what is inside. We wanted the packaging design to show some of the features characterizing our watch. Therefore, we took into consideration even the smallest details, so that every single presentation aspect was addressed and in line with our design concept.
We decided to step away from the traditional watch packaging designs, the ones you can find everywhere, and opted instead for a more creative one, which is able to start telling Argo’s story and fully embraces our concept of beauty.

Our comparative graph shows the difference in the pricing policy between our early bird price and the retailer price. With your help, we'll have the opportunity to offer you the best price possible, avoiding any distribution and retail markups and cutting our own profit.


Our Kickstarter backers will have the sweetest deals! We have the possibility to offer the best price on our watches as well as make this deal even more profitable.




Gravithin is a modern watch brand founded in 2017 and based in Italy.
We conceived our designs keeping our feet on the ground, while reaching for the stars. Gravithin watches take inspiration from the universe and the celestial bodies, combining both minimal features and unconventional design for a versatile and modern timepiece.
The word “Gravithin” blends the concepts of gravity and thin together, to emphasise on the lightness of our products, their fine workmanship, the high quality materials and our attention to modern trends.

We stand behind our products and are committed to fast and high-quality service. Each Gravithin watch comes with a limited warranty covering flaws in workmanship and materials for a period of two (2) years after the original purchase.

Shipping worldwide, please note: customs duties and taxes are the buyer’s responsibility upon delivery.
Postage costs cover national postal services. Please contact us at support@gravithin.com if you require a specific courier service.

We appreciate all your support and we thank you all for taking the time to view this project. We hope that you are as passionate about Gravithin watches as we are and that you'll make a pledge to get your unique Argo!

Beyond making a contribution to this campaign, you can show your support for the project by sharing a link to this campaign on any social media platforms you use. The more people know about ARGO, the smoother the next year will go for us.

story:
Zephyr Diamond

Go here to view voucher details.
Call if you have any questions:
1-844-315-1587 or
225-215-2453

As someone who has worked in the jewelry financing business for 28 years, I've seen many good people who were ready to make a lifetime promise with an engagement or wedding ring get turned away from a store with no other option. For some, receiving credit from any jewelry company is not an option due to their financial credit history. To me, it was unacceptable and heartbreaking to see these people unable to get the ring they desired for their loved one because of inadequate responsible financing options.

Zephyr Diamond is a start-up, online fine jewelry store with a vision to become the world’s solution for engagement and bridal ring credit financing. With the utilization of our inclusive financing method, we believe this is possible.  




Why we Need Your Support and What You Get in Return

Zephyr Diamond believes that everyone should have the same opportunity at happiness. We don’t want people to be hindered by the lack of financing options, so we need your support to help us make Zephyr Diamond, which is powered by our financing method solution PayAway®,  an option for everyone. We are raising $165,000 to finish the Zephyr Diamond online store, complete the integration of the PayAway® system, secure inventory, and make Zephyr Diamond available throughout the United States.

Fundraising Reward Diamonds

When you support us, you will have the opportunity to purchase a quality diamond ring of your choice from our selections, and buy at our cost instead of retail price, a savings of up to 50% off the price of a ring. With your support, you will have the chance to get a diamond ring before it is priced for profit by jewelers. This is our way of saying thanks for your help in ushering in a new method to purchase fine jewelry and in the launching of our national, internet-based fine jewelry brand.  

    • International Gemological Laboratory (IGL) Certified
    • Direct From New York Diamond District Suppliers
    • Conflict-Free
    • Up to 50% off Retail Pricing


The Styles

In our online store, choose from more than 40 of the best selling rings in the market. For The Advocator or Founder level supporters, if you don't find what you are looking for in our selections, take advantage of our Zephyr Diamond Concierge Service.


The Process


Step 1:  Support our campaign and receive your voucher after the campaign ends.

Step 2: Choose what ring you want from our online Zephyr Diamond store or take advantage of our Concierge Service.

Step 3:  Add your desired ring to the shopping cart and apply your voucher.

Step 4:  Receive your ring and propose to the one you love.


Why All This Matters

Our Unique Payment Method 

PayAway® is the unique and exclusive payment method we’ve developed that removes the high interest rates, low approval amounts, and crafty schemes that other stores employ as options for ring financing.

With Zephyr Diamond and PayAway®, we become the solution for couples who are trying to make their dreams come true.

PayAway® is the Ideal Consumer Alternative because it focuses on the Consumer.

PayAway® does not require credit checks or charge any interest, ever. With minimal pre-qualifications, the customer has access to a better payment method that guarantees credit approval without paying more than the advertised retail price of the ring.

Sensible and Beneficial Relationship

PayAway® relies on mutual trust between the customer and Zephyr Diamond. We trust the customer to make certain agreed upon payments, and we earn their trust by getting them the ring they want utilizing a payment plan that works for them.

Simple Requirements

PayAway® only requires that the customer have a reliable source of income and a checking or savings account in good standing at a U.S. Bank.

  • If we are successful, we could revolutionize the consumer credit industry. No more high interest loans, lease-to-own, or payday lending schemes that put people in a bad position.
  • We can help more people build credit without putting them at higher risk of paying more and getting less for their hard earned dollars.




Risks & Challenges

Our biggest risk is people not viewing us as a credible jewelry store. Everyone is waiting for the "other shoe to drop" and looking for angles in the opportunities that we are providing. The fact is that because these types of opportunities are rare and because people have been trained to be skeptical, people may possibly view us as another business offering perks we cannot possibly fulfill.

We hope to overcome this challenge by setting our Indiegogo campaign as one with flexible funding. Regardless of the amount of support we receive through our campaign, we will honor all the vouchers that have been issued based on backing levels and contributions.

Our second biggest risk is overcoming the perceptions of the public who have been been trained to think that purchase gratification must be "instant" and that interest must always be charged.

Banks and other lenders aren't going to like what we are trying to do. We are challenging the status quo. This creates doubts as to whether this is possible.

We firmly believe that this is a viable method of making large fine jewelry purchases, which is why we are are here at Indiegogo asking for your support.

So what if you don't hit your goal?

  • It doesn't affect you at all. You will still receive your perk and get the opportunity to purchase the ring you desire at a percentage off the retail cost.
  • Depending on the support we receive through this campaign, it may just take us a little bit longer to roll out our PayAway® system nationwide.

Frequently Asked Questions



Other Ways You Can Support our Mission

We know not everyone is looking for a diamond ring right now, but if you believe that everyone should have access to this option of fair financing for jewelry, then please help us spread the word. 

  • Share our campaign on Facebook, Twitter, or your other social media accounts.
  • Tell your friends, especially those who are looking to get engaged, about this once in a lifetime opportunity.

It doesn't affect you at all. You will still receive 
your perk and get the opportunity to purchase the ring you desire at a percentage off the retail cost.

just take us a little bit longer to roll out our PayAway® system 
nationwide.


Frequently Asked Questions


 Other Ways You Can Support our Mission


We know not everyone is looking for a diamond ring right now, but if you believe that everyone should have access to this option of fair financing for jewelry, then please help us spread the word. 


Share our campaign on Facebook, Twitter, or your other social media accounts.
Tell your friends, especially those who are looking to get engaged, about this once in a lifetime opportunity.

story:
At William Painter, we were tired of all the compromises made in the products we used on daily basis. While other companies are racing to the bottom, we stand for something more. 

We believe everyone deserves to have the best products, with solid customer service that treats you like family.

You live an active life, we make products that can keep up with your adventures. That's why we use the most durable materials and back it up with a lifetime guarantee.

We truly believe that having trusted everyday accessories will enhance your life and inspire you to be more. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

You are a person, who needs eyewear to keep up with style. The Empires are a vintage & timeless look re-engineered using state of the art materials. With our lifetime guarantee, you never have to worry about taking them along for the adventure.

 

 

 

 These sunglasses are made from the same materials used in a Fighter jet, F1 Race Car, Lamborghini, Bugatti Veyron and many ultra-luxury watches. The Empire are extremely strong, but also deceptively light. Titanium is also hypoallergenic, meaning it is perfectly safe for the human body. Doctors use the element for hip and knee replacements for this reason.

 

  

You are an active person, who needs eyewear that can keep up. We examined drill bits, knives, firearms and F1 race car pistons. From this, we developed our own titanium protective coating.

 

 

 

 Ever had sunglasses fall down your nose? We HATE that! Proper sunglass fitment is taken to heart. By using a thick titanium and ultralight lens, we are able to greatly improve the center of balance.

 

 

 

The Empire frames come with the highest quality Japanese nylon polarized lenses. They are light, durable, clear and are shatter and scratch resistant unlike glass or inferior acrylic lenses.

 

 

 

Lenses are taken VERY seriously around here. What's the point in making awesome sunglasses if the optics are crappy? We literally searched all around the world looking at various types of lenses. From Glass, Polycarbonate, CR39, Acrylic, and Nylon. Each one has its merits but we wanted something truly exceptional. We are extremely proud to introduce William Painter's Lifelong Lenses.

They are the lightest in the world, less than half the weight of traditional glass lenses. Our lenses are PREMIUM - they cost more to produce than an entire pair of “high end” brands.

 

 

 

 Polarized lenses neutralizes glare, clear up objects and reduce eye strain. They work especially well on car windshields, oceans or lakes and other high glare environments. Typically lenses have a polarizing and tint coating added to the top of the lens to achieve this effect. Over time, however, the polarizing and tint can bubble and flake off of the lens. Have you ever seen a bad tint job on a car? Same problem. With The Empire that problem is solved with LifeLong Lenses.

 

 

Our frames are made prescription ready. You can take them to your local optometrist and have your prescription put in with ease.

 

 

We want you to have only the very best, that's why we engrave a subtle reminder to "Live your Dream". It's the details that matter, and we think it is the perfect finishing touch. 

 

We have worked really hard on making a high quality pair of glasses, but also a way to protect them. The William Painter hard case is custom built for The Empire. It fits snuggly and doesn't shake around when moving the case.
