story:
Meet Care Go™, the lifeline that fits on your keychain to protect you and your loved ones. 

 

 

 

 

 

Every second matters in an emergency and, the sooner your loved ones can be alerted, the better. In an emergency, oftentimes your phone isn’t enough. Care Go™ pushes critical alerts in iOS making sure that your emergency contacts receive a loud alarm even if their phone is set to silent mode. They will be given your real-time location on a map to take immediate action to help you.

 

 

 

Sometimes you just want the people in your life to know where you are before something bad happens. By simply twisting the Care Go™, your protectors will be notified and asked for their attention. Once disabled, they will be informed that their attention is no longer needed and will be thanked for their help.

 

 

 

 

 

With the Bluetooth 5 tracking, you can identify where your Care Go™ is using the app, or use the Care Go find your phone! We recommend attaching your Care Go to your keys or any important item to make sure you can always find it again with ease. Simply go to the Care Go app and tap them. The Care Go will start to sound a high pitch sound allowing you to easily locate them. As for your iPhone, just press the button on the bottom of your Care Go to make your phone sound. Even if it’s muted!

 

 

 

 

Care Go™ pushes critical alerts through your iPhone so your emergency contacts can receive a loud alarm even if their phone is set to silent mode. We have achieved this by leveraging iOS’s Critical Alert API so that you can get the help you need right away.

 

 

 

Personal Security is an important mission hence we prioritize stability and reliability as the core of our product design philosophy. Alphahōm Care Go’s built-in battery will last up to 1 year on a single charge. It only takes 1 hour to charge.

 

 

 

Adopting the latest Bluetooth 5 technology ensures a better range, faster speed, and higher reliability compared to other Bluetooth devices.

 

 

 

When you use Care Go™, you’re trusting us with your information. We understand that this is a big responsibility and we strive to keep your information, like you, safe. We built our company cloud on a private server on Google Cloud with double security measures. We also do NOT store any location data and only provide them when you need them.  

 

 

Protecting Personal Security is our mission and we want to offer as many benefits of Care Go™ as possible for free. The Care Go™ App is a powerful companion to Care Go™. Users can enjoy most critical features after buying the Care Go™ and downloading the application without having to pay for ZERO subscription fee. Premium users can also enjoy a set of additional features like history log in the future.  

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Our team is an international group of people with over 10 years of experience in the IoT field. As parents, husbands, wives, and children, we know that the world can be dangerous and uncertain. That is why we created the Care Go™, to use our expertise to protect our loved ones. To make a meaningful difference in people’s day to day safety and make Care Go™ a reality, we have partnered with Foxconn®, a leading manufacturer to ensure the best quality. We also understand the difficulty in receiving rewards from Kickstarter, so we took a step further, using FBA (Fulfillment by Amazon) or DHL to provide premium and on-time delivery experience for all of our backers here at Kickstarter.

Join us today and protect your loved ones!  

 

 

 

This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 900+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $390M raised between them.

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

Developing and manufacturing a tech device made for daily use and that go with you everywhere, is a pretty complicated matter. First of all the device needs to be lightweight and have a small form factor, it needs to be robust to withstand daily use and transport, it needs to be easy and intuitive to use and it needs to look great.

This is a lot to ask for a product that will retail for only $39.99. A whole lot actually.

We’ve seen many companies try to do this and fail. We’ve seen many crowdfunding campaigns promising this and fail. And we can understand why.

However (with the risk of sounding cocky) we are different. Our team consists only of industry professionals all with years of experience and our co-founders each have more than 10 years of product development, manufacturing, and international sales and marketing.

Our manufacturing experience has made us able to negotiate some very favorable terms with our suppliers and our manufacturing partner of choice Foxconn®. We are not only confident that we will be able to deliver, but that we will deliver on time as well.

Also, we will use Amazon Fulfilment or DHL to ship your new Care Go. You will receive your Care Go just as you would when shopping locally, no matter if you live.

 

Environmental commitments

 

Long-lasting design

Care Go itself is designed with a rechargeable battery, eliminating the need for one-use batteries completely. Care Go is extremely power efficient and its 85 mAh battery will keep Care Go up and running for up to a year and it will recharge in only 1 hour.

Care Go is made to last. Its exterior casing is made of aluminum, making it a tough little guy, that will be by your side for a long time.

 

Environmentally friendly factories

We are a very diverse team. Some of us are parents, some of us are just graduated and some of us have a bit more summers under the hood than we will admit. One thing is common for all of us though; just as much as we love Care Go, we love to be able to breath fresh air and drink clean water.

It can be really difficult to make the manufacturing process of a tech product as environmentally friendly as we would like, especially when quantities are small, to begin with.

To avoid having to deal with small manufacturing facilities without the proper means to reduce the environmental strain from their production, we have partnered up with one of the worlds leading large scale manufacturers Foxconn®.

Foxconn® is globally recognized for the scale and effectiveness of production, but also for their continuous work to reduce the environmental strain in all stages of production, packaging and shipping.

 

Sustainable Distribution

Getting your new Care Go to you as quickly and effortless as possible is very important to us, but so is doing it the right way.

We strongly believe that the environment needs to be taken into consideration in every aspect of what we do. This includes how we ship our products.

When choosing our logistics partners, we have a long list of criteria. Even if they meet all of these, but they don’t have a strong strategy on how to do their business as environmentally friendly as possible, we simply continued looking.

The two logistics companies we have partnered up with, both offer fast global shipping, flexible solutions and above all, they are both industry-leading in making transportation as energy-efficient and environmentally friendly as possible.

Learn more about how our logistics partners work on making transport better for all of us.

 

Amazon

https://sustainability.aboutamazon.com/sustaina...

DHL

https://www.dpdhl.com/content/dam/dpdhl/en/medi...

We have achieved this by leveraging iOS’s Critical Alert API so that you can get the help you need right away.   Personal Security is an important mission hence we prioritize stability and reliability as the core of our product design philosophy. Alphahōm Care Go’s built-in battery will last up to 1 year on a single charge. It only takes 1 hour to charge.   Adopting the latest Bluetooth 5 technology ensures a better range, faster speed, and higher reliability compared to other Bluetooth devices.   When you use Care Go™, you’re trusting us with your information. We understand that this is a big responsibility and we strive to keep your information, like you, safe. We built our company cloud on a private server on Google Cloud with double security measures. We also do NOT store any location data and only provide them when you need them.    Protecting Personal Security is our mission and we want to offer as many benefits of Care Go™ as possible for free. The Care Go™ App is a powerful companion to Care Go™. Users can enjoy most critical features after buying the Care Go™ and downloading the application without having to pay for ZERO subscription fee. Premium users can also enjoy a set of additional features like history log in the future.               Our team is an international group of people with over 10 years of experience in the IoT field. As parents, husbands, wives, and children, we know that the world can be dangerous and uncertain. That is why we created the Care Go™, to use our expertise to protect our loved ones. To make a meaningful difference in people’s day to day safety and make Care Go™ a reality, we have partnered with Foxconn®, a leading manufacturer to ensure the best quality. We also understand the difficulty in receiving rewards from Kickstarter, so we took a step further, using FBA (Fulfillment by Amazon) or DHL to provide premium and on-time delivery experience for all of our backers here at Kickstarter.Join us today and protect your loved ones!     This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 900+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $390M raised between them.   Risks and challengesDeveloping and manufacturing a tech device made for daily use and that go with you everywhere, is a pretty complicated matter. First of all the device needs to be lightweight and have a small form factor, it needs to be robust to withstand daily use and transport, it needs to be easy and intuitive to use and it needs to look great.This is a lot to ask for a product that will retail for only $39.99. A whole lot actually.We’ve seen many companies try to do this and fail. We’ve seen many crowdfunding campaigns promising this and fail. And we can understand why.However (with the risk of sounding cocky) we are different. Our team consists only of industry professionals all with years of experience and our co-founders each have more than 10 years of product development, manufacturing, and international sales and marketing.Our manufacturing experience has made us able to negotiate some very favorable terms with our suppliers and our manufacturing partner of choice Foxconn®. We are not only confident that we will be able to deliver, but that we will deliver on time as well.Also, we will use Amazon Fulfilment or DHL to ship your new Care Go. You will receive your Care Go just as you would when shopping locally, no matter if you live. Environmental commitments Long-lasting designCare Go itself is designed with a rechargeable battery, eliminating the need for one-use batteries completely. Care Go is extremely power efficient and its 85 mAh battery will keep Care Go up and running for up to a year and it will recharge in only 1 hour.Care Go is made to last. Its exterior casing is made of aluminum, making it a tough little guy, that will be by your side for a long time. Environmentally friendly factoriesWe are a very diverse team. Some of us are parents, some of us are just graduated and some of us have a bit more summers under the hood than we will admit. One thing is common for all of us though; just as much as we love Care Go, we love to be able to breath fresh air and drink clean water.It can be really difficult to make the manufacturing process of a tech product as environmentally friendly as we would like, especially when quantities are small, to begin with.To avoid having to deal with small manufacturing facilities without the proper means to reduce the environmental strain from their production, we have partnered up with one of the worlds leading large scale manufacturers Foxconn®.Foxconn® is globally recognized for the scale and effectiveness of production, but also for their continuous work to reduce the environmental strain in all stages of production, packaging and shipping. Sustainable DistributionGetting your new Care Go to you as quickly and effortless as possible is very important to us, but so is doing it the right way.We strongly believe that the environment needs to be taken into consideration in every aspect of what we do. This includes how we ship our products.When choosing our logistics partners, we have a long list of criteria. Even if they meet all of these, but they don’t have a strong strategy on how to do their business as environmentally friendly as possible, we simply continued looking.The two logistics companies we have partnered up with, both offer fast global shipping, flexible solutions and above all, they are both industry-leading in making transportation as energy-efficient and environmentally friendly as possible.Learn more about how our logistics partners work on making transport better for all of us. Amazonhttps://sustainability.aboutamazon.com/sustaina...DHLhttps://www.dpdhl.com/content/dam/dpdhl/en/medi...

story:
Made in the USA, the AG Shield is the world’s first fully concealable bulletproof vest that can be worn by everybody.

In addition, it can be used in multiple ways, allowing users to adapt to dangerous situations.

 

 

Unlike some cheaper shields made overseas, the AG Shield has proudly been designed, manufactured, and assembled in the USA. 

 

It is crafted to be lightweight, durable, and sweat resistant.

 

Our ultimate hope is that you will never have to use it. But if you do, you can rest easy knowing that you are protected by a high-quality American-made piece of safety equipment.

Think of the AG Shield like your personal bodyguard – only it doesn’t cost hundreds of dollars per day like a human bodyguard.

Whatever you do, leave nothing to chance.

Back the AG Shield today and help us bring this essential device to market. 

 

The AG Shield is an innovative new breed of personal ballistics protection that has one key role – to save your life.

We have created a lightweight bullet-resistant shield that can be worn by everyone, everywhere.

Traditional bulletproof vests are effective, but they tend to be heavy and bulky. This may not be a problem for trained officers, military personnel, and bodyguards, but it’s less practical for your average human.
 

 

  • Weighing in at just under 4lbs, this vest can be used by all genders and body sizes.

.

 

  • The lightweight and slimline build make it easy and discreet to carry in a backpack or bag, whether at school, at work, or on the road (and yes, it’s airport-friendly).

 

  • Each vest comes with two removable shields that can also be used independently. Each shield features a quick-access hand strap on the rear for easier grip as you adapt to dangerous situations.
  • Store it in your backpack, your locker, your front hallway, or in your car. You never know where danger will strike. 

In moments of terror, preparation is everything. 

 

 

Thanks to the unique design, the AG Shield can be carried in multiple ways, allowing you to adapt to high-stress situations quickly and adeptly:

  • Harness – The double-sided harness allows you to wear the shield over your body as you would a traditional bulletproof vest, giving you hands-free protection.
  • Handheld – Each of the two shields features quick-access hand straps securely mounted on the rear, allowing you to rapidly deploy and hold your protection like a traditional shield.
  • Stowed – With a slimline design, the shield can also be stored discreetly in a backpack for easier transportation and quick access. It also turns a regular backpack into a ballistic shield, for instant protection in school or workplace shootings. 

 

 

With the AG Shield, you can go anywhere with confidence, knowing that science is on your side.

AG Shield is made with Kevlar® by DuPont™ –

the most respected name in ballistics – and has NIJ Level IIIA certification. 

 

This certification means that it has been independently tested and confirmed to offer the highest level of protection available in soft body armor products. In fact, most personal body armor worn by law enforcement is only rated II or IIA.

To put this in real terms, this anti-ballistic material is resistant to nearly all handgun ammunition including

  • .22SR,
  • .22LR
  • .25,
  • .32,
  • .38,
  • .380,
  • .357 Magnum,
  • 9mm Full Metal Jacket,
  • .40 Cal.,
  • .45cal. and
  • .44 Magnum

 

It is also stab, slice, and puncture-resistant.

 

No matter how they come at you, they won’t get through the AG Shield. 

 

 


Every Single Day in the US, More than 300 People Are Shot

In 2019, there were 14,400 gun-related homicides in the United States. Every single day in the US, more than 300 people are shot, with over 100 killed.

According to the President, gun violence is an epidemic.

While gun violence is prevalent, don’t forget about the other threats that hang over us, such as terrorism, knife crime, and other savage attacks. It’s enough to make you never want to leave your home again.

But staying home isn’t an option.

You have a job to do, your kids have school, and you all have lives to live.

It’s time to give yourself and your loved ones some peace of mind as you live the life you want. 

It’s time for a game-changing personal defence mechanism. 

 

 

 

Plus, we offer FREE SHIPPING to the USA. 

Disclaimer: International shipping is only available if the customer's country allows this kind of product is to be sold there.  We have the authority to decline shipment to the said country if it does not comply with local laws and issue a full refund.

 

AG Shield Disclaimer: 

AGSHIELD tests all its products in line with the standards outlined by the US National Institute of Justice. All of our products are tested in certified laboratory conditions. We guarantee that our products will meet the appropriate standards of testing and safety, but we can never guarantee 100% protection, as body armor protection is never 100% guaranteed. AGSHIELD cannot be held responsible for any injuries incurred during the wearing of protective clothing. The product you purchase is guaranteed to meet appropriate standards of testing and quality however and will offer protection up to and including the weapons and/or ammunition outlined in the official documentation. Body armor can only protect against threats outlined at its respective level and cannot protect against any weapons and/or ammunition at a higher level. All AGSHIELD products are guaranteed to meet the appropriate standards of testing and safety. AGSHIELD is not liable for any injuries you sustain while wearing body armor.

story:
The Bummer

On Thursday, June 26th, our Austin City Council, dismissing any and all concerns of rail advocates and the community, voted 7-0 to approve the Project Connect urban rail plan. This is a $1.4 billion 9.5 mile route from one speculative growth area to another, through a what planners termed a "no man's land" on the east side of UT campus. More than $400 million in mostly highway intersection projects were bundled with the rail package. Council meets again on August 7, 2014 to consider bond language for the November election. The brutal details can be found at OurRail.org.

Austin can build tracks within a ten minute walk of a third of all the jobs in this city, or it can choose to be symbolic. Many people have already made that choice. UT Student Government, non-profits, planning bodies, and neighborhood organizations serving over 100,000 Austinites have formally endorsed a light rail alignment in the Guadalupe-North Lamar corridor. At twice the jobs, twice the ridership, and 17% more people NOW than is estimated to live on the Project Connect route in 2030, Guadalupe-North Lamar is the city's strongest corridor. And, we are here to stay. 

Plan B is Alive and Well

On June 26, 2014, Austin City Council failed to schedule a public hearing and voted to limit testimony before plan approval to essentially silence opposition. This is a product of desperation, of a siege mentality. The acts illustrate how weak and indefensible the Project Connect plan is. The public has been told that there is no plan b in no uncertain terms, "Rail or Fail." But, the conduct of council demonstrates that, not only is there a bright future for urban rail after November, that future is just not theirs to control anymore. Plan A, Mueller and son-of-Mueller has been under their control for over 14 years. Trains are made to make people's lives easier, not line the pockets of developers. Enough is enough!

Why Did We Have to Bring Up Money?

We are an opposition campaign. We are intent on defeating the Project Connect/2014 Strategic Mobility Plan bond measure in a manner that leaves no question of what needs to be done by the new council to fix that plan, We can't do it without money. Great campaign materials and creative ideas leveraging social media have been developed, but we lack the resources to produce and deliver them.

Fundraising itself takes money, and Our Rail needs capacity in this area. We have seeded a lean operation so far, and the accounts and organization are in place, so we're ready! The opposition in the 2000 campaign was outspent 25-to-1 and yet prevailed. We anticipate the coming campaign will be even more asymmetric as business groups coalesce their support around the highway projects in the package. 

Who We Are

City Council eliminated the Lamar sub-corridor from phase 2 of the study  on December 12, 2013, A group of advocates began a series of meetings during the holidays to discuss political opposition to a future bond measure containing Project Connect's recommendation. Members of the founding group were Scott Morris, Andrew Clements, Roger Baker, Lyndon Henry and Dave Dobbs. On January 2, 2014, a purpose statement was developed to establish Our Rail, a political action committee promoting a fair and effective first light rail investment. The group has grown from that original five, and they are all unpaid volunteers. 

We SUPPORT the redesignation of Guadalupe-North Lamar as a top priority for building the city's first LIGHT RAIL alignment. We will OPPOSE any ballot measure that contains light rail service to the speculative and duplicative Highland sub-corridor. We SUPPORT concurrent construction of any extension such as EAST RIVERSIDE which connects to Guadalupe-North Lamar alignment via a lake crossing that makes sense. We will OPPOSE a Project Connect plans in lieu of rail such as a proposed $500 million MetroRapid busway that threatens the livability and future of light rail on Guadalupe-North Lamar.

Policymakers refused to listen, and the people have taken this back.

------------------------

Paid Political Ad by Our Rail Political Action Committee, Scott Morris Treasurer
P.O. Box 49166 Austin, TX 78765

story:
Introducing the Altitude Billfold Wallet

Your shoes, clothing, and bags have all been modernized with technical materials. The Altitude Billfold is the missing link that completes your wardrobe with the most technically advanced premium wallet— engineered for active lifestyles and perfected for international travel.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We are bag and wallet industry veterans, having designed for brands like Nike, Black Diamond Equipment, Brooks England, and Levi’s Commuter. We have taken our knowledge of technical fabrics and applied it to a new generation of wallets. With your support we hope to bring our designs to a larger audience and help fund further development into defining the future of carry.

Designers, not businessmen. 

We are designers and athletes. We left the cubicle to launch Pioneer and create beautiful wallets that change old perceptions of what a wallet should be. We are passionate boot-strappers who focus entirely on physical product. Kickstarter will allow us to raise funds to keep our heads down and develop even more new products and get more feedback from users to push the envelope even further into the world of advanced technical products.

See you out there with a Pioneer Altitude Wallet! Thanks for your support!

story:
Upcycling fashion is part of sustainable living and upcycling is essential to express our feeling of fashion. The idea started with harem pants, that was made by combining two trousers. We called these new pants both office ninja pants and Buda pants. We evolved idea of traditional patterned and bright harem pants ,mostly worn by women,  to give chance for men who works in offices (not only) to wear something more exciting or alternative to suit pants. We combined two traditional suit pants and made them as comfortable and good looking as traditional harem pants.

Every and each piece of Ulmanpants are unique and one of kind!

Ulmanpants are unisex or even multisex pants which looks good mostly with everything. Ulmanpants are suitable for office work, it is also easy to snowboard with them or even do splits. I guarantee we have checked it!

We offer a alternative look to traditional everyday pants!  

Ulmanpants offers different products such as shorts, exclusive ethnic pants with traditional Latvian skirt textiles made from wool or cotton, kids pants, and our this summer product -  linen dress shirt from two linen trousers.

Linen dress shirt idea and pattern comes from Ruta aunts father, who's dress shirt from 1950-ties has been saved and left as inheritance, together with found old shirts while cleaning attic in just obtained country house. These all dress shirts are with historical value, and nice patterns. We improved pattern a little bit, only to adjust to upcycling idea!

Ulmanpants name originates from one of the owners Karlis surname. It is quite known surname in Latvia, for example two of our presidents has had one. 

"Ull" from liv (finnougric language) language means crazy in kind of god way and man - as people, so we stick  to the crazy people!

We are what we do and love

  • We are two Ruta and Karlis. Ruta is PR specialist with education in art history and love of sewing and design. Karlis is professional graphic designer with love to fashion. For 3 months we live in country side.
  • At the moment Ulmanpants are sold in four shops in Riga. However from the very start Ulmanpantswere are found at etsy.com/Ulmanpants from were they are shipped to USA, UK, Australia, New Zealand, Russia, Japan,Sweden, Norway etc.
  • We started our family business in 2011, and before 2013 all orders we had was carried out by us. Since 2013 sometimes in biggest projects we collaborate with seamstress who helps us out a lot.
  • The materials for our pants are mostly from second hand or charity shops in Riga and Vecumnieki. Some pants are donated to us, from our friends or customers. 
  • We are proud of our first great fashion show "Uzins" in Riga in 27 June 2014. Show was reflected in Latvian media and caused great interest in local society.

  • For last couple years we have participated in different markets and festivals. One of festivals we have participated for last three years is “Positivus”, the biggest music festival in Baltics.

  • We have actively worked on our publicity these last two years and now information and articles about Ulmanpants are published in women and business magazines, stories about our products are shown on television and they have been topic of different radioprogramms, etc. Also Ulmanpants are used to dress TV faces and celebrities.

  • In spring 2015 we had great photo shot with by great photographer Arturs Kondrats and with great models-famous basketball player and boxer Kaspars Kambala and TV face Marta Selecka.

What is our plan
Our main goal is to expand our production, giving possibility to offer full time job to seamstress.  It is very important to us to make our product locally, but we are eager to offer our product internationally!

At start of  October we will take part in international design fair Design Isle 2015 in Riga which for the third time will gather together more than 190 designers from all over the Baltic States showing good local design.

This year we plan to develop new product – coat made from blankets. 

In due time we plan to sell our products in upcycling shops and fashion boutiques in Berlin, Tallinn  and Oslo. We have already contacted some of possible retailers there. However we plan to expand our production by offering regular collections in  shops.

Having photo shoots of products, having promotional activities, and more and more being showed in international society. Products will end up in our Etsy shop.

Ulmanpants as brand is ready to expand!

We asking for your support and 15150 eur will help us to achieve following:

  • To give permanent job and produce  Ulmanpants products in bigger amounts (winter edition, new product-coat)
  • To get suitable and proffesional sewing eqipement for daily work 
  • Reach out to new markets (through travels to possible shops,trade shows, through etsy web store).
Used materials

We use pants, textile leftovers, curtains, skirts etc. materials that still looks good, feels good and are in usable condition.

How to order

1. Find your perk and read description

3. Check your measurements and find your size (size guides below and in gallery)

4. Add some sizes if asked

5. Choose type of textile and pattern (from picture below and in gallery)

6. Choose colors

For pants (color varies in all shades):

  • black 
  • grey 
  • green 
  • blue
  • brown 
  • light

For dress shirt:

  • snow white
  • natural
  • black
For ethnic pants gore:
  • choose 1 of 6 ethnic textile patterns for your gore


Rewards

Timeline

  • 28th September - Indiegogo campaign launches
  • 2nd-4th October - Taking part in international Design fair trade
  • 17th October - Campaign closes
  • October/November - Seeking for materials, gathering, choosing, buying best equipment
  • End of October/November - Ordering ethnic textiles, thank you e-mails
  • End of October/January - Ulmanpants products are made
  • November/December - Production of home designed and silkscreen printed t-shirts
  • From end of October - Orders shipped to you, first early birds
  • November/January - Work to new product-coat
  • January or earlier - Presentation  and delivery of coat
  • January/March - travels to Berlin, Tallin, Oslo
  • Till end of January - all rewards shipped

This is the right to time to expand, we have gained some experience and we are ready for new one!

upcycling is essential to express our feeling of fashion. The
idea started with harem pants, that was made by combining two trousers. We
called these new pants both office ninja pants and Buda pants. We evolved idea of traditional patterned and bright harem pants ,mostly worn by women,  to give chance for men
who works in offices (not only) to wear
something more exciting or alternative to suit pants. We combined two traditional suit pants and made them as comfortable and good looking as traditional harem pants.Every and each piece of Ulmanpants are unique and one of kind!Ulmanpants are unisex or even multisex pants which looks good mostly with everything. Ulmanpants are suitable for office work, it is also easy to snowboard with them or even do splits. I guarantee we have checked it!

We offer a alternative look to traditional everyday pants!  
Ulmanpants offers different products such as shorts, exclusive ethnic
pants with traditional Latvian skirt textiles made from wool or cotton,
kids pants, and our this summer product -  linen dress shirt from two linen trousers.Linen dress shirt idea and pattern comes from Ruta aunts father, who's dress shirt from 1950-ties has been saved and left as inheritance, together with found old shirts while cleaning attic in just obtained country house. These all dress shirts are with historical value, and nice patterns. We improved pattern a little bit, only to adjust to upcycling idea!
Ulmanpants name originates from one of the owners Karlis surname. It is quite known surname in Latvia, for example two of our presidents has had one. 
"Ull" from liv (finnougric language) language means crazy in kind of god way and man - as people, so we stick  to the crazy people!




We are what we do and love


We are two Ruta and Karlis. Ruta is PR specialist with education in art history and love of sewing and design. Karlis is professional graphic designer with love to fashion. For 3 months we live in country side.

At the moment Ulmanpants are sold in four shops in
     Riga. However from the very start Ulmanpantswere are found at etsy.com/Ulmanpants from
     were they are shipped to USA, UK, Australia, New Zealand, Russia,
     Japan,Sweden, Norway etc.


We started our family business in 2011, and
     before 2013 all orders we had was carried out by us. Since 2013 sometimes in biggest projects we
     collaborate with seamstress who helps us out a lot.

The materials for our pants are mostly from second hand or charity shops in Riga and Vecumnieki. Some pants are donated to us, from our friends or customers. 


We are proud of our first great fashion show "Uzins" in Riga in 27 June 2014. Show was reflected in Latvian media and caused
     great interest in local society.

For
     last couple years we have participated in different markets and festivals. One of festivals we have participated for last three years is
     “Positivus”, the biggest music festival in Baltics.
We have
     actively worked on our publicity these last two years and now information
     and articles about Ulmanpants are published in women
     and business magazines, stories about our products are
     shown on television and they have been topic of different radioprogramms, etc.
     Also Ulmanpants are used to dress TV faces and celebrities.
In spring 2015 we had great photo shot with by great photographer Arturs Kondrats and with great models-famous basketball player and boxer Kaspars Kambala and TV face Marta Selecka.



What is our plan


Our main goal is to expand our production, giving possibility to offer full time job to seamstress.  It is very important
to us to make our product locally, but we are eager to offer our product
internationally!



At
start of  October we will take part
in international design fair Design Isle 2015 in Riga which for the third
time will gather together more than 190 designers from all over the
Baltic States showing good local design.






This year we plan to
develop new product – coat made from blankets. 
In due time we plan to sell
our products in upcycling shops and fashion boutiques in Berlin, Tallinn  and
Oslo. We have already contacted some of possible retailers there. However we plan to expand our production by offering regular collections in  shops. 
Having photo shoots of products, having
promotional activities, and more and more being showed in international
society. Products will end up in our Etsy shop.



Ulmanpants as brand is ready to expand!

We
asking for your support and 15150 eur will help us to achieve following:



To give permanent job and produce  Ulmanpants products in bigger amounts (winter edition, new product-coat)
To get suitable and proffesional sewing eqipement for daily work 
Reach out to new markets (through travels to possible shops,trade
     shows, through etsy web store).
 

Used materials


We use pants, textile leftovers, curtains, skirts etc. materials that still looks good, feels good and are in usable condition.


How to order

1. Find your perk and read description
3. Check your measurements and find your size (size guides below and in gallery)
4. Add some sizes if asked


5. Choose type of textile and pattern (from picture below and in gallery)








6. Choose colors
For pants (color varies in all shades):


black 
grey 
green 
blue
brown 
light


For dress shirt:


snow white
natural
black

For ethnic pants gore:




choose 1 of 6 ethnic textile patterns for your gore






Rewards



Timeline


28th September - Indiegogo campaign launches

2nd-4th October - Taking part in international Design fair trade


17th October - Campaign closes


October/November - Seeking for materials, gathering, choosing, buying best equipment
End of October/November - Ordering ethnic textiles, thank you e-mails
End of October/January - Ulmanpants products are made
November/December - Production of home designed and silkscreen printed t-shirts
From end of October - Orders shipped to you, first early birds
November/January - Work to new product-coat
January or earlier - Presentation  and delivery of coat
January/March - travels to Berlin, Tallin, Oslo
Till end of January - all rewards shipped

This is the right to time to expand, we have gained some experience and we are ready for new one!

story:
Short Summary about Hadascha

  Founded in late 2012, Hadascha’s collections are created to be timeless; with impeccable fabric, effortless and sultry style, allowing her clientele to make a strong fashion statement. The brand is created to fill suitcases and closets with luxurious garments. The designer has shown her collections at Orlando Fashion Week, Miami Fashion show, Atlanta Haitian Consulate Fashion Show, Raw Orlando (winner for Raw Orlando Fashion Designer of the Year), Awaken Magazine Fashion Show and Fashion Week Las Vegas. Since then the brand has attracted press.

Vegas has invited the return of Hadascha again in February 2014 (17th-21st) to showcase her Fiona by Hadascha Luxury Yacht Capsule Collection at the 4th season Fashion Week Las Vegas. This collection is dedicated to the late Fiona Carter, a beautiful friend and former fashion designer. So the story behind this collection is “The Year is 1969, Fiona Carter goes to St. Tropez”. I know she would have been proud. I pray that I make her family and close friends proud. The emerging resort wear brand needs your help to go to Vegas to showcase the new capsule collection and God willing to be viewed by buyers.

I’m so grateful for this platform so that hard working artist can grow their businesses. The selfless act of helping someone else achieve their goals is beautiful, I love the fact that I can give you something from my brand in return and show you that your investment is working. Thank you, and I can’t wait to show you the runway show and give you your gifts from the Hadascha brand. See you in Vegas!


Fashion Week Las Vegas Cost Break down

Fashion Show Fee

Plane tickets for the team

Hotel stay

Hadascha Banners

The Hadascha Short Film (Videographer, makeup artist, hair stylist, location)

Luxury Look books (photographer, makeup artist, hair stylist, location)

Fashion Buyers lounge

(Local Orlando Magazine) Advertisement

View the collection on the runway from Fashion Week Las Vegas in August
2013
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W8_AAb8fpnk


View the short film of Hadascha Luxury Resort Wear
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x47Aey3uoQ8



The exclusive campaign photographs will be printed out either on photo paper or on canvas depending on your pledge. We are so excited to give you these!  Here are samples:



 
Articles

http://kreyolicious.com/fashion-designer-hadascha-brutus-on-having-drive-and-passion/12883/

http://lunionsuite.com/2012/11/12/haitian-designer-hadaschas-luxury-resort-wear/

http://nijimagazine.com/2012/10/travel-to-a-new-world-with-hadascha/

http://www.lakemarylife.com/articles/wear-to-next/

http://www.sentinel.ht/lifestyles/photos/fashion-a-beauty/4973-hadascha-presents-resort-wear-collection-at-las-vegas-fashion-week

http://www.examiner.com/article/fashion-week-las-vegas-holds-swim-and-resort-wear-shows


Other Ways You Can Help

Please share via Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and Email. We appreciate the love and the support. Thank you!

story:
OR Visit our website www.mvmtwatches.com

 

 

International Shipping Costs - You must add it to your contribution. If you forgot to do so, choose the $1 perk and contribute the proper amount.

ONE watch - $12.00

TWO watches - $16.00

SIX watches -$25.00

To PURCHASE a watch, click one of the perks to the right --> 

View our original campaign here- 

http://igg.me/at/mvmt/x/3545745

Thank you in advance for checking out our IndieGogo page, we truly appreciate all the support.

What's with the MVMT?

Our team sought out to create MVMT because of our passion for watches and desire to cut out the brand inflation and retail markup of popular name brands.  We got frustrated paying hundreds of dollars for name brand watches, knowing they only cost a fraction of the price to make.  We have spent the past year working with leaders in the industry to come up with an affordable, stylish looking watch collection that we know everyone will love.

When designing this watch collection, we made sure of THREE details:

  • A minimalist look that could be worn in a casual or professional setting.
  • The highest quality materials.
  • Offering the watches at a price less than half what our competitor's cost.

 

The MVMT Collection

For our first collection, we are offering SIX different models to choose from.

 

 

MVMT is also backed with a warranty.

We are so confident with the quality and durability of our watches, that if something were to happen within the first 2 years, we hope you will send it back to us.  Warranty includes all internal parts of the watch.

Warranty does not cover:  

  • The life of the battery 
  • Wear and tear and aging (e.g. scratched crystal; alteration of the color and/or material of non metallic straps and chains, such as leather, textile, rubber; peeling of the plating) 
  • Any damage on any part of the watch resulting from abnormal/abusive use, lack of care, negligence, accidents (knocks dents, crushing, broken crystal, etc.) 

Where is the MVMT headed?

We want a full line of different types and styled watches that stay at an AFFORDABLE cost. So join with us on this journey and be apart of it every step of the way.  We will send out several updates throughout the entire process making sure our backers are up-to-date on any important information.  We want to create a bond, a synergy with our backers, because ultimately you are the ones turning our dream into a reality.  We are excited to grow and anxious to see what the future has in store for us.

Who is the team and how did it all start?

Started by young entrepreneurs and watch enthusiasts Jake, and Kramer sought to cut out the brand inflation and retail markup of popular name brands. We have been obsessed with watches our entire life and got fed up paying for overpriced name brand watches. So now we're doing it ourselves. We started as friends, became roommates, and are now hoping to become business partners. 

Watch Specifications:

Case Material:  316L Carbon Stainless Steel
Case Diameter: 45 mm
Face Diameter: 40 mm
Bezel Width: 2.5 mm
Band Material: 316L Carbon Stainless Steel/Leather
Band Width: 24 mm
Clasp: Pushbutton Deployment Clasp
Clasp Material: 316L Carbon Stainless Steel
Dial Window Material: Crystal Mineral Glass
Display: Analog
Movement: Japanese Quartz
Date Function: Yes

Water Resistant: 3 ATM

Now we're here, on IndieGogo, with a fully functional prototype that looks amazing. We just need one more thing... your support!

 

We Need Your Support!

In order to turn this dream of ours into a reality, we need your support. Not only does this mean pledging for one of our awesome watches, but sharing the story with a friend. The important thing to remember with IndieGogo is, if we don't reach our full funding goal....we get nothing. 

We are going to do everything we can to spread the word in a variety of ways.  We hope through the use of social media and blogs we can drive enough outside traffic to our page which will result in us reaching our funding goal.  If you could do something as simple as tweeting about our page, or just liking our Facebook page, it can really go a long way. Simply click the Facebook and Twitter tabs at the top ^ of the page, right below the video.

If funded, how will you fulfill the orders?

We've tweaked the initial prototype, finalized our design, purchased the molds and selected a manufacturer that has a great reputation in the industry.  Once Indiegogo releases the funds, we can pay the initial deposit to begin production.  Production time takes roughly 30 days depending on the quantity of the order.  Our team will then ship the orders to our awesome backers! We have experience with shipping software and thermal printers which should make for a very smooth process. 

(It is TIME for the MVMT)

From all of us here at MVMT, thanks for helping us kickstart this project.

 

Risks and challenges

The challenges of MVMT Watches will be getting the word out, and convincing IndieGogos to participate. With so many great projects to choose from, we hope ours will stand apart from the rest. To reach as many people as possible, we are asking friends, families, and various blogs to help spread the word.

Once the funding is in place, the challenge will be producing on a large scale. Depending on outside help is difficult, but we have been dealing with a manufacturer for months and have established a solid relationship, which has has given us a lot of confidence in them.

To reach as many people as possible, we are asking friends, families, and various blogs to help spread the word.
Once the funding is in place, the challenge will be producing on a large scale. Depending on outside help is difficult, but we have been dealing with a manufacturer for months and have established a solid relationship, which has has given us a lot of confidence in them.

story:
Vosk Shoes is a proudly South African brand on a mission to improve the lives of less fortunate children. With every pair of Vosk Shoes purchased, we will give a new pair of shoes to a child in need.

By giving shoes to these children we enable them to attend school, play sports, protect them from cuts and bruises, infections and soil transmitted diseases. These shoes represent hope and opportunity in the lives of these children and you have the power to make that difference. When you buy a pair of Vosk Shoes you directly put a new pair of shoes on the feet of a child who desperately needs a pair.






Vosk Shoes was established in 2013. We achieved great success by selling an imported shoe to the South African community and made an impact on so many children’s lives. We have tested the market and built relationships with communities and charities and are now ready for our next adventure. 

The answer was to bring production of a newly designed shoe to South Africa, create jobs and contribute to the South African economy. We believe that a locally designed and manufactured shoe will create more interest and thus help us to achieve our main goal - giving all the children in need a new pair of shoes. 



Vosk Shoes are designed to be simple, comfortable and stylish. A shoe that will attract and suit everyone. 


Our shoes are made of canvas with a natural rubber sole and will initially come in 4 colours. 

We are currently setting up our manufacturing in South Africa so we can directly contribute to our economy. Our shoes range from UK Size 3 - UK Size 12. 
Free Shipping in South Africa.


BECOME PART OF THE BRAND


Vosk Shoes will partner and collaborate with various South African artists, brands, musicians and individuals to create and design the coolest shoes in Africa. A concept that will help us sell more shoes and thus enable us to give more shoes to children in need. We have specifically designed our shoes as simple as possible so we can have a "blank canvas" to play with. We want everyone to feel part of Vosk Shoes.



Vosk Shoes has partnered with Samaritan’s Feet who help us establish long and sustainable relationships with the communities in need.

We love spending time with these children. With every giving trip we wash the children's feet and get to spend quality time with them. We ask about their dreams, their lives and give them words of wisdom and hope for the future.



We know that children grow fast and that shoes don't last forever. This is why we will return to each community at least once a year so we can serve these kids as they grow.

WHY SHOES?

Shoes are symbolic of pride and give confidence to young learners knowing that they can walk to school in comfort, as opposed to barefoot. Many times children cannot attend school barefoot because shoes are a school uniform necessity. Shoes are also a vital protection barrier between our children’s tiny soles and Africa’s rough and unforgiving terrain.


The shoes will protect them from:

  • Cuts and bruises that can lead to infection

  • Soil transmitted diseases

  • Hookworm

  • Elephantitis

  • Insect bites

  • Fungus



    To help us achieve our goal we need the funds to produce Vosk Shoes.

    We’ve done all the hard work. Now it’s purely production and fulfillment.

    With your contribution, you not only get a pair of Vosk Shoes but you will have a big impact on a child’s life. 





    INTERESTED INVESTORS CAN CONTACT WESLEY AT WESLEY@VOSK.CO.ZA

story:
Corsets, Latex, Lingerie... So What?

Hello from Cinched Tight and thank you for considering our funding initiative. We are trying to raise $750 in funds to offset some of the costs of our upcoming appearance at TORONTO ARTS & FASHION WEEK 2013. We are a boutique studio creating Corsets, Latex and Lingerie and we will be bringing a collection to the stage on April 27th 2013 as part of this annual alternative fashion event.

 

And right about now you are asking yourself, “so what, why is this important?”

 

We believe that this is important for three key reasons, and we hope that once we've explained a bit, you'll agree enough to fund us with a small donation, or by sharing the campaign.

 

#1: Clothing is Important

We may not think about it deeply every day (or we might) but clothing really is important. What you wear shapes how others see you, and how you see yourself. In effect what you wear shapes who you appear to be, and how you are treated in this world.

 

We believe that you need to celebrate your shape. We believe that dignity, freedom of expression, self-esteem and even your safety are directly affected by what you wear, and we believe that we can create clothing that helps improve the conversation we are having about these ideas.

  • It's still considered acceptable that a woman's safety is tied to her choice of clothing.

  • It's still commonplace for women with figures that fall outside of the accepted norm to hate, or even harm themselves.

  • Society seems to agree that beauty is the domain of the young.

 

These things need to change. We don't believe that we alone can change these ideas, but we do believe that by partnering our designs with an event like Toronto Arts and Fashion Week we can continue pushing these conversations to the front page.

 

#2 We Need A Stage – We Need This Stage

This conversation needs a venue and the best venue for a conversation involving fashion is a fashion show. We couldn't be more excited to have the unique opportunity to return to Toronto Arts and Fashion Week this year after being recognized by the Toronto Standard as one of the 5 most outrageous moments of 2012.

Toronto Arts and Fashion Week, as the name suggests, is a week long event featuring designers, photographers and artists with a focus on fashion. In short, this is the conversation; this is a space where people are talking about what fashion is, and what that means to each of us. Toronto Arts and Fashion Week has become respected in Toronto as the place to explore alternative fashion ideas and the media is taking notice. Last year the event was covered by most, if not all, of the major Canadian media outlets with a fashion editorial desk.

 

So Toronto Arts and Fashion Week represents a win win for Cinched Tight. This is the venue where we need to be raising these questions, increasing the focus on this dialogue, and this is a venue that is providing exactly that same benefit to a large number of very talented and noteworthy alternative fashion artists; people looking to have the same conversation. By supporting Toronto Arts and Fashion Week we bring our backing and message to support the event.

Part of the money we are trying to raise is our admission cost to Toronto Arts and Fashion Week, which is a very reasonable $600.00 for 10 looks. More mainstream events such as L'Oreal Fashion Week charge thousands of dollars, making those events simply unattainable for the forward thinking smaller studios like ourselves. However, these studios are the face of the future, the face of a positive change.

Our admission fee covers advertising and administration fees for the event as well as fees associated with the fashion show itself. Again, by aligning ourselves with, and supporting, Toronto Arts and Fashion Week we are able to bring our message to a much wider audience while making it possible for many small studios to reach that same audience. Everybody wins.

 

#3 We Can't Do It Alone

This is a conversation that takes many voices. This year we have been honoured to be supported by 10 fantastic models, each of whom bring a unique beauty to the stage, each defying traditional standards. We have created brand new exciting looks for this event and we are in the process of building these looks in our studio.

 

And we have the incredible venue of Toronto Arts and Fashion Week.

 

All we need now is you. We need you to get involved in this conversation. How you take part is up to you. At the very least we'd like you to think about what beauty, fashion and clothing means to you. We want you to think about the question of why the media definition of beauty is more valid than your definition. We want you to think about expressing yourself through clothing and why the idea of being yourself is still scary to some people. We want you to think about where your clothing comes from, the ethics of creating the clothing you wear as well as the effect of wearing it.

 

And we want you to join the Celebration. Whether you wear something from our studio, or not, find a piece in your wardrobe that makes you feel great and wear it with pride. Celebrate your shape, celebrate the way that makes you feel. Allow yourself to feel great about the way you look today.

And if you can do that, if you agree with our message and think it needs to be heard, then we need you to help us make our runway show at Toronto Arts and Fashion Week this year a reality. In fact, if you agree with our message then you need you to help make this show possible.

If you choose to support our funding drive this is what you'll be buying into:

  • You'll help with our costs for fabrics materials and R&D time on the new collection

  • You'll help cover our admission costs for this event which will cover Hair and Make-up for the night of the event as well as advertising, venue rental and administration fees for the event. Many of these fees also help our fellow artists in the alternative fashion community.

  • An important message about who we are as a community, what we believe and how we treat each other

  • The fantastic feeling of helping a cause you believe in, and joining in the celebration.

 

What You Get

Every contribution to our campaign is much needed funding and an essential statement that you agree with our message, that clothing can help shape a compassionate, dignified, safe and beautiful future for all of us.

If you can take that last step of funding our event, we want to thank you as much as we can so we have created a series of perks that we hope will say thank you and be rewarding. Please know that the biggest perk you get from funding us is the chance to help us bring change with our mission and the work our studio does to create ethically funded clothing that dares to Celebrate Your Shape.
story_txt:
Corsets, Latex, Lingerie... So What?
 Hello from Cinched Tight and thank you for considering our funding initiative. We are trying to raise $750 in funds to offset some of the costs of our upcoming appearance at TORONTO ARTS & FASHION WEEK 2013. We are a boutique studio creating Corsets, Latex and Lingerie and we will be bringing a collection to the stage on April 27th 2013 as part of this annual alternative fashion event.
 
 And right about now you are asking yourself, “so what, why is this important?” 
 
 We believe that this is important for three key reasons, and we hope that once we've explained a bit, you'll agree enough to fund us with a small donation, or by sharing the campaign.
 
#1: Clothing is Important
We may not think about it deeply every day (or we might) but clothing really is important. What you wear shapes how others see you, and how you see yourself. In effect what you wear shapes who you appear to be, and how you are treated in this world.
 
 We believe that you need to celebrate your shape. We believe that dignity, freedom of expression, self-esteem and even your safety are directly affected by what you wear, and we believe that we can create clothing that helps improve the conversation we are having about these ideas.


It's still considered acceptable that a woman's safety is tied to her choice of clothing.


It's still commonplace for women with figures that fall outside of the accepted norm to hate, or even harm themselves.


Society seems to agree that beauty is the domain of the young.

 
 These things need to change. We don't believe that we alone can change these ideas, but we do believe that by partnering our designs with an event like Toronto Arts and Fashion Week we can continue pushing these conversations to the front page.
 
#2 We Need A Stage – We Need This Stage
 This conversation needs a venue and the best venue for a conversation involving fashion is a fashion show. We couldn't be more excited to have the unique opportunity to return to Toronto Arts and Fashion Week this year after being recognized by the Toronto Standard as one of the 5 most outrageous moments of 2012. 
 Toronto Arts and Fashion Week, as the name suggests, is a week long event featuring designers, photographers and artists with a focus on fashion. In short, this is the conversation; this is a space where people are talking about what fashion is, and what that means to each of us. Toronto Arts and Fashion Week has become respected in Toronto as the place to explore alternative fashion ideas and the media is taking notice. Last year the event was covered by most, if not all, of the major Canadian media outlets with a fashion editorial desk.
 
 So Toronto Arts and Fashion Week represents a win win for Cinched Tight. This is the venue where we need to be raising these questions, increasing the focus on this dialogue, and this is a venue that is providing exactly that same benefit to a large number of very talented and noteworthy alternative fashion artists; people looking to have the same conversation. By supporting Toronto Arts and Fashion Week we bring our backing and message to support the event.

More mainstream events such as L'Oreal Fashion Week charge thousands of dollars, making those events simply unattainable for the forward thinking smaller studios like ourselves. However, these studios are the face of the future, the face of a positive change.
 Our admission fee covers advertising and administration fees for the event as well as fees associated with the fashion show itself. Again, by aligning ourselves with, and supporting, Toronto Arts and Fashion Week we are able to bring our message to a much wider audience while making it possible for many small studios to reach that same audience. Everybody wins.
 
#3 We Can't Do It Alone
This is a conversation that takes many voices. This year we have been honoured to be supported by 10 fantastic models, each of whom bring a unique beauty to the stage, each defying traditional standards. We have created brand new exciting looks for this event and we are in the process of building these looks in our studio.

At the very least we'd like you to think about what beauty, fashion and clothing means to you. We want you to think about the question of why the media definition of beauty is more valid than your definition. We want you to think about expressing yourself through clothing and why the idea of being yourself is still scary to some people. We want you to think about where your clothing comes from, the ethics of creating the clothing you wear as well as the effect of wearing it.
 
 And we want you to join the Celebration. Whether you wear something from our studio, or not, find a piece in your wardrobe that makes you feel great and wear it with pride. Celebrate your shape, celebrate the way that makes you feel. Allow yourself to feel great about the way you look today. And if you can do that, if you agree with our message and think it needs to be heard, then we need you to help us make our runway show at Toronto Arts and Fashion Week this year a reality. In fact, if you agree with our message then you need you to help make this show possible. If you choose to support our funding drive this is what you'll be buying into:


You'll help with our costs for fabrics materials and R&D time on the new collection


You'll help cover our admission costs for this event which will cover Hair and Make-up for the night of the event as well as advertising, venue rental and administration fees for the event. Many of these fees also help our fellow artists in the alternative fashion community.


An important message about who we are as a community, what we believe and how we treat each other


The fantastic feeling of helping a cause you believe in, and joining in the celebration.

 
What You Get
Every contribution to our campaign is much needed funding and an essential statement that you agree with our message, that clothing can help shape a compassionate, dignified, safe and beautiful future for all of us. 
 If you can take that last step of funding our event, we want to thank you as much as we can so we have created a series of perks that we hope will say thank you and be rewarding. Please know that the biggest perk you get from funding us is the chance to help us bring change with our mission and the work our studio does to create ethically funded clothing that dares to Celebrate Your Shape.

story:
Our Story

We are a publishing house of stylish geeks with a quirky sense of humor.  We've sold tee shirt designs to other companies, and have decided to publish some of our own. We're using IndieGoGo to determine our initial print run size, and YouTube and our blog to generate feedback on future designs.


The Impact

The impact of our campaign is a lot of geeks running around with better geeky tee shirts.  Plus, our cats will be happier.  Plus, we're raising enough money off of this to help with the assorted paperwork and other things needed to form an actual business.


If we exceed $16,000 in this campaign (ten times our target), we will contribute $1,600 to the Franklin Fund, an organization dedicated to providing medical services to abandoned or abused animals.  Warning: Clicking that link may make you cry. Or very, very angry...


What We Need & What You Get

If we don't meet the entire goal, we have the funds on hand to print about 50 of each shirt design, but some of the bonuses we plan on adding later may not happen.  


Our estimated costs for producing the shirts, some of our other promotional ideas, and shipping them to customers come out to $1,400.  The remaining $200 is for incorporation fees and similar paperwork


For a $2 contribution, you get a public thank you on our blog, and a "This shirt sponsored by the generous contribution of..." with your name.


For a $23 contribution, you're buying one shirt (please specify the design and the size) at 10% off, plus USPS shipping in the US. 


For a $40 contribution, you're buying two shirts (please specify the design and size for each) at full price, but are getting free shipping.


International contributors should add $6 for shipping and handling.  We added a bonus to cover that.


We have ideas for other promotional items down the road, and will be posting them here regularly.  Please be sure to come back and check what we've got that's new, or visit us at ReagencyDesign.com.


Other Ways You Can Help

We really want to launch this business; we also want to hit that threshold where we contribute to the Franklin Fund. All of our feline overlords came from shelters, and some people in the company have helped rescue abandoned animals in need of medical care. We want to give back, and we want to work for ourselves doing the things we enjoy doing.


You can help with that.  Please promote this on your Twitter feeds, your blogs, your Facebook and Google+ pages, and anywhere else you can think of.  Feel free to contact us with questions, or suggestions, for other ways to promote this and with suggestions for bonuses or promotional items.

story:
***Check out this article about me and my campaign here on SugarNThunder***

~~~~

Hi,

My name is Robin Shumays and I am the founder and designer of hennaflower. hennaflower is a unique couture party dress line with a fun, flirty ethnic edge. This campaign is so that you can help me relaunch my line and present a new collection at Africa Fashion Week in NYC in July!

I’ve always been crafty and I've always been someone who liked to make things pretty! My mom taught me to crochet when I was 4 years old and I started knitting when I was 8. By age 10 I started sewing. Back then I didn’t really take it seriously; it was just a way to make clothes for my dolls. I didn’t think about becoming a designer until 2008. I decided to take sewing lessons from a local designer, the very awesome Sumie Tachibana. Sumie is a super encouraging teacher and friend. She organized a fashion show in early 2009 and invited her students to participate and design a piece for the show. I made a beautiful gown made from silk and a gorgeous vintage Indian sari. Having it walk down the runway was one of the greatest thrills of my life at that point. To my surprise, my dress got picked up by several local fashion blogs. I knew then that becoming a dress design was my passion and my calling.

One thing I didn't mention in my video is that I'm a Middle Eastern Dancer. I started dancing in 1997. I've also studied some Indian Dance and singing. Because of that, I’m heavily influenced by Indian, middle eastern and African culture and textiles. I officially ‘launched’ hennaflower in 2010, with a collection that was bollywood meets old Hollywood. Shortly after that I took a break to become a mommy to my sweet daughter Mehrunnisa.

Now I’m back and looking to relaunch hennaflower with a inspired collection that marries Africa and French can-can dancers! Dance is never far behind in my thinking! :)

Your contributions will go towards the entrance fee for the fashion show, fabric and notions to finish the collection, new photos, a new website and promotional materials in preparation for the show. In return, you get some super cool perks noted to the right... -->

If you can't contribute monetarily, that's ok! Please just spread the word by posting the link to this campaign on your twitter facebook page or mailing list. :)

Thanks for helping to make my dreams come true.

~~~

Curious about Africa Fashion Week? Check out this CNN report from last year!

http://cnn.com/video/data/2.0/video/international/2011/07/25/ia.african.fashion.disu.bk.a.cnn.html

Want to see more of my work? Check out these photos from my first collection!

story:
Embrace Your Feminine Power!
 
Domina is a new fragrance by Snow Mercy. 
 
Domina is a brand for women who aspire to the philosophy of,  "Embrace Your Feminine Power."  Created by Snow Mercy, a scientist and Dominatrix, and Thomas Coleman Harmon, a marketing and branding entrepreneur, together they have decided to offer this unique fragrance to women. Domina Fragrance is perfect for everyday wear, the office, or a romantic evening.  It is a great scent with fruity components of chilled apple, peach, combined with floral notes of heart of freesia, mimosa, jasmine and tuberose. More products, including a purse-sized fragrance bottle, are on the horizon. 
 
Funds will be used for materials, samples, and bottles to our supporters along with the manufacture first run of 5000 bottles. There will also be more marketing materials (video and print sessions--exciting!) completed. Since Snow Mercy is a brand on her own with a large FB network of followers, marketing reach has already been established. However, for a greater social media reach additional funds will be needed for a presence on Google, etc.
story_txt:

Domina is a brand for women who aspire to the philosophy of,  "Embrace Your Feminine Power."  Created by Snow Mercy, a scientist and Dominatrix, and Thomas Coleman Harmon, a marketing and branding entrepreneur, together they have decided to offer this unique fragrance to women. Domina Fragrance is perfect for everyday wear, the office, or a romantic evening.  It is a great scent with fruity components of chilled apple, peach, combined with floral notes of heart of freesia, mimosa, jasmine and tuberose. More products, including a purse-sized fragrance bottle, are on the horizon. 
 
Funds will be used for materials, samples, and bottles to our supporters along with the manufacture first run of 5000 bottles. There will also be more marketing materials (video and print sessions--exciting!) completed. Since Snow Mercy is a brand on her own with a large FB network of followers, marketing reach has already been established. However, for a greater social media reach additional funds will be needed for a presence on Google, etc.

story:
Origins of GLOD

GLOD, is originated from the Danish word glød, meaning glow. This evocative glow unfolds a vista of infinite inspiration about light to us. Light, as one of the most important elements in Hygge, the Danish way to live well, not only creates an ineffable atmosphere and experience to all of us but also inspires our creations from the very beginning.

We develop the aesthetics of GLOD by capturing the journey of light, using curves, points and lines, the contrast between abstract and tangible shapes at the serendipitous glowing moment.

We illuminate the glow of GLOD by embracing the notion of aura and mythical power from galaxy wonders.

The icon Ø in our logo encapsulates the very essence from glowing light in the Danish spirit of Hygge, meanwhile, as a cosmic symbol, embodies the mythical glow from the nebula.

Here at GLOD, we hope through vivifying our design to ignite the soul-renewing aura power inside each wearer.

 

Perks

 

Meet the Inspiration

Collection 1: Be Light

Putting a halt to time, pieces are inspired by a serendipitous wander through radiant beams, dancing light, glistening flare, and captures the dreamy moment of glow to the poetically abstract details.

The radiant beams design sends out melting warmth to awaken the passionate heart, lighting a path for the imagination to traverse between reality and fantasy.

Pieces with dynamic curves epitomize the minimalist aesthetic derived from dancing light, as elvish as aurora, its buoyant hues can only be seen by luck.

Taking flight from glistening flares, pieces convey shimmering movements through circular geometric forms in layers, whimsically connecting optical space in visual illusion to project a sense of romantic modern chic.

 

Collection 2: Be Aura

Glowing in the deepest dark, this collection indulges in galaxy wonders to cast an enduring and irresistible spell of fantasy.

Deepening the effusive glow is the 7 aura color gems radiate in the charms. You can stack your own, layer your own and style your own by adding iconic mythical symbols and imaginary points and lines in your star chart.

Each aura color presents a distinctive healing rhythm in the dangling charm, like a blazing nebula extending its glow across the galaxy, and bestowing them with youthful energy and splendor.

 

Collection 3: Be Signature

Alighting the intoxicating motions of glow, this collection celebrates the signature motif Ø from our logo.

The motif Ø ignites the reverie with the allure of celestial orbit in eclectic circular composition and lyrical movement, echoing the curiosity of star atlas and planet axis silhouette in our hearts, lifting the imagination beyond earthly beauty.

The triumphant radiance from within comes to life as the immaculate freshwater pearl juxtaposed at the center, uniting the graceful design to melt the hearts of wearers with futuristic and minimalistic touch.

 

Design Details

Multi Wearing Design

We love new inspirations every day, so we want to create something special for you. Certain pieces are designed in a transformable way, they are more than a simple mix and match, but pieces for you to create your own aura.

Iconic Kinetic and Spin Design

The invincible rotation of the pieces conjures the perpetual energy of glowing, offering a glimpse into the secret of a mesmerizing transformation to convey a delicate balance between emotionality and rationality.

Interplay of Multi-color Tones

Sleek yet vivid, the enthralling resonance between yellow gold, white gold and rose gold resembles the varying shades created by the play of light in a transcendent glow.

 

Craftsmanship & Material

Jewelry crafting is an art form created by hands, eyes, and most importantly heart at the same time. Every detail in design is brought to life by our artisans with passion and love. Most of our artisans have spent years honing their art. They are the magicians to visualize the sketch into a piece with functional wearability in terms of size, weight, softness, smoothness and well fitted. And each piece from GLOD is produced in a sustainable and environmental-friendly way.

We understand that price is always a concern for selecting a jewelry. But material cost shouldn’t be the main reason pushing you away from the piece. We want our customers to only think about the design, the story behind, the wearability, and most importantly whether this piece really makes you glow.

We carefully select the most affordable precious metal sterling silver, in its best quality, and plated it with 18K gold to give extra shine and durability. It looks as gorgeous as 18K gold, but cost much less, giving you another reason to make yourself radiant.

Chalcedony is the main material we use in Be Aura collection. It is one of the natural gems known for gentle personality and stable magnetic energy. Chalcedony appears in various color naturally, which we hope can enlighten the energy of aura colors for wearers. Besides chalcedony, optically flawless cubic zirconia has been used to echo the aura glows.

Freshwater pearls are one of the most graceful, feminine and sophisticated material in jewelry design. We use it in Be Signature collection as the immaculate shine from it resembles the triumphant radiance we want to create in our design.

 

Risks & Challenges

Since the beginning of 2018, we have been working towards the launch. Same as any start-up companies, we face various risks and challenges along the road. We have poured our hearts into every single detail as we believe GLOD will glow.

One of the main challenges is how to actualize our design. Some of the pieces can be worn in multiple ways, some consists of kinetic and spinning parts and some are made of different color tones. All these design details need trial and error, and it took us longer time to modify and produce the best samples.

Another struggle is about the choice of materials. We never want to transfer the high material cost to the price that you are paying, thus we have used a lot of time, finding the best materials in terms of cost, color, and properties etc, to balance and present the design in its best aura.

Partnered with the best resources we have now, we expect the pieces to be ready and arrive in your hands during October – November 2018. If there are unforeseeable circumstances, whatever the case may be, you will hear it from us transparently with a solution.

 

Share with Us

We love to hear from you, so feel free to leave us some comments and likes on Facebook and Instagram.

https://www.instagram.com/glodjewelry
https://www.facebook.com/glodjewelry

After you have received our products, please do take photos when wearing them and tag us with #glodjewelry #igniteyouraura, we will be so eager to see how they look on you, and how your aura glows.
