Ecco il sito dove verificare il preventivo delle magliette: http://www.pubblicarrello.com/uomo-tshirt-manic...

story:
The Super-Fly story...

Most peoples’ stories start in their basement or in their garage - Super-Fly Enabling Apparel started in my closet and I have outgrown it.  It is time for me share Super-Fly with the world!


The Clothing

 

Super-Fly Enabling Apparel is a new way of thinking and dressing. Super-Fly offers people with limited mobility style, dignity, comfort and ease. Super-Fly clothing also makes the tasks that caregivers carry out everyday easier, faster and safer.

With zippers running the full length of a garment, the easy on easy off features of Super-Fly greatly reduce the time and physical demand of changing clothes whether standing, sitting, supine or prone. 

Super-Fly Enabling Apparel's full length zippers prevent musculoskeletal trauma by minimizing flexion, extension and rotation on joints that have evidence of muscle atrophy and weak joint capsules that can be vulnerable to injury from hyper mobilization. Super-Fly Enabling Apparel also minimizes pelvic rolling and extension of the torso, helping to prevent sprains and strains.

The Need

The global need for Super-Fly Enabling Apparel is huge. So many people are suffering from limited mobility. Some experience pain everyday when the get dressed. Some don’t bother getting dressed at all anymore.

With your help, Super-Fly Enabling Apparel can start improving the lives of millions of people around the world. 

The Super-Fly Investment To Date

Over the last few months we’ve invested our own funds to:

  • develop samples
  • test products
  • develop sales channels
  • gain feedback and testimonials
  • gather a dedicated team of “doers” and supports
  • prepare the initial business plan
  • incorporate the business
  • develop marketing materials
  • develop the website
Now we need your help.

Super -Fly Challenge II

Here is your second challenge – and, trust us, it’s a lot easier than the first one! Our second challenge is for you to contribute whatever you can to support Super-Fly Enabling Apparel and ultimately help change people’s lives, making the challenges they face every day to be so much easier.

Your contribution will be used to hire the essential staff, complete our website, secure our manufacturer and begin production.

We will be very happy to provide GIFT COUPONS for each Super-Fly purchase to all who contribute to our campaign. 

Indiegogo Campaign

Our Indiegogo campaign will be launched in two phases to raise awareness:

  • Phase 1 - Soft Launch - Test processes and products in marketplace with initial quantities - $55,000
  • Phase 2 - Full Production - Scale up carefully to meet anticipated demand - $275,000

How We Will Use Phase 1 Funds

The $55,000 will mostly be spent on acquiring the initial inventory of products for sale and hiring part-time staff to work with customers to gain critical feedback.

YOUR CONTRIBUTION WILL DO 2 THINGS:

1. Complete our E-Commerce website, hire essential staff, and fund initial orders. 

2. Provide options for fashionable, stylish, enabling clothes for those with limited mobility. This will calm frustration, anxiety, & stress while reducing the potential of injury  for those who are cared for as well as the caregiver. 

After REACHING our goal, the funds will be used for the most important aspects of the above mentioned.  EXCEEDING our goal will allow us to enter the market, moving immediately to Phase II.

Every single dollar helps, and we will be exceedingly grateful for your contribution. If you are unable to participate financially, please help us by getting the word out to your friends, families and Social Media. Please use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you for supporting our mission to improve lives.             

Yours for a better life, 

Jacqueline Cameron, 
Founder, Super Fly Apparel Inc.

story:
We shipped all the bracelets, we fulfilled all the perks!

 

Augmios bracelets are a new kind of luxury jewelries for proud and classy men. Made with the best materials: natural stones, 18k gold plating, 925 silver plating and tripled Japanese wires, they won’t break and will give you the additional touch of fashion you needed to perfect your style.

 

 

Natural Stones

Augmios bracelets are exclusively made with the best 100% natural stones available. Tested for their resistance, they can sustain strong shocks and won’t break. Since the stones are natural, there is a nice, a bit heavy feeling which demonstrate Augmios premium nature.

Natural Onyx, Jasper, Volcanic Stones and Chinese Red Stones are used for our bracelets. 

 

Color Choice: Real Gold and Silver

Each bracelet is built around one animal (leopard, wolf or monkey king) with two spacers, one Augmios bead and natural stones. 

Depending on the color, the animal heads, spacers, and Augmios beads are real 18k Gold plated, real 18k Rose Gold plated or Real 925 Silver plated. Only the black color is not made of gold or silver but of black electroplated steel. 

Each colors have been duly tested to resist shocks, time, and water. It won’t rust and will always look great. 

 

Animal Heads

Proudly sited in the center of our bracelets, there are three choices of animal heads. Each has its own meaning and personality so to match with your own and inspire you. 

  • The Leopard
  • The Wolf
  • The Monkey King

 

Real Cubic Zirconia

Did you see the crystals eyes of the animals ? Or the crystals on the spacers and on the leopard ? Well they are all made of real cubic zirconia, the best available choice to replace diamonds. Quality comes first.

 

High Quality Japanese wires

Wires are one if not the most important part of bead jewelries. We spent weeks testing different kind of wires making sure that the one we will choose will be the best available. Cost was not a factor. Only quality. You won’t find a better type of wire that the one we use for our bracelets. 

We settled on extremely premium black Japanese wires. Each wire is made of thousand of highly resistant smaller wires. Each bracelets has 3 wires (yes, 3 wires themselves made of thousand of wires). Needless to say, your Augmios bracelet will last for years.

 

Waterproof & Shocks resistant

Our bracelets were designed so that every part is waterproof and shocks resistant. Wires, animals, stones, spacers, Augmios bead: everything is waterproof and shocks resistant. You can live with your bracelet, be inspired by it and inspire others at every moments of your life: it simply won’t break. 

 

Box & Bag & Additional

A premium Augmios box with its golden logo and Augmios velvet bag are included for each bracelet purchased. Additional beads and wires are also included for each bracelet. (We don’t think you will need them but we will give them to you anyway). 

 

30 days free return & Warranty

We are sure that you will love your bracelet. But in the case you don’t you can return your bracelet within 30 days of the date of reception. 

You also benefit of one year warranty for each bracelet, we strongly believe you won’t need it but, the plating wear off ? wires break and you don’t want to use your additional wires ? a stone is broken ? Just return it to us, we will freely fix it for you.

 

GOLD LEOPARD - MATTE ONYX

BLACK LEOPARD - GREY JASPER

SILVER LEOPARD - MATTE ONYX

GOLD LEOPARD - VOLCANIC STONES

ROSE GOLD LEOPARD - GREY JASPER

SILVER LEOPARD - VOLCANIC STONES

LEOPARD SPECIAL EDITION: GOLD LEOPARD - RED JASPER

ROSE GOLD LEOPARD - VOLCANIC STONES

SILVER LEOPARD - BLUE JASPER

GOLD LEOPARD - GREY JASPER

ROSE GOLD LEOPARD - MATTE ONYX

LEOPARD SPECIAL EDITION: SILVER LEOPARD - RED JASPER

GOLD LEOPARD - BLUE JASPER

SILVER LEOPARD - GREY JASPER

 

GOLD WOLF - MATTE ONYX

BLACK WOLF - GREY JASPER

SILVER WOLF - MATTE ONYX

GOLD WOLF - VOLCANIC STONES

ROSE GOLD WOLF - GREY JASPER

SILVER WOLF - VOLCANIC STONES

WOLF SPECIAL EDITION: GOLD WOLF - GREEN JASPER

ROSE GOLD WOLF - VOLCANIC STONES

SILVER WOLF - BLUE JASPER

GOLD WOLF - GREY JASPER

ROSE GOLD WOLF - MATTE ONYX

WOLF SPECIAL EDITION: SILVER WOLF - GREEN JASPER

GOLD WOLF - BLUE JASPER

SILVER WOLF - GREY JASPER

 

GOLD MONKEY KING - MATTE ONYX

BLACK MONKEY KING - GREY JASPER

SILVER MONKEY KING - MATTE ONYX

GOLD MONKEY KING - VOLCANIC STONES

ROSE GOLD MONKEY KING - GREY JASPER

SILVER MONKEY KING - VOLCANIC STONES

MONKEY KING SPECIAL EDITION: GOLD MONKEY KING - RED CHINESE STONES

ROSE GOLD MONKEY KING - VOLCANIC STONES

SILVER MONKEY KING - BLUE JASPER

GOLD MONKEY KING - GREY JASPER

ROSE GOLD MONKEY KING - MATTE ONYX

MONKEY KING SPECIAL EDITION: SILVER MONKEY KING - RED CHINESE STONES

GOLD MONKEY KING - BLUE JASPER

SILVER MONKEY KING - GREY JASPER

 

GOLD OGHAM - MATTE ONYX

SILVER OGHAM - MATTE ONYX

ROSE GOLD OGHAM - MATTE ONYX

 

Augmios was born in October 2018. After living for more than 5 years in Asia, Taiwan, its french creator couldn’t not observe all those local traditional beads jewelry, usually sold in local temples at very high prices. Very popular among the locals, one part of the population seemed to wear it more than others: Men in suits or in neat and fashionable clothes and it looked great!

That’s when the idea started to kick in: What about combining this part of Asian culture with Western one so to create a new kind of jewelry, which could fit and improve the looks of all men around the world ?

But the creator wanted this idea to be more than just that. He wanted to create a new brand which will not only make men looks better but also empower them. 

To do so, the brand needed roots, it needed a name, a story, an idea which could inspire everyday men toward something greater. The brand should not only be luxury, made with the highest quality of materials but it should also leads men to outdo themselves; it should motivates them to always seek to achieve and exceed their goals.

Thinking about the brand

That’s it! We found the perfect symbol for our brand: the Celtic god Ogmios. Ancient deity, Ogmios was believed to be a war god who conquered its enemies not with force albeit being very old and powerful but with its eloquence. Its power of persuasion would lead people to voluntary bind themselves to him. What a better symbol is there, so to push men to excel and empower themselves? 

You already guessed it, the brand name, “Augmios” is coming from “Ogmios” with the difference of “Aug” which represent the month August, itself named after one of the greatest Roman Emperor and man in history “Augustus”. It should help you to remember what a man can achieve. 

But did you know that the logo itself is inspired from a priori look of Ogmios? He is described as looking very similar to Heracles; wearing a lion skin and carrying a bow and club. However Ogmios is said to look much older, to have a very dark skin (feature of power in Celtic culture), and to have long chains, made of gold and amber that pierce his tongue and are attached to the hears of people who happily follow him. 

We tried to inspire the power of this deity with our logo.

Did you see that it can be looked at both way ? 

This is not random. Animal Spirits (spiritus animalis, spiritus vitalis) are also a very important part to our brand. Used to describe instincts, proclivities and emotions that ostensibly influence and guide human behavior, we decided to represent it with animal heads, centerpiece of our jewelries. Three animals were mainly chosen for their inherent characteristics to match with your own personality and to inspire you.  

 

Each bracelet has a meaning and story, while you could simply choose the one that you like the best and create your own story around it, you could also decide to match a bracelet personality with your own.  

The Leopard

Strength, leadership, perseverance, confidence, independence, steadfastness, and gracefulness. The leopard is a special animal, very independent but with great leadership skills and confidence while always staying in good shape, a certain elegance emanate from it which force respect and impose natural leadership. The Leopard collection was created to inspire those traits, to help you to inspire others while being a great, reliable leader. 

The Wolf

Power, freedom, loyalty, shrewdness, intuition, awareness, and energy. Powerful animal often feared, the wolf is actually social and intelligent. The design of the wolf in our bracelets shows the fighting spirit of the wolf. To protect someone or to achieve its goal, the wolf is a good symbol for Augmios which itself encourage modern men to fight for and achieve their dreams. We created a Wolf collection, to express this combativeness and help men to remember their goals. 

The Monkey King

Intelligence, authority, clarity, honor, intensity, protection and family. The choice of creating a Monkey King collection was directly inspired by the project creator experience in Taiwan and China. The Monkey King legend can be tracked as far as the Song Dynasty (宋朝;Sòng cháo; 960–1279). As the legend feature, he was originally a monkey born from a stone who acquired immense powers and strength through Taoist practices. Very clever, sometimes very playful and tricky, sometimes very wise and honorable, he is an iconic characters of Chinese culture. To continue the story, we designed a special edition for the Monkey King: The Gold/Silver Monkey King with premium Red Chinese stones directly coming from China. Those Red Chinese stones are present in a lot of temples to bring protection, peace and harmony. 

Oghams

Special collection, those bracelets are designed to match with others. It doesn’t mean that they don’t have their own story. Ogham is actually the name of an early medieval alphabet used to write the early Irish language which is the oldest known form of the Goidelic languages. Our brand, Augmios was largely inspired by Ogmios, Celtic god of eloquence known under the name Ogma in Irish mythology. In the legend, the ogham alphabet, which has a runic look, was created by Ogma itself for the profit of the learned. The central piece of our Ogham collection remind of this runic look of the old Ogham alphabet while matching with your other animal bracelets and bringing a bit of mythology and our brand spirit at once. 

The Stones

In popular beliefs, stones have meanings and abilities. While you are free to not believe in this as it is not a science, we decided to include it as additional interesting facts to know which, who knows, may also help you in the choice of your bracelet.  

Thank you for your interest in this project! We invested a great deal of time and efforts in it hoping to provide you with the best bracelet possible. Your satisfaction is our priority and we really want to deliver a great product with a great story which will exceed your expectations.  We chose only the best materials for our products and, we made our best to offer it with the highest possible discount for the Indiegogo community as a way to thank you for your support in this project. 

Please back us today! :)

In the future, we will like to continue to push the idea of our brand: offer innovative luxury men products with a purpose, to encourage men to surpass themselves and achieve the things they dream of. We believe in yourself and want you to be proud of who you are. Augmios, throughout high quality jewelries should help you to remember, when you wear them, to don’t give up and to fight for your goals.

 

Risks and challenges

Although it was our first Kickstarter project and so it is our first InDemand campaign, we made the necessary investments and we built strong partnerships with different manufacturers. We are located in Asia and have great Chinese mandarin skills which allow us to directly negotiate and solve problems with manufacturers should they arise during the production process. 

We are confident about our ability to ship all the rewards by the end of July 2019, beginning of August 2019, should any problem arise, we will always be transparent and keep you informed every step of the way. As our backers, you will also know everything about each step of the manufacturing and shipping process through regular updates. 

We are committed to deliver a reward, in time, which will exceed your expectations. Your satisfaction is our utmost priority.

story:
Short Summary

  • NightCap is the first pragmatic solution to the drink-spiking epidemic. NightCap turns your hair scrunchie into a drink cover to create a simple and convenient solution. Just wear your NightCap in your hair or on your wrist. When you want to use it, simply remove it, pull the cover out of the pocket and place it over your drink. There is a built in straw hole so you can drink with peace of mind.
  • NightCap was invented by 16-year-old Shirah Benarde from West Palm Beach, Florida. The company is run by her and her brother, Michael, a senior at Florida State University.
  • Drink spiking has become an epidemic around the world and with your contributions we can finally introduce a product that will help put an end to it. 
  • Your contributions will help significantly reduce alcohol- and drug-induced sexual assault and robberies.
  • NightCap makes a defiant statement showing that you are aware of the threat and acts as a deterrent to potential predators.
  • There are endless design possibilities with NightCap. Not only is it going to save lives, but it provides a new way for women to express themselves through their drink. Trendy designs, funny quotes, and school logos are all in the works. We're also looking to wholesale NightCap to companies with their branding on them. This will be an exceptional marketing opportunity for bars, clubs, music festivals, and liquor brands.
  • We want to get NightCap in the hands of as many women as possible. This is why we're looking into licensing it to popular women's clothing and lifestyle brands that can add their own designs and help bring NightCap mainstream.

 

The Need for NightCap

In a survey of 100 women ages 18-25:

  • 26% said that they have been spiked or believed that they have been spiked.
  • 75% said that they are worried about being spiked when they go out.
  • 78% said that they would purchase something to prevent them from getting spiked.

 

NightCap in the Media

What We Need

  • We're looking to raise at least $12,000 to go toward production costs, marketing, and legal fees. It is crucial that we reach our goal so that we can get NightCap to as many women as possible.

 

What You Get

  • Order a single NightCap, you will receive a 25% discount from the future retail price.
  • Order the NightCap Family Pack (4), you will receive a 33% discount from future retail price.
  • Order the NightCap Gift Pack (10), you will receive a 33% discount from future retail price.

 

 

 

Goals

  • Our biggest challenge is creating awareness of the product. So please tell all of your friends.
  • Creating a new category of fashion is another challenge. Our goal is to design NightCap as a trendy and fashionable way for women to protect their drinks. It will also be a new way for women to express themselves. They won't be using NightCap just because they are worried about being drugged, but because it's a trendsetting thing to do. We think drink spiking should be the last thing on a woman's mind when they go out. Going to a bar, club, music festival, concert, etc. is supposed to be fun, not dangerous.

story:
Ousia's Holiday Market

 

Why is Ousia holding a Holiday Market?

Ousia has curated gift items made by some of the most talented artists in North America and the most sought after pre-loved and vintage fashion in order to raise money for a new app that will be a respectful and ethical peer-to-peer fashion marketplace. To shop, please pick out items from images above and then find the perk that matches on the right hand side of the page. Shipping is free.

 

Holiday Giving

Ousia will be giving 50% of all net profit from our Holiday Market to Blue Dragon Children's Foundation in Vietnam.

Blue  Dragon  Children’s Foundation is  a  grassroots  charity  serving  children  in  crisis throughout Vietnam. It rescues kids from danger and slavery (including from garment sweatshops) reunites them with their families where possible, and  provide  all  the  services  needed  for the child's recovery  and  growth. Please go to www.bluedragon.org to find out more.

 

We believe there can be morality in commerce.

Ousia is a hybrid organization seeking to help solve environmental and human rights problems in the garment industry. We want to be a model of morality in commerce. In short, we want to be a vehicle for doing good in the world while at the same time providing a unique and fun shopping experience.

1. Slow Fashion - Ousia's first goal is to provide an affordable online platform to recycle clothing thereby SLOWING down the fashion cycle and creating less waste and pollution for the planet.

2. Promotion - Ousia's second goal is to promote ethically made and sustainable fashion through popularization of "the list" and through ethical label spotlights and blogging. In other words, we plan to make these labels popular and well known. We would also like to draw attention to organizations who are creating change like Fair Wear Foundation, Clean Clothes Campaign and Fashion Revolution. 

3. Giving - Ousia will give 50% of it's net income to organizations that seek to empower global garment workers and rescue and give a brighter future to children who have become imprisoned by this industry. Blue Dragon Children's Foundation in Vietnam is a good example. We will also give to those organizations working towards solutions to environmental problems caused by the garment industry.

 

How will the app and website work?

The app will allow users to sell pre-loved clothing and accessories as well as original fashion to each other. Our goal is to provide a platform for clean, efficient and fun shopping experiences. Our goal is also to be part of the slow fashion movement, providing a space for people to make sound environmental decisions as well as contribute to funding human rights organizations who support global garment workers. The following are categories users can post under:

 Ethical – we are researching and co-creating a list of ethical labels with our customers and they will be able to buy and sell these gently used pieces. 

Plant-based - clothing that addresses speciesism and alleviates animal suffering. Plant-based means No Fur/ No Leather/ No Feathers. This category is for people who believe fashion needn't exploit any life on the planet.

Recycled – all labels will be accepted here for buying and selling. 

Vintage - all vintage pieces will be bought and sold here.

Made – pieces for sale here are posted by designers making things from home. You will find all sorts of interesting original clothing, jewellery and fashion accessories here.

 

 

Founder's Story

Kelly Wren is a secondary social studies and English teacher who lives with her five year old son in Vancouver, Canada. She has always been passionate about working on human rights and environmental issues in education.

 

Funding

We are still at the design phase of our app creation but would like to move on to the development phase as soon as possible. The following is what these funds will be used for:

$1500 - This will help bring us to the development stage. 

$3000-$5000 - This will help us complete backend programming including data storage, user management and server-side logic.

$5000-$10000 - This will help us finish backend work including data integration, push and versioning.

$10000-15000 - This will help us complete frontend work including caching, synchronization and wire framing.

$15000-20000 - This will help us complete frontend work including design, development and polish.

 

Thank you! Please help us by sharing on social media :)

 

 

Contact 

https://www.facebook.com/ousiaonline

kellywren@gmail.com

778-867-5459

story:
Vessel is a slim, minimalist wallet with a sliding storage tray built into its body. Store your receipts, pills, memory cards, condoms, photos, and more in a compartment you know is secure.

Scroll through cards with a downward swiping motion, and upward to remove. Accessing your cards is extremely quick, intuitive and leaves onlookers with a sense of curiosity and jealousy.

 

The cards are securely held in the wallet by a gentle squeezing pressure on the edges.

 

The concealed protective compartment is great for holding medication, birth control, paper money, coins, keys, candy, gum, or any other small object. Store whatever you need for the day ahead.

Slide the tray out by pushing on either side.

The money clip secures cash and is easily removable for a slimmer feel.

The Vessel Wallet™ is machined from aircraft grade aluminum, making it lightweight and durable. The outer aluminum shell is finished with a bead blast polished type III hard anodized coating, which is often used in military grade equipment for its strength and scratch resistance qualities. The center plate and clip are finished in three different accent colors, with more color options available if the stretch goal is reached:

Sit, stand, run, or jump - Vessel Wallet is comfortable in any pocket.

Cards are held firmly in place using our patent pending design.

Single swipe RFID access.

Scratch resistant.

Vessel's aircraft grade aluminum body is sleek with a smooth finish and rounded corners, allowing it to easily slide into your pocket. The wallet's design was inspired by the intuitive swiping motion we use on smartphones. Vessel's minimalist design has no mechanical components and is held together by 4 miniature hex head screws.

Past prototypes and iterations.

Dimensions

Sample batch manufacture

Find Vessel Wallet on the following:

 

After nearly two years of design and iteration, we have created a product that works flawlessly, looks great, and fits comfortably in your hand. We have successfully raised over $40K on Kickstarter, enabling us to begin mass manufacture.

The Vessel Wallet™ is set to ship in May of this year. With the next step being production, we look forward to providing you with the highest quality wallet. Should any unexpected issues with manufacturing or shipping delays occur, we will do our best to keep you posted on our progress and resolutions. Thank you for your support.

story:
Barner is high quality and stylish eyewear to protect your eyes from  Blue Light of digital devices. It will provide you a better sleep and a healthier life.

 

Now we’re back on Indiegogo, with a new version of Barner that we are convinced you will fall in love with!

 

Your new Barners won’t just help you sleep better and improve your health; now they come with an evolved Blue light blocking lens for better protection, and a great & colorful design to keep your cool style wherever you go!

 

Barner Eyewear is the perfect combination between health and style. Screens are part of our daily life now and this is why we think computer glasses should be a no brainer tool to use on a daily basis. 

That's the reason why we put lot of effort into creating stylish and comfortable eyewear which at the same time has the best protection for your eyes.

 

We live totally surrounded by screens, spending almost 9 hours a day, on average, in front of digital devices. All these digital devices are emitting blue light that may be detrimental and our eyes are not prepared for the overexposure that we are suffering these days.  

Because of that overexposure in front of screens, a new Digital Sickness called Computer Vision Syndrome (CVS) is emerging. 

CVS affects 90% of people spending more than 3 hours per day in front of screens and some of the symptoms are:  

  • Eyestrain, dry eyes, red eyes, eye fatigue 
  • Headaches, neck pain 
  • Double vision, vertigo/dizziness, difficulty refocusing the eyes
  • Reduction of melatonin production 
  • Change of sleeping cycles (circadian rhythms) 

 This is why we’ve created Barner, the ultimate computer glasses.

Barner's lenses, have a coating specially developed for people who spend a lot of their time indoors and are exposed to blue-violet light from LEDs as well as smartphone, TV, tablet or computer screens. As technology evolves, so does our special Blue Light Blocking Lenses. 

 

This new collection’s lenses block 40% of the Blue Light on the 430nm - 450nm spectrum and 100% of the Blue Light at 410nm. You will be protected in any kind situation.

We bring you 3 different models inspired by the coolest neighbourhoods of Paris, London and Madrid. You have 6 different colours to choose from each model making a total of 18 different designs available on Indiegogo.

In order to choose the perfect model, we would advise you take some glasses that suit you perfectly, measure them and get the closest in terms of sizing in our available range

In order to choose the perfect model, we would advise you take some glasses that suit you perfectly, measure them and get the closest in terms of sizing in our available range

 

Having the "Chamberí" frame design on Indiegogo has been a last minute decision and mainly brought forward because it has been super popular among all backers. 

Because of this, for now, the only thing we have to share with you of the Chamberí design is a 3D printed prototype and a photshop edition with all the pantone colours we are going to manufacture (see on the .gifs above).

Unfortunately we won't be able to receive the samples before finishing the campaign, so we won't be able to provide pictures with models wearing them. Apologies about that.

In order to choose the perfect model, we would advise you take some glasses that suit you perfectly, measure them and get the closest in terms of sizing in our available range

Once you finish working with your laptop, you just need to attach the clip-on to your Barners and transform them into the coolest sunglasses. With this accessory you will now be able to use your Barners in front of the screens but also on the street, relaxing at your favorite beach or breathing some fresh air in the mountains.

Be sure to pledge on any of the rewards with the solar clip-on and you will get this amazing accessory for €20 or less.

We think every product start with its own packaging, this is why we have developed a package with amazing quality, great design and filled with great surprises.

Last year we did our first kickstarter campaign and we successfully delivered all the goods to every single backer. In total we sent 965 orders to 62 different countries. 

Check some of the feedback that our previous happy customers shared on our site.

 Find here a video testimonial of our previous Backers from Barner 1.0 ;).

 

1. Click “Back this Project”: Select the available reward tier you would like to pledge on the right side of the page or click here. Each backer may only make one pledge.    

2. Payment: Enter your payment information. By doing so, you are only allowing Indiegogo to charge you the cost of the pledge at that same moment.

3. Model, Color & Shipping Information: Don’t worry about that yet! You will receive a survey to tell us your favorited model, color, and shipping information after 2 weeks of submitting your pledge.

To all Backers: We will ship Barner Eyewear worldwide via trackable post. Please note that you may be 100% responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable to your region, for more info check the FAQ. All the goods will be shipped from Hong Kong.

Yes, we are prepared to provide our backers with their specific prescriptions lenses requirements (only monofocal)!  

Special Indiegogo offer for prescription lenses just €30!  

It’s easy, once the campaign ends, we will send you a survey so you can choose your favourite model, colour and whether you need prescription lenses or not. We will also need your pupillary distance (PD), so if you don't have it yet, please check with your optometrist.  

If you want prescription lenses, you will be able to purchase it at the final survey for 30€. Don't need to do anything on Indiegogo right now.

IMPORTANT NOTE: Stock range for prescription is:

  • Myopia & farsightedness (Sphere): +6.00, -6.00
  • Astigmatism (Cylinder): +2.00, -2.00 

If anyone wants to have a higher prescription than this, we could go higher than +/-6 on Sphere and any other Cylinder, but we will charge +10€. Total extra = 40€.

Prescription details needed:

  • Diopters for both Sphere & Cylinder
  • Axis (in case there are some diopters on the cylinder)
  • Pupillary distance

Any questions, do not hesitate to reach us at thanks@barnerbrand.com or by clicking on the messenger chat below.

Since February 2018 we've working on this new collection of glasses. We visited many different factories to find the best quality materials and worked hard with a great branding agency to create the coolest designs. 

Edu has been working in the digital space for many years. He built his first start-up 7 years ago and has also been working in companies like Samsung and Google for the previous 4 years before starting this amazing entrepreneurship adventure.

Ramon founded his first start-up 2 years ago while he was working at Accenture as a Management Consultant. Now he is full time dedicated to Barner together with Edu.

At Barner we deeply believe that every company should be giving back to society. Why? Because if every single company did that, we would live in a much better world. 

For this reason we'll donate 1$ from every single pledge to a non-profit organization.  

To do that, every backer will be able to choose one of the following 3 non-profit organizations at the final survey to submit his/her donation. Each of the non-profit organization is covering a different topic (health, sustainability & food).

20 seconds of your time could make the difference in growing the Barner community and supporting this campaign. Click one of the buttons below and tag a friend or co-worker who spends all day in front of digital devices!

 

This campaign is promoted by Backercamp. Since 2012, Backercamp has helped 5,000+ creators make their projects a reality, raising over $200MM through crowdfunding.

Since February 2018 we've working on this new collection of glasses. We visited many different factories to find the best quality materials and worked hard with a great branding agency to create the coolest designs.  
 
 
 
  
Edu has been working in the digital space for many years. He built his first start-up 7 years ago and has also been working in companies like Samsung and Google for the previous 4 years before starting this amazing entrepreneurship adventure. 
Ramon founded his first start-up 2 years ago while he was working at Accenture as a Management Consultant. Now he is full time dedicated to Barner together with Edu. 
At Barner we deeply believe that every company should be giving back to society. Why? Because if every single company did that, we would live in a much better world. For this reason we'll donate 1$ from every single pledge to a non-profit organization.  To do that, every backer will be able to choose one of the following 3 non-profit organizations at the final survey to submit his/her donation. Each of the non-profit organization is covering a different topic (health, sustainability & food). 
 
 
 20 seconds of your time could make the difference in growing the Barner community and supporting this campaign. Click one of the buttons below and tag a friend or co-worker who spends all day in front of digital devices! 
  
  
  
 
  This campaign is promoted by Backercamp. Since 2012, Backercamp has helped 5,000+ creators make their projects a reality, raising over $200MM through crowdfunding.

story:
828 represents August 28th, a significant date in Black History/American History. The events that occurred on this date emphasize some of the challenges and triumphs in the fight for equality.

Unfortunately, there is still a persistent unfair division in this country that goes back generations. With The 828 Movement, we choose to 1) recognize and remember the past efforts, 2) respect the present pursuits for equality and 3) create hope for a brighter future.

By backing our campaign you are allowing us to call attention to continued challenges and struggles in certain areas across our nation (i.e., urban areas that are statistically disregarded and diluted), but also offer a solution to implement change.

 

Introducing the 828 Movement Bracelet

 

Prototypes

We have been working with our manufacturing partner to prototype the bracelet for sizing and feel. These prototypes will allow us to deliver this product to you fast, we just need your support for final production runs.

 

Made in the USA

We have chosen to have this bracelet manufactured in the USA. Supporting American manufacturing and everyone having access to a well rounded public education is something we should all be proud to support.

 

Who We Are

 

Is Education Equality a Real Problem?

Urban schools, especially those in high poverty areas are chronically under funded. The schools in these areas are more likely to have outdated resources like textbooks and science equipment.

This problem is not new, but it is also not being addressed adequately. This is where the 828 Movement wants to focus. We want to support these schools by donating money that will be used to update the resources students will have access to.

Where The Indiegogo Funding Goes

All funding from our campaign will be used to fulfill all rewards as soon as possible. Additionally, this money will be used to purchase the high production tools from our US based manufacturer. Any funding beyond the tooling expense will be used to help continue to spread our message of education equality and support Urban Area schools across the USA.

 

Urban Area School Donations 

It is important to us (and for our backers to know) that the money we donate will be made use of wisely and effectively. We will work with schools to understand their most needed resources (equipment, books, supplies, etc). Our first donation to Carver High School is a testament of how the 828 Movement can make and impact.

Principal Dr. Hines-Nettles, at Carver High School, responded:

"The leadership used the funds for ACT prep (tutoring and remediation). On October 18th, we had planned a full day boot-camp for seniors who will be taking the test in December, followed by before and after school tutoring and Saturday tutoring. The funds will be used to expand the ACT program for our students. This will be the first event of this type"

 

August 28th - An Historical Date

 

Delivering February! - Our Timeline

 

Rewards!

Patriot Pack

The Patriot Pack ($90) is a set of 3 bracelets and shows you are proud to be an American. This set will ship with (1) red (1) white and (1) blue bracelet.

Limited Edition Colorways

Want some color? Choose from one of our four limited edition colors: Lavender, Night, Snow and Fall were created to blend with every season.

Ready To Go - Just Need You!

We have everything in place to make this successful. All we need is you! Pledge your support and start helping us make a difference!

story:
Have you ever wanted to become your own designer?!

And, have the power to personalize your clothing just the way you want it?

Well, now you can!

Rose Athena offers the solution for women to help them shop for dresses exactly the way they want them. Our website allows customers to piece together components, such as neckline and sleeve length, selecting their own design choices. Our dresses are made from the same quality fabrics used by other premium brands.

This campaign allows you to pre-order dresses. Once this campaign is closed, we will then send you a unique code for you to personalize your dress on our website- www.roseathena.com.

Rose Athena was born out of the frustration we faced when we went dress shopping. We spent countless hours searching for dresses that would fit our personal styles. In the end, we settled for dresses that were not to our liking. When we spoke with our friends, we realized that we were not alone in facing this dilemma.

Women have difficulty shopping for dresses because we cannot easily find what we are looking for in terms of design. We may find some likeable components, such as the neckline or color of a dress, but may not like the entire dress.

On Rose Athena, you have the opportunity to design your dress just the way you want it.

Over 2500 different dress designs can be created!

You have the opportunity to select from 7 different styling options such as neckline, sleeve length, waistline, backline, hemline, fabric and color, as shown below:



                                                     

                                               

                              

We have already finalized our manufacturing operations and logistics. We have completed the first two sets of Jersey dress designs - the Straight and Flared silhouettes.

This project is created to put our newest dress design, the Wrap Dress, into production. The money raised will be used to purchase the materials and put the dress into production.

For each pledge, our supporters will receive a perk. Each level of perk is offered at a special discounted price exclusively for our Indiegogo supporters.

Once the campaign is over, each supporter will be provided a unique code to claim your perk(s) and design your own dress(es) on our website based on the respective delivery dates. At that time, you will be able to select your size based on our sizing chart (XS-XL).

Shipping notes: Shipping is included for supporters from Canada and the United States. For international supporters please add $20 for shipping. 

 





 

            

You can help us achieve our goal by making a pledge and sharing our story with your family and friends. Pledge a perk as a gift for that special creative person(s) in your life.

And, follow us!

  • Twitter: @RA_RoseAthena 
  • Pinterest: Rose Athena
  • Facebook: Rose Athena

Help Rose Athena transform women from shoppers into dress designers and make our website the Online Destination for personalized dresses.

We would love to hear from you. If you have any questions or comments you can reach us at customercare@roseathena.com.

story:
Thank you for the media attention!

HiVelocity Media

3Ders.org

3DPrintingIndustry.com

Who are we and what are we doing?

We are Michael Cao and Larry Knopp.  Michael Cao has been in the automotive industry for about 10 years as a product design engineer specializing in interiors. Throughout that time, he's also used various commercial 3D printers to prove out concepts for plastic parts. For the past 2 years, he's dabbled with desktop 3D printers and has built and tuned about three dozen Repraps, Makerbots, and others.  

Larry Knopp also has a mechanical engineering backgroud, is an IT systems expert and enjoys teaching.  He has spent nearly everyday experimenting with desktop 3D printing for about 2 years.  Larry loves to spend his free time contributing to 3D printer forums and groups and has helped hundreds of people start printing on their own.

Together, we've gone through A LOT of filament from various producers and are frankly tired of poor quality in the form of loose diameter tolerances, DEBRIS in filament, low quality raw plastic base and paying overseas shipping in some cases. 

What exactly are the problems?

Diameter: Most desktop 3D printers, such as Repraps, Makerbots, (and even the 3Doodlers) drive plastic rod that's usually 3mm or 1.75mm in diameter through a tiny hole (and, in some cases, a tube, such as in Bowden systems) to then get melted.  While typical "extruders" can handle slight variances, most systems will jam and cause filament stripping if the size is too large or too small.

Debris:  Nearly all producers of 3D printing filament primarily produce the product for the plastic welding industry. Plastic welders take 3mm filament and push it out of a 3mm nozzle.  Any debris in the filament doesn't get detected, therefore the manufacturers only need a certain low level of quality control. The nozzle on most 3D printers is only about 0.25mm-0.5mm in diameter!  Any tiny piece of sawdust or cardboard shaving will cause clogging (which will pretty much ruin your weekend).

Plastic source:  Not all ABS is created equal. ABS is an engineered plastic.  Therefore, thousands of different formulations have been created to cater to various product needs. Some are designed to be very hard for things like safety hard hats, while others are designed to be more flexible and support fine detail like for automotive interiors.  ABS that works great for one industry doesn't necessarily extrude well in 3D printers.

Moisture: ABS and PLA, which are the two most common materials for 3D printing, are slightly hygroscopic meaning they absorb moisture.  When the material that's about to be extruded in a 3D printer contains moisture, it will essentially boil in the hot-end then create a little bubble that pops out of the nozzle.  This is not only bad for surface appearance, but will cause poor layer bonding which can be disastrous for structural parts.

How exactly will we address the problems?

Diameter: We will implement a 2-way laser gauge.  This is a non-contact measuring method that will check the diameter from two different angles (90 degrees apart).  This will also ensure that the roundness is within spec.

Debris: Cleanliness is perhaps our main focus.  This is in no small part due to our fair share of unclogging hot-ends.  We're designing custom in-house systems to tightly control the logistics of the raw pellets.  We're also creating methods to ensure that the raw pellets coming into the factory get cleaned before entering any equipment.

Plastic source: For the past 2 years, we've used plastic filament from over a dozen sources in various printers and even pushed it through a few different types of hot-ends.  We've narrowed down the type of raw plastic that just works.

Moisture: To ensure the raw plastic material is free from H2O, every single pellet will travel through a drying system before entering the filament extruder.  To make sure moisture doesn't get into the product after we make it, each spool of filament will get vacuum sealed with a packet of dessicant.

What We Need & What You Get

We're asking for $20,000 to help cover some of the cost for equipment, raw materials in bulk, factory space and hiring skilled local operators. In return, not only do you get high quality, lower cost, home-grown filament, you'll be helping us bring this filament to the entire 3D printing community!

Your contributions will go towards an industrial size plastic extrusion production line (big!), several tons of virgin ABS pellets (heavy!), supplies such as spools, labels and bags, factory space, and most importantly, a skilled operator (brave!).

What will we be making and why?

Type: At this time, we're going to only produce ABS filament.  We personally enjoy printing with ABS for its extruding characteristics (less oozing), mechanical properties (less brittle and squeaky), chemical properties (acetone-fusing smaller parts to make big ones), and post-processing ease (acetone vapor washes are just fantastic).  Our central Ohio 3D printing community also seems to favor ABS.  We understand that PLA is also a very popular material along with the growing use of Nylon.  So, we will not rule out producing this material in the future, perhaps with a second extruder to guarantee material purity.

Size: We mainly use 3mm diameter filament for its ease of handling and toughness against stripping vs. 1.75mm.  From our experience in the 3D printing world, it seems that the split between 3mm and 1.75mm filament users is pretty close to 50%.  Therefore, we plan to start extruding 3mm filament first, followed shortly by 1.75mm size.

Color: We will be offering our standard palette of colors.  This includes:

  • Natural
  • Black
  • Red
  • Blue
  • Orange
  • Green

Keeping a limited selection helps control color quality as well as maintain lower costs by reducing the material handling time.  Sorry, avid users of puke green and bubblegum pink...

We'll send out a survey after the campaign ends to get your preference for size and color.

Perks:

We've designed the perks to cater to these categories of printers:

The casual printer:  makes their own prototypes, toys, and other gadgets to impress their co-workers and also to keep their spouse from getting upset at all the time they spend 3D printing.

The frequent printer: gets requests to print things from everyone they know, from the dentist to the moms of their buddies.  His peers are usually jealous that he owns a 3D printer.

The start-up:  This guy got a printer and started making some cash selling Reprap kits.  Knows the difficulty in finding a good low-cost filament supplier, but wants to buy wholesale for his own printing and to re-sell on his site.  Dreams of quitting corporate America.

The hackerspace:  a group of local guys who hang out regularly to make stuff and geek-out together.  They enjoy helping each other form theories about the existance of "Z-banding."  Loves group buys.

The printing libraries:  Now, this is a cool concept that's starting to pop up all over the country.  Libraries (the ones full of 2D printed objects...) are starting to obtain 3D printers and train up librarians to print things for people.  Just awesome.

We'll send out a survey after the campaign ends to get your preference for size and color.

Schedule:

June (mid)    - Campaign ends, kick-off equipment build.

July (end)     - Receive equipment and materials.  Test & tune.

August (end) - Deliver first spool of plastic!

 

Please help us spread the word to those you know who are 3D printing!

 

Oh, and we'd like to say one more thing while it's our turn on the soapbox...

Just say NO to PROPRIETARY FILAMENT CARTRIDGES!

That's just dumb.

 

A very special thanks to...

The Columbus Idea Foundry, run by a great guy named Alex, is Columbus Ohio's premiere hackerspace and incubator.  Those guys and gals are doing truly awesome things and helping out a lot of people, including us!

B3 Innovations is founded by two very talented (and funny) guys who have a vision to create the perfect 3D printer hot-end and much more to come.  We've personally helped them beta test, and we can tell you that it's definitely worth the wait!  Keep an eye open for their Kickstarter campaign launching soon.

 

Graviton Entertainment offers a whole host of media needs including video production, graphic design, brand imaging and a ton more.  It was truly a pleasure to work with these professional gentlemen.


Thank you...

Contact Us

info@ic3dprinters.com

http://ic3dprinters.com/

story:
HELLO and thank you for your time in reading this~

My name is Micqa and my clothing/design label is Wysterium Wear, formerly Wisp~her Wear as I now work in Men's, Women's and Children's.   I produce and design costumes, custom pieces, everyday wear, accessories, home decor, reconstruction, alterations, tailoring, and pretty much anything to do with sewing or textiles.  I have been doing this work for 18 years and have come to a point where I don't have the time to replicate these pieces anymore.  Over the many years, I have had more orders than I can fulfill on my own.     

This campaign idea began when my suitcase was stolen out of my vehicle in San Francisco after a local vending event.  They broke the window and took my beautiful victorian suitcase which had my handmade, one-of-a-kind designed and detailed pieces in it.  This was about 8 years worth of my laborious work.  (10 of those pieces were bought from Buffalo Exchange on Haight street even though I had called to warn them about it prior to)  It was a huge loss in many ways, which cost me alot of time and money.  (many of the items shown in pictures below were in that suitcase)

Therefore, this strange way of seeking recovery is new to me, yet it would allow me to work on new designs while marketing the many others I have already done.  Outsourcing will allow me to promote my work and others in the form of fashion shows, photo-shoots and movie productions. Currently, there are three magnificent stores on the west coast that desire to carry Wysterium Wear clothing. 

I have produced and directed 3 fashion shows and designed for many other ones.  My pieces were used in a film by Paul Festa called "The Glitter Emergency".  I have accomplished many successful photoshoots in working with outstandingly talented fashion industry members from various places.  I have 1 design which was entered into the San Francisco De Young museum, and  3 new magazine publications... Cloud Orchid, Dark Beauty and Gothic Beauty.   Please check them out. 

               

I am asking for this amount in hopes that I can find a company who can cohesively work with this for the amount of items I wish to reproduce.         

If this all manifests, I would then be able to take the necessary steps in building~ to have many designs available for on-line shopping and various boutiques.

If I don't reach my goal, I will then invest any other amount into finding a company to at least fulfill the perks i have listed here~ and any remainder  (if any) would go to starting over from the loss and the continuation to make new pieces.

I believe my clothing has something to offer everyone.  It is a story with many characters.  I can make anything to suit yours with varying color, sizes, fabric and artistic touch.  

I thank you all in advance.  

Even if you are not able to contribute, I am happy to know if my work is appreciated.  I would please ask if you could pass on the word to all of your friends, family and loved ones.

You can visit me on Facebook, (please click like if you do) & Model Mayhem.

My website is www.wysteriumwear.com.  It is currently under construction.   :)

Thanks again! 

Sincerely

Micqa~


 .W.W.

~^v^~

Photographers of images~

Ronald Nelson, La Mew, Drexel Productions, Aliona Kuznetsova, Regina Marie, Eskaton Studios, Stellar Q, Joe Enright, Brandon Caffey and Anthony Gatson 

Models~

Makena Hyde, Azzy Ex, Darren Kane, Rosie Rebel, Jamie Saffron, Thomas Demauriea Goward, Wednesday Mourning, Lucid Luminos, Emeric Bernard-Jones, Elisa Ambrose Berlin, Brook Flemming, Angelique Lee, Jeffrey Van-Housin, Matthew Bubonic, Sever, Dane Carragio, Emit Idy and Caitlin Clay.

CUFFS

BOOT COVERS AND BLOOMERS



HOODS


PANTS

 


 

 

LAYERED SHORT SKIRTS

LONG SKIRTS/DRESSES

story_txt:
HELLO and thank you for your time in reading this~
My name is Micqa and my clothing/design label is Wysterium Wear, formerly Wisp~her Wear as I now work in Men's, Women's and Children's.   I produce and design costumes, custom pieces, everyday wear, accessories, home decor, reconstruction, alterations, tailoring, and pretty much anything to do with sewing or textiles.  I have been doing this work for 18 years and have come to a point where I don't have the time to replicate these pieces anymore.  Over the many years, I have had more orders than I can fulfill on my own.     
This campaign idea began when my suitcase was stolen out of my vehicle in San Francisco after a local vending event.  They broke the window and took my beautiful victorian suitcase which had my handmade, one-of-a-kind designed and detailed pieces in it.  This was about 8 years worth of my laborious work.  (10 of those pieces were bought from Buffalo Exchange on Haight street even though I had called to warn them about it prior to)  It was a huge loss in many ways, which cost me alot of time and money.  (many of the items shown in pictures below were in that suitcase)
Therefore, this strange way of seeking recovery is new to me, yet it would allow me to work on new designs while marketing the many others I have already done.  Outsourcing will allow me to promote my work and others in the form of fashion shows, photo-shoots and movie productions. Currently, there are three magnificent stores on the west coast that desire to carry Wysterium Wear clothing. 

I have produced and directed 3 fashion shows and designed for many other ones.  My pieces were used in a film by Paul Festa called "The Glitter Emergency".  I have accomplished many successful photoshoots in working with outstandingly talented fashion industry members from various places.  I have 1 design which was entered into the San Francisco De Young museum, and  3 new magazine publications... Cloud Orchid, Dark Beauty and Gothic Beauty.   Please check them out. 
               
I am asking for this amount in hopes that I can find a company who can cohesively work with this for the amount of items I wish to reproduce.         If this all manifests, I would then be able to take the necessary steps in building~ to have many designs available for on-line shopping and various boutiques.
If I don't reach my goal, I will then invest any other amount into finding a company to at least fulfill the perks i have listed here~ and any remainder  (if any) would go to starting over from the loss and the continuation to make new pieces.


I believe my clothing has something to offer everyone.  It is a story with many characters.  I can make anything to suit yours with varying color, sizes, fabric and artistic touch.  
I thank you all in advance.  Even if you are not able to contribute, I am happy to know if my work is appreciated.  I would please ask if you could pass on the word to all of your friends, family and loved ones.
You can visit me on Facebook, (please click like if you do) & Model Mayhem.My website is www.wysteriumwear.com.  It is currently under construction.   :)
Thanks again! 
Sincerely
Micqa~

story:
NOW SHIPPING, GET YOURS HERE: WWW.TIHK.CO



If you are like us, you likely do not have a solid evasion plan in place for when you are illegally restrained with handcuffs.  Certainly you could pick the lock if you had an appropriate implement and are also not under duress, but why take the risk?  Since there is not a handcuff evasion solution that works for us, we created one.  Introducing the TIHK | Tiny Inconspicuous Handcuff Key. Evade Unlawful Restraint.



The clip enables easy attachment to your clothing so it is ready when needed. Its minimal, low-profile design and low-visibility coating ensure that it can be carried inconspicuously and go undetected when detained. Designed to fit all standard "peerless" single and double-lock handcuffs.


With the TIHK you now have a solution to evade detainment. For law enforcement, military, and security professionals this may include being restrained with their own cuffs, captured person release and evading capture themselves.


The TIHK is meant to be part of your Everyday Carry so it is there when you need it.  Attach it where you can easily access it when cuffed: jeans belt loop, pants pocket, shirt tag, socks or even on the inside of your pants or underwear waistband.


The design has been refined over the last 6 months with several rounds of prototypes - tweaking various dimensions and optimizing the design.  Now that the design is finalized and patent filed, the TIHK is ready to begin the transition to manufacturing.




That is where you come in. Funding is needed to move forward with tooling and production of the TIHK. By selecting one of the available perks, you will help us in reaching our goal.

One of the perks includes a Limited Challenge Coin commemorating the launch of the TIHK, currently limited to 250 pieces. There may even be Coin-holder only benefits down the road.  You can find out more about Challenge Coins here: Wikipedia.

Since development work of the product is complete, work can begin on tooling and production once this crowdfunding campaign is over (mid-September) and funds received from IndieGoGo (1-2 weeks thereafter).  Once received it will immediately go towards the deposit on the tooling.  Tooling has been estimated to be 4-6 weeks and production at 2 weeks. Fulfillment of the perks will be during the first half of December, if everything else goes as planned.

The TIHK will proudly be Made in the USA and support American workers.


As with bringing any product to market, there may be unforeseen challenges that occur while bringing the TIHK towards the proverbial product development finish line.  Our team has many years of bringing products to market, particularly in the shooting, hunting and outdoor market. The biggest risk is schedule creep due to issues that arise while tooling the product. We've done extensive sourcing and qualification to ensure that those risks can be mitigated if they occur.


If you are interested in TIHK wholesale, we encourage you to look at our Retail Starter Kit perk as a way to evaluate the product in your selling environment.  Once we have finished fulfilling all project perks (including the Retail Starter Kits) we will transition to developing distribution of the product through multiple channels with standard keystone pricing. 

If you are interested in future wholesale options please fill out our interest form.

The TIHK is to only be used to counter illegal detainment and in accordance with all local, state and federal laws by trained law enforcement, military and security professionals. Improper use by civilians is not endorsed or encouraged. Use of the product is at your own personal risk and discretion. 


What material is the TIHK made of?  The exact material is not finalized at this point but will be during the course of the campaign. We are evaluating various die-casting allows such as zinc, magnesium and aluminum but also high-strength reinforced polymers. The final material will most certainly be resistant to corrosion and be as lightweight as possible (currently between 1/3 to 1 gram depending on material).


What color will the TIHK be? The TIHK will have a dark, low-visibility finish to ensure no unwanted attention is drawn to it.


What is the legality of the TIHK? We encourage civilians to investigate the law in their own jurisdiction. It is typically not against the law to own or possess a handcuff key as a civilian, however, using such an implement to evade law enforcement is certainly unlawful. Let us be clear: This product is not designed to be used to evade law enforcement.


U.S. PATENT PENDING

PRESS & MEDIA INQUIRIES | team (at) tihk.co

PRESS & MEDIA KIT | download

story:
Background

   I am cbØne aka Connor Oliver, a 27 year old Artist, Tinkerer, and Dreamer. I would like to create a symmetrical surfboard I’ve named The Ambii, pronounced Am-Bee. I’ve been developing this idea for over 3 years, drawing inspiration from the innovative Gemini, board sports, veteran riders, and growing up ambidextrous in a directional world.

Together, We are going to create a HISTORIC surfboard.

Vision

     The Ambii will integrate the Gemini’s innovative hull along with four fold symmetry to give it a twin tip style ride that snow, skate, and wake boarders are familiar with. The Ambii’s revolutionary shape would enable quick reverts between stances, finless like flow moves, and speed/stability provided by the twin hull. I believe this board has the potential to enable a whole new level of progression on waves and could reboot the way we look at surfboards.


Offerings & Plans

     I am offering personalized expressions of gratitude from yours truly and creating individualized perks that are unique reflections of the Ambii and how grateful I am for your interest in this project. Funds would cover initial housing and costs incurred from testing such as transportation. If I don’t reach my goal, all funds will be devoted towards getting to Hawaii to continue to fulfill the dream of creating an Ambii, the time is NOW.

Gratitude

     I am determined to make this happen and will cherish any help you can offer, whether its a connection in Hawaii, sharing this with a friend, or ideas with the design! I am extremely thankful you made it this far and hope you have a fepic day!

story:
Short Summary

My name is Stacey K. Clarke, and I love who I am. I grew up in a beautiful city where I heard that beauty meant my physical worth to a man. After bouts of one sided relationships, disordered eating, depression, and being obsessed with how I looked, God pulled me out and showed me that I am made in His image with His attributes! He called me Beautiful, and it stuck!

Lily Inc. is here to show women that their beauty (inside that flows to the outside) is powerful, purposeful, and unique. There is no such thing as a standard they have to fit.

With a background in campus ministry, fundraising, and business administration, I am excited to involve you in Lily Inc.'s first major round of fundraising to get things off the ground! 

What We Need & What You Get

We are raising $10,000 for this first major round of seed money. This money will be primarily used to support me while I work with Redeemer Presbyterian's Entrepreneurial Initiative and other wise advisors to create and carry out a viable business plan. The plan includes opening the online store, the physical store, and a conjoined cafe. 

I believe God could provide all I need without my help. But I also believe it is His delight to involve us just so He can bless us! By contributing, you will sow into the lives of women as well as into ushering in a new mindset for a generation. God will surely bless your heart to give, both now and in eternity. And as a thank you from me, you'll also get a 20% off coupon for Lily's future launch.

And what will happen if we do not raise the full amount? Lily will get to keep whatever funds are raised, but we really need that $10K! So please sow a financial seed, knowing that a woman knowing what she's worth is what it's all about!

The Impact

We have a generation of young women who are numb to their value. Giving their beauty to men who manipulate them, hardening their hearts for fear of being used, thinking that they have to straighten, curl, dye skin, and MAN up. Tragic given the beauty and power that is inside us.

Opening an encouraging company in the center of an industry that tells them they are less-than is like putting TNT into an immovable mountain. Major impact! Bam.

To date, I have raised a small amount of funding to simply begin advertising Lily Inc. so people know it exists. These funds have been used to get graphic design help and to cover the Business Plan competition fees. This next round will enable me to really make Lily Inc. come alive!

Other Ways You Can Help

I am so glad you are checking out this campaign. Even if you can't help fund it, please let people know about Lily Inc. Also, go ahead and see our website for more specific ways you may be able to volunteer, or even to partner with me!

story:
JOIN THE MOVEMENT AND BE A PART OF HELPING LAUNCH A 100% RECYCLABLE , MADE IN USA FLIP FLOP THAT WILL SPREAD AWARENESS AND GIVE 20% OF ALL SALES TO CHARITY!!!!! 

 

 

THE PAST 

We had the idea, A GREAT IDEA!  Empowering and igniting the masses to get involved in spreading awareness for many causes that affect a broad spectrum of individuals. By offering a product that will allow supporters to make a cause driven fashion statement! The BONUS - IT'S FUN & IT'S STYLISH! INVITING ALL TO FLIP YOUR FLOP FOR A CAUSE!                                                              

THE PRESENT

We are six months into the life of Healthy Souls Apparel and we have experienced an unfathomable momentum and overwhelming support on our mission and vision . The word of our brand and awareness spread so quickly, and soon even though we received  feedback that our product was extremely comfortable the next logical discussion was on how to improve our product even more and to make it even better based on supporters feedback. 

We didn’t want our product to just represent these causes, but we wanted to offer the most durable, high quality product that would be manufactured with environmentally responsible materials. We didn’t want to be a part of the problem, but rather a part of the solution. We realized that our approach to  manufacturing was creating a lot of waste and product materials were being imported. So we decided to do something to change all of that.

THE FUTURE

We have now partnered with a manufactuer that is not only environmentally responsible, but they will make all of our products using 100% recyclable materials and they will do it all HERE IN THE UNITED STATES. It's Healthy Souls dream to be a catalyst to how business is done and products are offered. Impact from the beginning, change lives along the way, be environmentally friendly, and YET have it all produced and manufactured in the USA. 

This is where you come in! 

We are now in the process of moving forward to bring all of this into reality and releasing our new 2013 line of flip flops with our new supplier.  It is the vision of Healthy Souls to offer a flip flop high in quality, durability, 100% recyclable materials and made in USA all the while spreading awareness. 

It is your support that will fund all start up costs with new manufacturer, costs for setting new machines, product design and product samples and materials for the 2013 launch.

So join the Healthy Souls movement and walk with us to impact the world!

 

 

BELOW ARE JUST A FEW IMAGES OF SOME OF OUR CURRENT PRODUCT THAT WILL BE USED AS PERKS. TO SEE OUR FULL LINE OF FLIP FLOPS AND CAUSES, VISIT       www.healthysouls.org

 

 

 

CLEAN WATER 

ARMED FORCES
 
 
CHILD RESCUE FROM SEX TRAFFICKING 
 
AUTISM AWARENESS
 
PREVENTION OF CHILD ABUSE
 

BREAST CANCER AWARENESS

 

HEALTHY HEART 
 
 
 
THE PLANT INTERNATIONAL 
 
 
VATERS SYNDROME 
 
 
 
DIABETES AWARENESS
 
 
 
 
 
 
GOT CONCERNS ? 
 
 
WE ARE IN A VERY UNQIUE SITUATION - we have current product available for perk fulfillment on levels that utilize our current 2012 line enabling us to ship your perks as soon as funding is successful.
 
With the rewards that give from our new product line we are making the commitment that our contributors will be the priority in receiving the 2013 line at completion. The Healthy Souls Team is committed to being transparent, honest, and consistent in communication with all contributors during the product fulfillment phase. It is YOU that will help us achieve our dreams and impact the lives of many! Something we do not take lightly at Healthy Souls.

story:
** NEW - EARLY BIRD PERKS ADDED - 6/27 **

 

The Story of the Doggie Doo All

Hello fellow dog lovers!

WOOF, WOOF, WOOF!!!

We're Laura Vorreyer and Lawrence Jordan, aka Team Doo All, and WE LOVE DOGS!

Laura has been a professional dog walker and pet sitter in the Los Angeles area for the last 10 years. She completely enjoys working with dogs.  Honestly, the only part she dislikes is picking up after them and really, who likes that?

Lawrence is a film editor by trade, having worked in Hollywood for over 20 years. He has also has a background in marketing, creating web properties, and working with social media since its earliest beginnings. 

 

AN A-HA! MOMENT 

It's pretty simple, really.

Out on a dog walk one day, Laura realized what was missing from the standard leash attachement which dispenses only a poop pick up bag was something she could clean her hands with. As a mom she had been using sanitizing wipes for years and loved their ease and convienience. So she went out to purchase an attachment which included a bag AND a wipe, but to her surprise, nothing like it existed. She began thinking, "Why don't I develop this myself?"

So she began to work on developing the Doggie Doo All. As a single Mom and on the budget of a dog walker, she wasn't getting very far. It was quite frustrating knowing that she had a really great idea but no way to bring it to market without funding.  She was determined to move forward an inch everyday and figure out a way to bring her product to the marketplace.  She began to work on market research and prototypes and joined inventor groups.  Still, she was frustrated, it seemed that without a miracle, she wouldn't ever see the Doggie Doo All come to life.  

In 2012 Laura met Lawrence and they fell in love. It just so happened that he also shared her passion for the product and they decided to partner and bring the Doggie Doo All to market together.

AND THE DOGGIE DOO ALL WAS BORN!

The Doggie Doo All is a CONVENIENT, lightweight, easy to use, refillable leash attachment which dispenses a poop picking up bag AND a hand sanitizing wipe. Nothing like it exists in the market place and we have a patent on it.

The wipe can be used in so many ways besides wiping your hands.  Like, wiping your dog, your shoe, your shirt...really any thing you want to clean quickly. 

WHERE WE ARE AT

We have been bootstrapping the development of the Doggie Doo All 100% ourselves. We haven’t received any financial assistance from Angel Investors, Venture Capitalist or rich parents. We are completely out of pocket for everything we have created and developed to date.  This includes the US patent on this one of a kind, never been done before leash attachment. 

  • We have secured a patent
  • We have completed the design and mechanical drawings
  • We have partnered with a LOCAL manufacturer who will tool the molds and produce the product.
  • We are continually building our social media platform and presence
  • Our marketing plan includes producing a varity of web spots that will entertain, engage and convert customers!

Your pre-orders and contributions will go directly to these costs and to getting the Doggie Doo All into the hands of the dog owners, literally!

WE NEED YOU!  WOOF! WOOF! BARK!

The costs of manufacturing will run $50,000 +, this includes making the molds for the Doggie Doo All and creating the exact size wipes and bags which will fit snugly into your refillable Doggie Doo All.

Our perks include the opportunity to pre-order the Doggie Doo All, Doggie Doo All stickers, bag and wipe refills and of course our never-ending gratitude. In addition, we are excited to offer 3 generous contributors the opportunity to feature their furry children on our packaging and on our website.  WOOF!

We're very excited about our perks as we are giving all contributors, even if you don’t have a dog, an opportunity to participate in this Indiegogo campaign.  We invite you to share it with your friends and family. 

It is our sincere desire that dog lovers and dog owners all over the world will fall in love with the Doggie Doo All and will contribute to our campaign.  We truly believe this is a product whose time has come and believe if more humans pick up then more pets will be welcome to join them in places only humans can go for now.

We are partnering with Independent Labrador Retriever Rescue and will be donating a portion of our proceeds from future revenues to this wonderful rescue organization.

It's our dream to make the lives of dogs and the people that love them better!

Please contribute generously and become a part of the Doo All team.

Doggie Doo All, We think you'll agree; it comes in handy.

With our sincere gratitude,

Lawrence & Laura

The Doo All Company

A big WOOF! And a slobber too!!!

The Story of the Doggie Doo All
Hello fellow dog lovers!
WOOF, WOOF, WOOF!!!
We're Laura Vorreyer and Lawrence Jordan, aka Team Doo All, and WE LOVE DOGS!
Laura has been a professional dog walker and pet sitter in the Los Angeles area for the last 10 years. She completely enjoys working with dogs.  Honestly, the only part she dislikes is picking up after them and really, who likes that?
Lawrence is a film editor by trade, having worked in Hollywood for over 20 years. He has also has a background in marketing, creating web properties, and working with social media since its earliest beginnings.
