story:
The Style With a Purpose clothing swap is quickly approaching. We are raising some funds to cover incidental costs. Anything we earn above and beyond our needs will be divided between our Agency Partners. 

 The money will be used to buy event bags, storage bins, gas for the moving truck and other similar items. This money is not being used to pay for SWAP staff labour as everyone has volunteered their time. 

 We don't need much, we'd be forever grateful if you helped us reach our goals!

 

Introducing A Mindful Clothing Swap, With Proceeds Going To Women In Need

 

We are so excited to share a new project that truly inspires us.  We are producing an event that will connect like-minded women in Vancouver through fun, community contribution and a love of having something new to wear.   Lots of women have a ton of great clothing sitting in the back of their closets, which never get worn.  At the same time, there are many women living in the Downtown Eastside that don’t have access to the necessary clothing for life.
Meanwhile, the clothes remain sitting in the back of our closets... 

 

We have been hosting swaps for the last 7 years.  It started with a handful of friends and grew into a small community.  Attendees purge their closets by pulling out items that they haven't worn in a while and know that it's time that they parted ways.  These pieces get pooled with the others and are arranged by apparel categories.  On “the go” everyone choses the new garments they would like to take home.  This is the fun part… free clothes!  Not everything is taken and we fill bins of unclaimed apparel to give away, often to half way homes.  We can only imagine what we could contribute, with hundreds of attendees.

 

 The format for this February’s event will be:  Swappers will drop off a bag of clothes and apparel items prior to the event so they can be categorized and racked.  Additionally, each guest will be asked to give one business or business casual outfit to be allocated to our agency partners serving women in the Downtown Eastside.  By event day, we will have collected a bag of apparel for the swapping portion of the night and an outfit for women in need from each guest.  Upon arrival at the SWAP on February 12th, contributors will receive a bag to fill for themselves and if they wish to acquire more items, a second bag can be purchased for $20.  We are committed that there will be lots of great clothes available to swap as well as hundreds of outfits, apparel items and cash proceeds delivered to our agency partners.   

 

SWAP is gearing up to be one of the biggest Clothing Swaps Vancouver has ever seen, taking place at the Old Boneta Space 1 W Cordova St on Tuesday February 12th, 2013 at 6pm.  Our goal is to have 200 women attend, swap and have fun while amassing hundreds of outfits for women in need.  We are working with: The Downtown Eastside Women’s Center, Crabtree Corner and WISH.  We are focusing our production on three components:

1)      Acquiring outfits for women entering or re-entering the work force.  A selection of those outfits will be unveiled and celebrated during our fashion show.

2)      Creating a compassionate awareness around women in need.  Guest speakers representing our agency partners will speak at the event about their organization, the women in their communities and be on hand to answer any questions.  A “Host Your Own Swap” postcard will be given to each guest to encourage future, mindful swaps.

3)      FUN and connection.  Women of many different shapes, styles and sizes will be connected through their contribution while making new friends and scoring some great threads.

If you are unable to attend but want to contribute, please shoot us a cash contribution.  We need the money to pay for gas for pick ups, pay for SWAP bags, cover any unresolved start up costs, which are minimal AND the rest will be given to our Agency Partners along with the clothes and apparel.

This is a community project that will inspire us to recycle our clothing and give it a new purpose. 

Style With A Purpose. 

The SWAP Team

story:
WHAT IS NEMESIS?

Nemesis is the first of Zenit Miniatures games, set in the fantastic world of Miter, where creatures, heroes, alchemists and mysterious beings dwell, where its towns grow, develop, fight and sometimes disappear without trace.

 

                                ARMIES

ORPHANS  

Little bugs. Little children. Nobody knows. The only truth is they don't want anybody in their forests, disturbing their games.

 

ROCAVIVAS  

They have been living in the deep jungle, and under it, for centuries, never worried about the rest of Miter. But the rest of Miter is now interested in them. In fact, interested in their wealth. Naive, soon they'll learn to fear those "little women".

NOT ALIVE   

They can move, they can think... but they are not alive. Experts of the ancient science of Serifans, live is the only mistery they are interested on. And will find it. No matter if they have to vivisect every creature in Miter.

 

THOUSAND FACES CULT   

Barbarians, monsters and beasts. In the volcanic islands of the Interior Sea, there is no place for weakness. Every newborn must survive to the implantation of the rocks. Every child must survive to the proofs asigned by their strict parents. Every adult must become a warrior.

 

KINGDOM OF GOD    

It is said there is a god. Only one god. It is said Queen Joana hears his words. And in their duty to show the truth to every people in Miter, they will be capable of destroying it all.

 

 

 

 

 

WHY THIS CAMPAIGN?

After three years of creating hundreds of groups of players, more than one hundred and fifty models, we have begun to prepare the second edition of our rules book, (Spanish and English) but now we would like to make it with full color illustrations.

Apart from that, we want develop a new race for this game "The Nephalites". This campaign has also the objective make this new race real. 

To do this, we need your help in funding the necessary work of making models and illustrations, join us to keep creating the universe of Nemesis and continuing its development.

 

WHAT WILL YOU GAIN BY HELPING US?

For supporting our project, you will receive some of our products in exchange as well as our most grateful thanks.

In each one of the "perks" you can choose the product you want. When the campaign ends, we will send everyone a message to let you know what we have chosen.

If we reach our goal, everyone who has participated in acquiring one of the "perks" will receive a free figure, which will be created during this campaign.

 

4000 gift

If we reach 4000$, all perks of I want to Fight an higher will get "The Preacher" the first Nephalite miniature for free.

 

6000 gift

If we reach more than 6000$, all perks of I want my ARMY an higher can get for free one extra miniature among Great Gladiator, Flautist, Sword woman, Soul slayer and Rocaviva heroine.

If your perk includes more than one Army Box you can choose one miniature for each Army box you get.





 

WHAT WILL HAPPEN WHEN WE REACH OUR GOAL?

¡¡A free exclusive figure for all contributors!!

For this occasion, we will make an exclusive figure that will be sent by free to all those who have contributed. To everyone! no matter which "perk" you have chosen.

In addition, all the backers who help us reach our goal will also get a back of markers for free.

 

For those who have been playing Nemesis for a long time, and have their own armies, the usual starter packs’ content of every perk can be replaced by other 6 or less miniatures, of similar price ($45). Same with army boxes ($110). That way, also our old friend will be able to help us to get our GOAL. Only have to go to our Online Store http://shop.zenitminiatures.es/ to choose your miniatures.

 

THE TEAM OF ZENITMINIATURES THANKS YOU ALL
FOR YOUR SUPPORT AND TIME.

We are sincerely grateful to all those who believe in our projects and keep supporting us to move forward, without your help nothing would be possible.

THANK YOU AND WE HOPE TO SEE YOU IN MITER.

 

HERO

If  your perk includes a hero, you can choose one human size hero from our catalogue or from the official web-site of Zenitminiatures http://nemesis.zenitminiatures.es/en/.

 

STARTER PACKS

If your perk includes a starter pack, you can choose  one of the following ones.

 

ARMY PACKS

KINGDOM OF GOD

1 Abbes, 1 Valerius, 2 Zealots, 3 Iluminati ( one exclusive ), 2 Swordmens, 1 leader Swordmen, 1 Catapult, 1 Resin terrain.

NOT ALIVE

1 Rakio, 1 Specter, 5 Skeletons, 3 Graft ( one exclusive ), 3 Rotten, 1 Bones Golem, 1 Resin terrain.

ORPHANS

1 Zonik, 1 Boss, 2 Ants, 1 Ant leader, 3 Mantis ( one exclusive ), 2 Grasshopper, 1 Giant, 1 Resin terrain.

THE THOUSAND FACES CULT

1 mother hyena, 1 Kaesar, 3 Gladiators (one exclusive ), 2 Archers, 2 lionmen, 1 Troco, 1 Resin terrain.


       

                                             

                                                Rocavivas

1 Aie-mekela , 1 Arama , 2 Pebble , 2 Kyanites , 2 Diatomites, 1 Wathtower

story:
Overview - Tiny Style: Diary of a Baby Fashion blogger. A photographic exhibtion.

In March 2011 I started a blog called "The Tiny Sartorialist" about my son to keep my family overseas updated on his life - a blog was the easiest way as every can access it any time they want. The idea was to capture moments in that popular, street style fashion blog format. It is written from his perspective and is photography-based.

Within a month the blog was featured on Wordpress' Freshly Pressed homepage and has since been featured in large press outlets all over the world, including The Huffington Post (USA, was featured on the homepage).

I have decided to do an exhibition after encouragement from friends and followers. I have printed and framed 18 of the most popular photographs as well as 25 smaller behind-the-scenes photos and will be including notes and captions written from the perspective of my son.

The exhibition will be held at Shairspace in Sydney on 10 June from 3-6pm. 


The idea behind the exhibition is to:

  • To hold a family-friendly cultural event. I will have a pram valet and refreshments for children. I feel that there is still a gap in the market for arts and culture related events for children and families.
  • To show the more empowering and positive side of motherhood. I believe Tiny Sartorialist shows what things you can do with children - not what you can't. 


Funding required

I want to be able to make it happen my way, so am hesitant to solicit sponsorship for this initial event and would benefit from funding to get it off the ground. I would like to use this then as a benchmark and look into bringing to other locations and cities with sponsorship.

Here's the cost breakdown:

  • Printing 18 images at $15 per print
  • Printing 25 images at $2 per per print
  • $500 for promotional material - stickers and posters
  • $500 for design costs. An amazing designer designed my posters free of charge and I would like to pay her.
  • Framing 18 images at $190 per image. The frames need to be custom and have acrylic instead of glass so they can be easily moved.
  • DJ, refreshments and entertainment for the event
  • Printing pram valet tickets

The Impact

You are helping me:

  • Make it happen
  • Make it amazing
  • Keep it independent
  • Spread a positive message
  • Hold a cultural family friendly event in Sydney

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't make a financial contrubition here are some other ways we could use help:

  • Pram valet volunteers for 3-6pm on 10 June
  • DJ or entertainment - think you can entertain people for a while?
  • Refreshments in kind - have a bunch of leftover juice or cookies handy?
  • Spread the word - tell your friends and come out and attend :)

story:
Hexoskin Smart is a sensor-embedded smart shirt that monitors and records your heart rate, breathing, and movement whether you're awake or asleep. It provides valuable insights on intensity and recovery, calories burned, fatigue level, and sleep quality. Hexoskin connects to your favorite Bluetooth Smart compatible apps and devices (Hexoskin supports the BLE HR profile). All of your data is stored securely, allowing you to see how your physical fitness is evolving over time.

Hexoskin Smart is a great alternative to bulky heart rate monitors that can quickly get uncomfortable in many situations. Our shirt is made out of fabric imported from Italy, is extremely comfortable, durable, odor-resistant, and even safe to use in contact sports.



Hexoskin Smart connects natively to a wide range of GPS sports watches, allowing you to leave your phone at home.


Yes, we're back! As you may remember, we brought you the World’s First Biometric Smart Shirt in 2013, with an amazing response here on Indiegogo that saw us reach 166% of our goal! We’re now bringing you Hexoskin Smart, the World’s First Biometric Smart Shirt compatible with your favorite fitness tracking apps like Strava, Runkeeper, Runtastic, Endomondo, and MapMyRun. We appreciated your support in 2013 so much that we decided that you should be the first to benefit from the discounted launch price of our newest technology: Hexoskin Smart.



Boxer Sarah McFarlane training with Hexoskin at the Australian Institute of Sport


To help you know more about your health

You probably know more about your car's health than about your own. That’s crazy! We're on a mission to change this. We want every human being on Earth to be able to collect and share their health data anywhere, anytime. This is why we created the Hexoskin smart shirt. Join us in helping shape the future of smart clothing, and revolutionizing the way people take care of their health. Claim your perk now!



Ariane Lavigne, Olympic Snowboarder, monitors her breathing during her yoga sessions


Your Hexoskin Smart device starts collecting high quality data as soon as it’s plugged into your shirt. All of this data is securely synced to the cloud so that you can review it on your dashboard, download it, and even share it with others, such as your coaches, your healthcare professional, and even your loved ones.


Alex Sy praises the precision of Hexoskin's data and the fact that he can share his data with his coach.

To see your data in real time, you can simply pair your Hexoskin to a Bluetooth Smart compatible device, such as your smartphone, tablet, GPS sports watch, or bike computer. While the Hexoskin app will display your full cardiac, breathing, and movement data, 3rd-party apps like Strava and Runkeeper will mostly use Hexoskin Smart as a Heart Rate Monitor (HRM), displaying and recording your heart rate. We recommend that you keep using the app that you’re most comfortable with.

Data Flow

Your data is collected by the sensors embedded in the shirt and sent to the small Hexoskin Smart device that sits discreetly in your side pocket. This device records all your raw data, whether or not you have your phone nearby. When you have a phone or tablet in range, the Hexoskin Smart device will stream your data in real-time to your phone’s display.


If your phone is connected to the internet by Wifi or a data plan, your data is also sent to our servers, where it is securely stored. This allows you to review your data whenever you want.


We've worked all year long to design new hardware that now includes a Bluetooth Smart chip. This new technology opens up Hexoskin to be used with your favorite 3rd party apps, devices, and platforms, allowing you to use world's most comfortable and accurate wearable heart rate monitor without changing your habits.



See your vitals on your Apple Watch and other Bluetooth Smart compatible watches


Hexoskin compatible apps

Seamlessly integrate your Hexoskin data into your favorite fitness apps such as Runkeeper, Strava, Endomondo, MapMyRun, Runtastic, etc.

“We are pleased that Hexoskin smart clothing is now compatible with Strava,” remarked David Lorsch, VP Strategy & Business Development at Strava. “When paired with Strava, Hexoskin Smart will help our users better understand their athletic performance and recovery.”


Hexoskin compatible devices

Don’t want to bring your smartphone on your next run or ride? No problem! If your bike computer or sports watch is compatible with Bluetooth Smart heart rate monitors, then you're good to go with your Hexoskin Smart shirt and device, without any other device!

Compatible devices include the Tomtom Runner, the Suunto Ambit3, the Wahoo line of bike computers, and more!



Thibaud Friess uses Hexoskin to manage his recovery while training for Marathons and Iron Man events.


Hexoskin is the ultimate tool to:

  • Optimize your performance and recovery, whether you’re a high-end athlete, an avid runner, a cycling enthusiast, or just casually practice your favorite sports;
  • Analyze your sleep efficiency thanks to heart rate, breathing rate, and movement tracking during your sleep sessions;
  • Get to know more about how your body behaves during various life events, in stressful or exciting situations, for instance.


See live cardiac, breathing and movement data on your phone or tablet and get activity reports



New York Times
"For runners who don't want to be encumbered by smartbands and chest straps, Hexoskin is a body metric system with several sensors woven into a shirt that measure heart rate, breathing, steps, pace and calories."

Sports Illustrated
"These shirts are designed to give athletes the same sort of data they could get from a performance lab—for example, heart rate recovery and lung capacity—but in more natural environments and without needing to be hooked up to a machine."

Yahoo
"The Hexoskin tank top can do anything a wrist-worn wearable is capable of with the added benefit of spot-on lung capacity readings, measured by its breathing sensors."

WIRED
"Well, wearables are about to explode into an array of novel, single-function devices. They will suit discrete situations rather than peeling off multiple functions from your phone—it’s use-case engineering. Think of activity-specific clothing, like Hexoskin, that monitors workouts."

Huffington Post
"T-shirts and trousers that will be able to measure our health parameters in the most convenient way. Keep an eye on: Hexoskin."

Digital Trends
"Hexoskin is a great product, capable of accurately tracking an array of biometric data."

Live Science
"With this shirt, there's no need to strap on a fitness tracker."

Bike Rumor
"When a heart rate monitor just won’t cut it, there is a new crop of “smart shirts.” More than simply a heart rate monitor, Hexoskin’s Smart Shirts use built in sensor technology to monitor Heart Rate Variability (HRV), breathing rate, minute ventilation, Heart Rate Recovery, Cadence, even an estimated Vo2 max and more."

Here are a few screenshots of what the activity reports within the Hexoskin app look like. Some activities, like Running, Cycling, and Sleeping have specific reports.

Running

Are all runs created equal? We know the answer is no, but what makes a good run, and how does one run compare to your others? By using the Running Activity in your Hexoskin app, you’ll get answers to these questions and more. On top of being able to view your running route drawn on a map, distance ran, and pace, you can see the calories burned during your run, your heart rate (HR,) your HR zones and how long you were in each zone, and your breathing volume. Remember: the more you breathe, the faster and further you can run.



Hey developers, you're going to love working with Hexoskin! We've got you all set up with an API that allows you to query specific bits of data, and an SDK is coming up soon so that you can access Hexoskin data wirelessly and in real-time with your own app. How cool is that?

More than 200 developers are already hacking away at Hexoskin data using our API, and we're looking for more to develop new applications for Hexoskin on various types of devices: smart watches, glasses and other head-mounted displays, and mobile platforms.

Join our developer community by emailing us at: api@hexoskin.com

Hexoskin's sensors gather an insane amount of information about your body (42,000 data points per minute). All that information is available on demand and allow you to get valuable insights about your health:

  • Designed and assembled in Canada;
  • Shirts are made of high-quality Italian textiles;
  • Quick dry, breathes, featherweight, anti-odour, UV protection;
  • Open API so you can download all the data and use with other apps;
  • Bluetooth Smart connectivity with most smartphones and tablets;
  • Heart rate, RR intervals, fatigue, and stress indicator (Heart Rate Variability;)
  • Breathing rate and breathing volume;
  • Activity intensity, peak acceleration, steps, and cadence;
  • Analog 256Hz ECG data;
  • Analog dual-channel 128Hz breathing sensors;
  • Analog 3D 64Hz acceleration;
  • 30+ hours of battery life, 600+ hours of standalone recording.


Hexoskin connects to Android and iOS phones and tablets.


2006 - The brainchild of our two co-founders, Pierre-Alexandre Fournier and Jean-François Roy, Hexoskin started as an idea over 10 years ago. Since 2006, our team has been conducting extensive Research & Development to bring you the World’s Leading Smart Shirt.

2011 - Our big break came when we were awarded with our first contract from the Canadian Space Agency (CSA) to provide a smart shirt for astronauts living aboard the International Space Station. This contract jump-started an ongoing relationship between the CSA and Hexoskin for the continued development of technology in order to prepare for human space exploration. It also opened doors for contracts with other reputable organizations such as NASA, and other government agencies.

2013 - Our first commercial smart shirt, Hexoskin Classic, went into production following a successful launch through our Indiegogo crowdfunding campaign, backed by government agencies, professional sports associations, wearable technology enthusiasts, casual athletes, and more from across the globe!

Since then, we've shipped thousands of Hexoskin shirts and devices around the world to athletes, coaches, researchers, mad scientists, miners, astronauts, adventurers, and people like you and me who would like to know how our body performs and recovers in different situations and environments.

Hexoskin users include:












  • Jan. 4 2016 - Indiegogo Campaign launch at CES!
  • April 2016 - Delivery of the first batch of Hexoskin Smart bundles
  • May 2016 - Delivery of the second batch of Hexoskin Smart bundles
  • June 2016 - Delivery of the last batch of Hexoskin Smart bundles

Download our Media Kit from here or contact us at press@hexoskin.com


Send your questions to: support@hexoskin.com

Q: I already own a Hexoskin shirt, do I need to buy a new one?
A: Not necessarily. The new Hexoskin Smart device is compatible with all existing Hexoskin shirts; however we have made some enhancements since our first Hexoskin shirt was released in 2013.

Q: Is my data secure with you guys?
A: Of course! We believe in mutual trust, and security is an important requirement! Your data is always encrypted before it is uploaded.

Q: How long does the battery last?
A: The battery lasts 30+ hours on a single charge. It only takes 30 minutes to charge the device up to 80%.

Q: Can I backup my data?
A: Sure! You can download your data anytime from our web dashboard. You can also sync it with Tapiriik, if you're interested.

Q: Can I use Hexoskin to perform a diagnosis?
A: No, Hexoskin is not FDA approved and should not be used for diagnosis or therapy. You can, however, provide the data to your healthcare practitioner for review.

Q: Is there a cost for the apps? What about data storage?
A: Our Hexoskin apps are totally free of charge, as is the storage of your data on our servers!

Q: Will Hexoskin connect to my Android phone?
A: Of course! The Hexoskin app runs on Android and iOS, giving you information on your cardiac activity, breathing and movement. You can also use Hexoskin with your favorite fitness app as a Heart Rate Monitor.

Q: Which apps are compatible with Hexoskin Smart?
A: Here is quick list which we will update continuously: Runkeeper, Strava, Runtastic, MapMyRun, Endomondo. Basically if your fitness app accepts to pair with a Bluetooth Heart Rate Monitor such as a strap, then Hexoskin will work too.

Q: Can I wash my Hexoskin shirt in the washing machine?
A: Yes, use cold water, set to gentle cycle, and line dry.

Q: Can I choose any gender and any size for my shirt(s)?
A: Yes. We will ask you which gender and size you need when the campaign ends, but you can already take a peek at our size charts here.

story:
Introducing Wander


Why the word Wander?

When we think of the word 'wander', we think of freedom to express ourselves and our feelings which we now refer to as #letthelovewander

People are often concerned with how they are perceived which limits their true desire to be happy.

Our goal is to have Wander build a community that is synonymous with kindness and positivity.

Material

We make all our bracelets with semi-precious gemstones. 

The reason we started with gemstone is because each gemstone has specific spiritual properties that promote energy healing and positivity which coincides perfectly with our #letthelovewander mission.

All our products include 14k Gold Filled beads, 14k Rose Gold Filled beads, .925 Sterling Silver beads, Rhodium plated beads, and CZ Diamond beads.

Craftsmanship

We've spent the last year sourcing the highest quality semi-precious gemstones from all around the world to offer you unparalleled quality.

We've studied ancient jewelry making techniques to handcraft each Wander product to stand the test of time. 

Fair Pricing

By selling directly to you online we are able to cut our costs and return that money back to you by offering you our premium accessories starting at 75% less than our luxury brand counterparts.

Our #letthelovewander mission


We started Wander Jewelry because of our desire to help connect and encourage people to be more thoughtful and caring to those around them.

Jewelry has always been a symbol of affection so Wander offers you a perfect opportunity to not only wear something stylish for every occasion, but to also pay it forward with a special act of kindness every single time you purchase a Wander product.

We've always loved accessories, but finding affordable high quality pieces that last has always been a struggle.

Accessories with the same level of quality as Wander typically retail starting at $300-$400 and go up into the $1000s for each product. 

We want to change that. 

We want to help change the world one person, one message at a time so we have lowered our prices to have an even greater impact by having more people involved in our mission.

What We Need & What You Get


Your contributions will allow us to turn our dream into reality. Your initial pledges will go towards funding the supplies for our first large production order. 

By being one of the first to purchase our accessories you are getting a reduced price as a show of our appreciation for helping us on our journey to spread our #letthelovewander mission.

As much as we love your pledges, we'd also love it if you can share our campaign with your friends and social networks to help us reach as many people as possible.


Something as simple as clicking the social share buttons at the top left of the page and promoting our campaign on your networks can really go along way in getting our accessories exposure and helping us try to make the world a better place. 

How do I select a specific style after I've paid for my pledge?


Once you've paid and filled out all your information we'll email you within 24-48 hours with a reference number and directions to our website so you can select the exact product and size you want.

Once on the website you will be able to select between Men's and Women's styles.


How do I giveaway a free bracelet?


Once you've made your payment you have to think of someone that you'd like to give the bracelet to. 

We want you to really take the time and say why that person means a lot to you so that when they read it they are truly happy and touched.

You'll have to upload any image to your Instagram account and tag that person so they can see that you wrote something special about them.

You also have to tag us @wanderjewelry so that we know exactly who to contact regarding the free bracelet. If you do not tag us we will not be aware of your post and will not be able to find the person to give them their free bracelet.

Since our accessories won't ship for 6-8 weeks following the end of the campaign you can get started uploading images right now without wearing our products and we will deliver the free giveaway bracelets at the same time we ship all your pledges.


Sizes


You can pick your size after you've made your purchase. You'll be able to do this when you are selecting your specific style bracelet.


Please Note


Delivery Times

Since our products are made by hand it will take 6-8 weeks following the completion of our campaign before we start shipping your products.

If we experience a higher than expected sales volume, shipping can possibly be delayed. We will keep you updated if the situation arises.

Duties

If you live outside the US you will be responsible for any duty/ VAT charges.

Customs

Some countries have slower customs processes than others so if your packages are held up and shipment is delayed we apologize, but unfortunately it does happen at times.



Other Ways You Can Help


If you love our message and love what we stand for, but you can't financially contribute, you can still help contribute to the greater good by sharing our message on your social networks!

You'll have to upload any image to your Instagram account and tag that person so they can see that you wrote something special about them.

You also have to tag us @wanderjewelry so that we know exactly who to contact regarding the free bracelet. If you do not tag us we will not be aware of your post and will not be able to find the person to give them their free bracelet.

Since our accessories won't ship for 6-8 weeks following the end of the campaign you can get started uploading images right now without wearing our products and we will deliver the free giveaway bracelets at the same time we ship all your pledges.



Sizes

You can pick your size after you've made your purchase. You'll be able to do this when you are selecting your specific style bracelet.



    Please Note

Delivery Times

Since our products are made by hand it will take 6-8 weeks following the completion of our campaign before we start shipping your products.

If we experience a higher than expected sales volume, shipping can possibly be delayed. We will keep you updated if the situation arises.

Duties

If you live outside the US you will be responsible for any duty/ VAT charges.

Customs

Some countries have slower customs processes than others so if your packages are held up and shipment is delayed we apologize, but unfortunately it does happen at times.    
Other Ways You Can Help 
If you love our message and love what we stand for, but you can't financially contribute, you can still help contribute to the greater good by sharing our message on your social networks!

story:
Greetings Everyone!!

   My name is Denejah, owner of online store Fashion Snob Boutique. I'm a 24 year old young ambitious woman from the heart of Brooklyn, NY with so many dreams & ideas to share with the world that im ready to burst!!!


What is Fashion Snob Boutique??

    Fashion Snob Boutique is an online store that caters to men & women who go insane with "An Exaggerated Respect for Fashion"! This store means the WORLD to me because it shows my peers & myself just how dedicated and determined I am to be the best I can be in life. It will also help me to accumulate funds to provide my family a better way of living.


How can YOU help?? 

   Your contributions, no matter how small you may think It Is, will help a great deal!! With your help I can start up a business that I plan to turn into multiple store fronts throughout the U.S.A in the future. I believe with the right help such as, promoting via blogs, Facebook,  YouTube channels, word of mouth etc., that Fashion Snob Boutique can become something extraordinary.  

Anything would be greatly appreciated.  Thank you for your time.......SPREAD THE WORD!!!!!!

story:
Ever wish to receive advice from a professional stylist like celebrities do? Well, now you can and it’s completely free! Just upload a pic wearing an item you are interested in and we will get back to you in minutes. A certified professional will comment on whether the item suits you, suggest the right accessories, make-up, footwear etc., etc. To top it off, you will receive detailed information about the outlets where the same or similar items can be purchased for less! A real must have app for all style-conscious ladies!

How many times has your shopping experience turned into a frustrating dilemma about whether a particular item suits you or not? How many times have you come back home with a newly bought pair of shoes only to place it deep into the corner of your closet until you have something to go with it? How many times have you stood in front of your full closet with the only thought of ‘I have nothing to wear‘? Well, we have all been there, but there’s no reason why we should continue to be! From now on a professional advice of a real stylist is no longer just a privilege of the rich and famous!

A new revolutionary solution for all diva-wannabees – a free consultation from a professional stylist straight on your smartphone screen!



Just imagine being in a shop and trying on a beautiful dress. However, you cannot make your mind up about whether it suits your body shape, personal style or your existing wardrobe… Not a problem, we are here to help! Simply take a pic of yourself in the dress, upload it onto our app and a few minutes later you will receive a personal response from one of our professional style gurus. The stylist will not only assess your overall look, but also assist in finding a matching pair of shoes, accessories, make-up and hair-style. Moreover, you may even receive an advice where you could find the same or very similar outfit for less! All of that is available in minutes and, most importantly, for free!


Now consider another no less rare scenario: a few years ago you purchased a skirt yet you cannot recall ever wearing it. You like the skirt enough not to give it away to a friend, yet you simply have no clue what to wear it with. Not a problem, as we can help you solve this problem too! Just take a pic of the skirt, post it onto our app and wait for a timely response from our team. The stylist will not only evaluate your personal style, but also provide advice on the appropriate foot wear, accessories, make-up and hair-do. Moreover, you will receive professional suggestions with regard to complete outfits available for less! As simple as that – a pic, an upload, a tailor-made advice! In minutes, completely free of charge!


Our new app – your new best friend and advisor when it comes to your personal style! No mood-swings nor charges!

And whilst being in the midst of the launch process, we are asking you, our dear ladies, for your help and support!


WHY IS IT REVOLUTIONARY AND UNIQUE?

There are many fashion apps out there which offer you to form your wardrobe based on computer suggestions. But there are no apps where true professional stylist can evaluate your look and suggest best options based on his experience, knowledge and, most importantly, according to your shape, age and interests.

There are many fashion apps out there which offer you to purchase expensive designer clothes. Our app will offer you to purchase only at the cheapest price and only if you request to. We are here not for selling, we are here for consulting and helping you to feel and look good!


PERKS

The Big Thank You: $1

Our biggest thank you for believing in our project and supporting us!

Styled!: $5

You get 2 minutes face-to-face professional consultation with a personal stylist via video chat. We will help you style the look, suggest what to wear, what haircut and make-up fits you best. Ask us anything you want! + THE APP beta (est. June 2015)

Styled+!: $10

You get 5 minutes face-to-face professional consultation with a personal stylist via video chat. We will help you style the look, suggest what to wear, what haircut and make-up fits you best. Ask us anything you want! + THE APP beta (est. June 2015) + THE APP alpha (est. September 2015)

Styled++!: $20

You get 10 minutes face-to-face professional consultation with a personal stylist via video chat. We will help you style the look, suggest what to wear, what haircut and make-up fits you best. Ask us anything you want! + THE APP beta (est. June 2015) + THE APP alpha (est. September 2015)

Styled+++!: $30

You get 15 minutes face-to-face professional consultation with a personal stylist via video chat. We will help you style the look, suggest what to wear, what haircut and make-up fits you best. Ask us anything you want! + THE APP beta (est. June 2015) + THE APP alpha (est. September 2015)

Styled++++!: $50

You get detailed personal styling lookbook based on your shape, age and interests which includes best looks for office, party and everyday wear together with best haircuts and make-up tips for each occasions. + All the Styled+++ options! + One of a kind fashionable T-shirt from organic material designed by your request from selected innovative prints

Styled+++++!: $100

You get detailed personal styling lookbook based on your shape, age and interests which includes best looks for office, party and everyday wear together with best haircuts and make-up tips for each occasions. + You get 30 minutes face-to-face professional consultation with a personal stylist via video chat. We will help you style the look, suggest what to wear, what haircut and make-up fits you best. Ask us anything you want! + All the Style+++ options!

Styled++++++!: $200

You get detailed personal styling lookbook based on your shape, age and interests which includes best looks for office, party and everyday wear together with best haircuts and make-up tips for each occasions. + You get 60 minutes face-to-face professional consultation with a personal stylist via video chat. We will help you style the look, suggest what to wear, what haircut and make-up fits you best. Ask us anything you want! + All the Style+++ options!



PROJECT SCHEDULE

March - April 2015     Perks completion

May 2015                     Desktop version launched

June 2015                    The App beta for iOS launched

July 2015                      The App beta for Android launched

September 2015        The App alpha for iOS and Android launched

story:
Short Summary

Affordable Pampering!!

   Treat yourself to the luxury of a high end Day Spa at a fraction of the cost.

                Isis Day Spa will provide a soothing environment where relaxation and rejuvenation are soothing to your body and your wallet. Our menu of relaxation starts with an array of massage packages, rejuvenating spa packages, including face and body peels, and Greco-Egyptian-styled hot tub experiences. Contributors like you are not only helping to build the facility quickly and efficiently, you're also helping to motivate small business owners to continue pursuing their dreams. Thank you for your contributions, belief and support!

What We Need & What You Get

               Your contribution will support us in creating a tranquil space fashioned in the times of Cleopatra. From the moment you enter our spa, your senses are transported into another era and the worries of the present are left behind. Our equipment will only enhance the ambiance in our specially decorated pools rooms, sauna rooms, and massage rooms. In order to create such a beautiful and calming space, Isis Day Spa is raising $250,000 in order to open in excellence. Upon completion of this campaign we will be able to finish renovations, decor and open our doors on March 24th!

We have some wonderful PERKS to offer all of you who support us no matter how                                                Large or small your contribution!!!

Donate $1 and you will receive a special shout out from us on our Facebook and Twitter pages

Donate $10 and we'll send you an Isis Day Spa stress ball!

Donate $25 and receive a 25% Discount Card.

Donate $150 and you will receive an Isis Day Spa gift card valued at $50.

Donate $2500 and receive a Day Spa Package for 4, and recognition of your gift acknowledged on the home page of our website.

Donate $25,000 or higher and receive options for company buy-in (percentage to be agreed upon by both parties).  Please call Vanessa Simmons at (815)793-6915 for additional information.


 The Impact

               Isis Day Spa is a relaxation hub for the community. Get an amazing massage or sink into a jetted pool after a long day on the job.  Our affordable pricing makes the decision to de-stress, a bit easier.  We're in the neighborhood!

               Isis Day Spa will give back to the community by training and employing top students from local massage therapy schools.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Spread the word!! Share our campaign with your friends!!

story:
ATtiny ISP Shield makes programing AVR ATtiny bare Chips easy and simple and also helps shrinkfy your arduino projects 

You can now Order from htlinux.com

Introducing the ATtiny ISP Shield! 

Port your small Arduino projects to a low cost chip easily.
ATtiny ISP Shield is a programing tool used to program bare for

8 Pin IC's like ATtiny13, ATtiny15 ,ATtiny25, ATtiny45, ATtiny85.
14 Pin IC's like ATtiny24, ATtiny44, ATtiny84.
20 Pin IC's like ATtiny2313, ATtiny4313.
28 pin IC's like ATMega8, Atmega128, Atmega328 using ISP header.


Inspired by :

Thanks to Kai Bader for initial source by (CC-BY-SA 3.0) License

and

http://highlowtech.org/?p=1695

Here is the video for How-To Shrinkify Your Arduino with great explanation

 

Featured On http://www.open-electronics.org/only-few-more-days-to-support-attiny-isp-shield/


Update : 27-Jan-2015

We thank you all supporters on Indiegogo campaign made this happen.  

ISP Shields are almost got ready we will begin shipping end of this week( From 1st Feb-2015). we notify through Email with shipping reference when completed.

Update : 18-March-2015
You can now Order from htlinux.com
Here is the snap of ISP Shields before shipping.  Shipping has been done on the First Week of March. ISP Shields will be reaching destinations soon.



How it all began:

We always loves  Arduino because Arduino is powerful and flexible, Arduino IDE and libraries can be used from miniature to mega scale projects.  Some projects just don't want the power of a full fledged ATmega328.  If you need to make a thermostat relay controller or a simple start up timer for your appliances.  ATmega's is big for that, the ATtiny is more than enough for the task.

If we need to program ATtiny chips we need breadboard with jumper wires with proper pin diagrams  valuable time connecting the breadboard to arduino board with jumpers. and we need to do that every project.

The problem is that trying to program a bare ATtiny looks like the picture below.  Also you need to remove the chip from your connected circuit each time you want to upload a new sketch disturbing the jumpers and troubleshooting when programing next time..


Working with a bare ATtiny85 is a little bit hassle!


To over come  this troubles we have designed a ISP shield compatible with standard Arduino boards. Fits in a quick snap and ready to program your attiny chips in fraction  of seconds. It turns out your arduino in to powerful programmer for your bare arduino chips. without hassle free jumpers and breadboards. 

Here is the little tool, ATtiny ISP Shield.


Features
  Easy to use 5.6cm X 3.6cm Shield with 8 Pin , 14 Pin, 20 Pin IC Sockets.
  Compatible with standard  arduino boards.    
  Can be use with standard Arduino IDE.
  Easy to assemble.
  Saves lot of time ,moneyand energy.
  With use of ISP header you can program the chips within the project board.
  Open Source Hardware!
   
Open Source...for life!


Open source hardware is a huge part of the Arduino and it's all about people helping people.  This is a great concept and the ATtiny ISP Shield will be available for everyone.  The goal is not to make money, but rather bring the ATtiny capability to all Arduino users.  All design files and schematics of the product will be available to the public upon successful funding of the project goal.

Earlier prototypes


Where are we at Now?
We are pretty much done with the R&D.  Final prototypes are made and verified working.  The last thing is that colors of the final PCB board and IC Sockets are subject to change.  Let's see where we are at:
Prototyping Design and testing...All DONE and ready to reach your hands!



Why we are Here
The latest prototype revision board works, and it works great!  What is left is to get a bunch of them made and get them out to the Arduino community.  That is where I need your help.  Money raised from indiegogo  will go towards sourcing boards, obtaining components and getting shipping supplies.  The different levels of pledges will allow users to get anything from a bare board, to a complete working board ready for you to prototype with and get started shrinking your favorite Arduino projects to the ATtiny!


Comments, suggestions, welcome!

As part of the Open Source Community, I welcome any comments or suggestions you might have to help improve the ATtiny ISP Shield. 


Q:What will be shipped with the ATtiny ISP Shields.

A:The ATtiny ISP Shield versions which include assembled components and will ship with the instruction manuals.

Q:  Do I need an ISP programmer to use this?

A:  No   Most Arduinos can act as an ISP programmer.  No worries, if all you have is an Arduino UNO and this Shield  you will be able to to program the ATtinys and ATmegas!

Q:  Do I need to pay extra for shipping?

A:  No  the pledged amount includes the standard international shipping. if in case some countries charge extra other than calculated. we will intimate through email. but most cases we will not charge extra. as he have already confirmed with the shipping agents.


Risks and challenges Learn about accountability on indiegogo

The risks and challenges are minimal. I have been working with electronics for over 15 years and am comfortable with designing, sourcing, packaging, and shipping electronics. The prototype works, and it works well. I am confident about this being a home run in all aspects when the project is funded. The main challenge is if this project doesn't reach it's goal, then nothing will move forward. Let's ensure this doesn't happen.

story:
Video by Sandy Chase/Fluid Film

The Homecare Safety Institute is a nonprofit organization whose mission is to educate Caregivers, Families, Contractors, Healthcare Professionals and Therapists with the knowledge and resources to create safe and secure home environments for Seniors and those suffering with dementia, especially Alzheimer's.

As Founders, our team (see below) has made it our responsibility to take on the challenge of creating educational programs, videos, and an accredited lecture series to share our knowledge of Aging In Place techniques with emphasis on Alzheimer's Proofing The Home. 

Major corporations will work with us to distribute this self help television and internet special to viewers worldwide. These room-by-room video guides of essential projects, products, and techniques will set the bar for Home Safety.

Once funding is obtained, the Institute will produce videos that will be geared directly for use in the homes of Alzheimer’s patients and their caregivers.  Videos will start with “How to Assess Your Home’s Safety and Accessibility” and then highlight specific areas and products that can be used throughout the home as the patient’s Alzheimer’s Disease progress. As Alzheimer’s patients' needs change, so do the home safety needs of the caregiver.

The videos will be about lighting, kitchen design, bathroom design, and flooring ..to name a few. By adjusting these areas in your home, your seniors will be able to remain in their living quarters. These downloadable videos will be free of charge and user friendly. They can help prevent a number of common accidents that may occur around the house. 

We are asking you for your donation to help raise the money necessary to film this content. Please help us in our crowd funding effort.


ABOUT US

Bruce Barnet, Chairman

With 40 years of experience in residential development, contracting and finance, Bruce now leads a family run business, Healthcare Products, LLC.  Their Internet based company is the global leader in supplying products to healthcare professionals for those suffering with many forms of dementia, especially Alzheimer's.  Bruce will use his background to attract the finest talent and sponsors to enhance the goals of the organization.

Ted Bickoff

Ted is President of Access Life, a company that specializes in modifying homes for seniors, patients with Alzheimer’s disease and people with limited abilities.  He has presented seminars throughout the Northeast and Florida on “Creating Safe Home Environments for Independent Living”, “Fall Prevention” and “Alzheimer’s Proofing Your Home”.  He is certified by the National Association of Homebuilders as a Certified Aging in Place Specialist.  Ted is an active Board member contributing his vast experience in creating the specials, educational videos and a National Education department. 

Susan McWhorter Driscoll

Susan Driscoll is the Dean of the Stafford School of Business at the University System of Georgia's Abraham Baldwin Agricultural College.  Through 1997, Susan served as a Marketing Director for The Coca-Cola Company.  Susan founded Ignition, a global marketing service company, which was sold to Havas Sports and Entertainment in 2012.  In 1997, Susan founded McWhorter Driscoll, LLC, a creative business solutions company.  As a Board member, Susan contributes her marketing expertise to the awareness of our National educational program.

Eric Hall

Eric is currently, President and CEO of Health Care Chaplaincy.  Through 2013 Eric led the Alzheimer's Foundation of America as the Founding President and CEO.  In that position he authored and executed a strategic plan to grow the AFA to be the 2nd largest not for profit organization in the Alzheimer's field, with over 1,600 affiliate organization.  Eric will use his proven experience to allow HSI grow nationally to bring "Aging in Place" education along with Senior Lifestyles concepts to the forefront in America.

Jane Hanson

Emmy award winning television journalist and media coach Jane Hanson has spent over 30 years in broadcasting.  Most recently she hosted a daily entertainment and lifestyle program, New York Live, for NBC4 in New York City.  She has worked for the NBC Networks for over 30 years.  Jane is an active Board member contributing to the creation of the educational specials. Jane has a personal interest in educating the public as her mother passed away from Alzheimer’s in 2012.

Hanson has her own consultancy business-- among her diverse array of media and presentation training clients: top tier leaders of financial institutions; publishers and editors in chief of numerous national magazines; key opinion leaders in the pharmaceutical industry; internet entrepreneurs; and celebrity chefs.  She has also hosted programs on cable channels and private satellite broadcasts, covering nearly every subject, from health care to finance to religion.  And she is a frequent speaker, emcee, and panel moderator.  

Tyler Barnet

Tyler Barnet is an ad-tech specialist in Manhattan strategizing and deploying Fortune 500 marketing programs on the Real-time Bidding Exchange.  He has previously been a part of Publicis' VivaKi holding company, CNN and Turner Broadcasting and in 2012 co-founded NOODLER, which launched txt-book.com and SoANNoYING.com.  As a board member, we will be utilizing Tyler's knowledge to oversee the professional team hired to saturate our message throughout the internet.

BUDGET


TIME FRAME

The following is our projected calendar of benchmarks. 

1) Campaign Start Date - July 28th, 2014!

2) 60 days later Campaign Ends on September 26th and within 2 weeks the project is funded (approximately October 11th) - September 29th Homecare Safety Institute signs contracts with the production company and shooting is ready to begin within 60 days, December 2014;

3) HSI will have a list of houses we will be working on for different projects. We will choose the houses and modify the existing script accordingly, at that time.

4) Our team will do all the pre-production arrangements (i.e. locate the products and trades necessary to redo the areas of the home that we will modify: bathroom, kitchen, ramp, doorways, lighting, etc.);

5) Arrangements with networks as to when and where it will air, as well as discussions with additional sponsors;

6) 60 days are over and we are ready to shoot;

7) PRODUCTION: 2 weeks maximum lasting until roughly the end of December;

8) POST PRODUCTION: Final editing at the beginning of 2015.

9) Videos will be ready for distribution on the web and can be uploaded to any web site for educational purposes only, not for resale.

10) Timing for the show to air on a major network to be decided in 2015.

11) Based on a successful campaign Homecare Safety Institute will be launch a follow up campaign to do more elaborate Educational videos for the purpose of distributing to Certified Aging in Place specialists throughout the country to conduct seminars for Caregivers,Social workers,Contractors and Neurologists. These seminars with our videos will be with Continuing Education credits.


Explanation of Perks

(Right to substitute perk of equal value based on availability)

Up to $49 Perk

Donors get their name on the Scroll of Honor on the Homecare Safety Institute website.

$50-$149 Perk (20 "I Have A Condition" Cards)

These subtle, dignified cards are for you and your loved one and can be used to alert staff, waiters, and other personnel, and other individuals that there is a condition that requires a little extra time and patience when providing certain information.


$150-$249 Perk (Invisible Cabinet Lock)


These clever locks are invisible from the outside of the cabinet. Once installed the cabinet door can only be opened by placing the magnetic knob on the outside face of the cabinet in just the right spot - then the door unlocks and opens freely. Two locks and one key with each set. 


$250-$499 Perk (Key Pad Entry Alarm)

Prevent a family member from leaving the home unnoticed. This door alarm is similar to those seen in healthcare facilities that sound a loud alarm at the door if anyone tries to exit without punching in the right "secret" code. The KeyPad Door Alarm will sound any time the door is opened without entering the secret 4-digit code. Set it on "instant" to sound immediately or on "delay" to allow you to enter from the outside and still have enough time to enter the code without the alarm going off.

$500-$799 Perk (Complete Guide to Alzheimer's Proofing Your Home)


This book is a comprehensive, practical guide for helping in-home caregivers and health professionals to evaluate the home environment and make modifications enhancing safety and function. This book offers numerous ideas on every page, each with the potential to solve some small yet vexing problems. Author: Mark L. Warner


$800-$1000 Perk (DVD Sets): The Art Of Caregiving and Progression of Dementia, Seeing Gems-Not Just Loss


 

Teepa Snow is an occupational therapist and noted speaker and consultant in the area of dementia. She has over thirty years experience in geriatrics. The combination of Teepa’s been-there-done-that skills and her formal training as an Occupational Therapist give Teepa the credibility and experience to help caregivers with tried-and-true solutions. Teepa’s philosophy is based on years of medical research and making mistakes first-hand so perfecting a positive approach to caregiving. Her teaching style integrates facts about the brain and how it works, or doesn't work in the case of dementia, while going in and out of character as a typical person with Alzheimer’s who has anxiety and behavioral problems.

$1001-$5000 Perk (Toilet Overflow Alarm)


The Toilet Overflow Alarm and Control Valve attaches easily to a tank toilet to make sure it shuts off before it overflows. Two AA batteries and ten minutes of installation (no need for a plumber if handy) will make sure that your toilet will never overflow again. Save thousands of dollars in potential damages.


$5001-$10,000 Perk (Door Mural)

MADE EXCLUSIVELY AND ONLY BY ALZSTORE: These high resolution, full color door murals camouflage the door, making it appear to be a set of shelves, rather than an exit. Often, wandering from the safety of home to the dangers of the street is simply a matter of taking advantage of an opportunity – “There’s the door, let’s go.” But if the door is not so recognizable, the likelihood of opening that door and heading “home”, is significantly reduced, if not eliminated. Use these door murals to improve safety and reduce attempts to wander out of the home.

Product Features:

  • Size: 3'-0" x 6'-8"
  • Full Color
  • Material: Class A, Fire-rated Polyvinyl
  • Attaches with peel off adhesive
  • Self-adhering, Removable

$10,000 and Up Perk (Calendar Day and Date Clock)

This oversized (17"x 17") contrasting color clock is easy to read and designed for the senior eye that is losing its cognitive abilities. This flip over calendar with analog face has no digital confusing lights. Battery operated, the clock is ready to go right out of the box.


***Disclaimer: Bruce Barnet and Tyler Barnet are both members of Healthcare Products, LLC which owns The Alzheimer's Store.***

story:
Citrus ties believes in the implementation of ideas emanating from the individual and reaching the crowd.
For this reason, we are starting a campaign to raise funding from the public, by means of which we want to cover some of the costs required for the development of our project, namely, the purchase of raw materials for the next collection, the creation of a website and e-shop, and the establishment of a showroom to display citrus ties.

  • Purchase of new materials

For the selection of the fabric which will be used to sew each citrus tie, we do research in various shops and warehouses. Each fabric is selected based on its uniqueness and quality. Apart from the cost of raw materials, this research also entails transportation expenses - sometimes even outside Attica.


  • Website and e-shop development

Upon completion of the campaign, we would like to create our website and e-shop in order to display our citrus ties collection. www.citrusties.com 

  • Establishment of showroom

For all those who would like to meet us, or come to see and try our ties, we would like to establish a showroom where they will be able to do so.

  • Development of women's collection - head- and neck scarves 

If we surpass our initial goal, we will have the opportunity to develop our women’s collection of head- and neck scarves, using equally unique fabrics.


At Citrus ties we like to plan our next steps. Planning enables us to set realistic goals in the development of our venture and control the level of their achievement.  

To date, we have invested in Citrus ties so as to produce the current collection *(autumn - winter 2014-2015).

This investment is broken down in sewing machines, raw materials (textiles and metal elements) and packaging construction. The investment which has been made so far will hopefully be recouped from future sales.

By means of the financial campaign, we would like to cover first its expenditure and then the cost of the raw materials of the upcoming collection (spring - summer 2015), as well as to start developing the women’s collection of head- and neck scarves, made of unique fabrics.

The amount that we aim to collect will be allocated as follows:

a. Purchase of raw materials (30%)

b. Creation of a website and store (15%)

c. Establishment of a showroom (30%)

d. Campaign expenses (15 ~ 20%)

Campaign expenses include the cost of IndieGoGo platform (5-9%) and the cost to run the campaign - photoshooting, video, reciprocal cost (about 10%).

All these bring us to the amount of 10,000€.

If we manage to surpass this goal and reach 15,000€, we will fund the research and the materials for the new women’s collection, not to mention a crazy party to celebrate our success!
