story:
Thanks to all who helped with this campaign!  I'm working on a second one to expand my product lines, check it out at http://www.indiegogo.com/rewondered2

Repurpose – What are we doing here?

The results relied upon for this campaign will allow Rewondered to replenish resources and receive revenue, in order to reveal new product lines and wedding designs using repurposed materials, reclaim supplies that are in storage, reconnect with customers and fans in person, redesign formal wear and wedding dresses, and rediscover new markets.

Rewondered – What is Rewondered?

Rewondered is a one-woman handmade fashion business specializing in items for anyone who wants to express their style in a distinctive and unconventional fashion.

When I decided to start my own business, I wanted it to express my creativity, as well as do some small part to save the world (I'm not a superhero in real life, but I play one online). I started designing jewelry using a variety of new and used materials, old broken pieces, found objects, leftover craft supplies, and anything else I thought was interesting. I try to reuse and recycle as much as possible, thus keeping perfectly good objects out of the landfills. I love taking something that could be considered “junk” and “rewondering” it into something... well, wonderful.

I have been planning to expand my product lines for some time, but Rewondered took a bit of a back seat when I relocated to New Hampshire last summer. However, I now have a studio restored and I'm ready to start reinvigorating my business. I'm getting remarried in August, and plan to make as much of the attire and decorations for the wedding as possible, so these designs will also be incorporated into my new product lines. In addition, I'm planning to start a line of “rewondered” wedding and prom dresses. I would love to create one-of-a-kind pieces for other brides and special occasions. A once-in-a-lifetime day deserves a once-in-a-lifetime dress!

Request – How Can You Help?

My campaign here on Indiegogo respectfully requests your assistance in helping me get these product lines made and available for sale. I think everyone deserves to express their own distinctive style however they wish, and it's my goal to provide them with products that can help them do so. I love doing custom work, and particularly look forward to helping brides bring their vision of their perfect wedding to life.

There are several phases to my plans for Rewondered, and this campaign's goal is to raise money for the first phase, at least. Additional funds raised will allow me to implement additional phases. All money raised will go toward Rewondered's expansion plans and operating expenses. If I don't reach my fund-raising goal, I'll implement as much as I can and any leftover monies will pay for things like listing fees and supplies.

Reveal – Phase 1

I'll be adding pictures to the gallery here of my new designs as I get them made, with a goal of one new item for each day of the campaign.  Here are just a few of the new product ideas I'm working on: earrings, bracelets, corset jewelry, corsets and waist cinchers, shrugs and jackets, skirts, tutus and petticoats, bustles and overskirts, vests, jabots and neckties, fabric and paper flowers, brooch bouquets, boutonnieres, framed text-based art prints, veils, fascinators, wedding favors, decorations, key chains, photo booth props, “flair” (buttons or pins), and various bags. Posting 500 new products on Etsy will cost me $100 for listing fees and one year of my online store subscription is about $240. I will need ink for my printer, labels, cardstock, and plastic bags to create tags and packaging, as well as mailing supplies. I'm estimating another $160 for these. Total Reveal phase: $500.

Reclaim – Phase 2

When I moved to New Hampshire, most of my supplies were put into storage in Ohio. This includes tons of old jewelry and beads, scrapbooking paper and embellishments, clothing (including some formal dresses), fabric, miscellaneous craft supplies, and some furniture that I could use in my studio. Phase 2 is reclaiming these supplies and moving them from Ohio to New Hampshire. I am estimating this will cost around $500. Total Reclaim phase: $500. Total of Reveal + Reclaim phases: $1000.

Reconnect – Phase 3

The next phase is connecting to my customers in person. My goal is to have a table or booth at at least one convention, festival, or fair each month. I would love to return to Ba-Con, which is at the end of June. I am estimating that vending fees and travel will cost approximately $350. I am planning on appearing once a month (June-October) at the Concord Arts Market. This will cost me $200, plus I will be required to have a 10x10 canopy with 25-pound weights for each leg, which I found on Amazon for $188. I'll be looking for things I can buy used and/or repurpose for displays, such as garment racks, wire cubes, jewelry displays, hangers, and mannequins. I'm not sure exactly what I need until I figure out what products I want to take to the shows, so I'll estimate $262 just to bring me to an even $1000 for this phase. Total Reconnect phase: $1000. Total of Reveal + Reclaim + Reconnect phases: $2000.

Redesign – Phase 4

This is where I implement the Rewondered Wedding Dress product line. Three adjustable dress forms (small, medium, and large), will give me the ability to customize to a wide range of sizes. These will cost around $300. A portable washing machine that I can use to dye fabrics will cost about $100. I'll need a supply of wedding dresses I can alter, so a $500 shopping spree at various thrift stores should net me 5-10 dresses to start with. I'll also need additional material, trims and embellishments, thread, zippers, etc. so I'm adding another $500 for supplies. Total of Redesign phase: $1400. Total of Reveal + Reclaim + Reconnect + Redesign phases: $3400.

Rediscover – Phase 5

While all of the above will help me get my name out there, I'll still need to do some advertising. I want to become a Lifetime Member of OffbeatBride.com ($50) and get listed as a vendor for one year ($345). I've received some good traffic from Facebook and Google ads, so I'd like to try spending $100 a month on each for six months ($1200). Total of Rediscover phase: $1595. Total of Reveal + Reclaim + Reconnect + Redesign + Rediscover phases: $4995

Repercussions – What will fully funding this campaign accomplish?

What this will do for me is get my business off its training wheels and riding down the big hill without fear. My dream is to run Rewondered full-time and actually make a living at it.

What this will do for my customers is get them something uniquely “them” at an affordable price. Those who own my necklaces often get complimented on them. And those who get one of my Rewondered Wedding Dresses can be confident that they are getting a truly unique dress, custom designed to their taste and style, and they're not breaking the budget to get it!

What this will do for the world is keep more items out of landfills. I will also be offering designs to various charities that I believe in, which they can auction off for their cause, as well as creating special signature pieces where the proceeds will go to a specific charity.  Eventually, when I no longer need to reinvest every penny into my own business, I plan to invest in other people who are trying to start a one-person handmade business on their own.  My ultimate goal is to give back everything I earn through this campaign, and more, to others like me.

What this will do for you....

Rewards – What's in it for you?

Ah yes, the perks! First of all, everyone who contributes at least $5 will have my Regard and receive a special thank you tweet from @Rewondered on Twitter or a thank you post on Rewondered's Facebook Page, as well as their name listed on a special thank you page on my website. Everyone who contributes at least $10 will receive a $25 gift certificate which they can Redeem in my Etsy shop or online store.

Then we get into the items I will custom make for you.

  • For a $20 contribution, you can choose a necklace or a bracelet, custom made for you with up to 20 charms or beaded sections, or a Rewondered upcycled bag.
  • For a $25 contribution, I will send you an autographed 8x10 from my photo shoot last December (see the gallery for options), and a 2-minute recording of me reading from one of the erotica stories by Teresa Noelle Roberts.
  • For a $50 contribution, you can choose between a custom made Rewondered skirt or floor-length tutu, or a 75-piece photo booth prop package, consisting of new, repurposed and handmade items.
  • For a $100 contribution, you can choose either two bouquets or two centerpieces (or one of each), custom made from a variety of materials such as fabric, paper, brooches, beads, wire, or whatever else your imagination can think up.  I'll work with you to make something truly "you"-nique.
  • For a $500 contribution, you will be one of the first to get a customized Rewondered Wedding Dress (or other formal attire) or a customized Cosplay Outfit or costume of your choice.
  • For a $4995 contribution (and thus funding all 5 phases) I will Rewonder your entire wedding. This includes ensembles for the wedding party, such as dresses, jackets, vests, veils or fascinators, headbands or other hair accessories, jabots or neckties, and jewelry. It also includes bouquets, boutonnieres, centerpieces and other decorations, wedding favors, invitations, and programs. I am restricting this to ONE person, with a wedding party of no more than ten people (any combination of brides, grooms, attendants, parents, officiants, etc. In other words, your choice of up to ten people total), a guest list of no more than 200, and a wedding date of no earlier than October 2012 (so I actually have time to work with it in addition to my own wedding in August). You also must agree to provide pictures of your wedding and allow me to use them for promotional purposes (so be sure to discuss that with your photographer, or get some really good candids).  I will also be posting on my blog about my progress on what I'm making for your wedding.  Here is your chance for a handmade wedding, using as many repurposed materials as possible, for a bargain price!
  • For a $10,000 contribution (and more than doubling my fundraising goal, not only will I Rewonder your entire wedding as above, but I'll also be your wedding planner, day-of coordinator, and deejay.  I'll work with you online via email and instant messagers, and over the phone, then travel anywhere in the 48 contiguous United States one week before your wedding for fittings, helping with last minute details, and setting up decorations. This is restricted to ONE person, with a wedding party of no more than 10 people, a guest list of no more than 200, and a wedding date in 2013 (except August) or later.  Same rules about photos and promotion apply.  Since I'll be there, I'll be taking some of my own photos as well, and will share them with you.  The additional funds over my goal will pay for my travel and lodging for your wedding, allow me to move everything now in storage to New Hampshire, purchase additional items to rewonder and more supplies, and do more advertising.

Redistribute – How else can you help?

One great way to help is to spread the word about my campaign to everyone you know through Facebook, Twitter, email, or however else you want to communicate.

Another is to contribute your unwanted jewelry, craft and sewing supplies, fabric, trims and embellishments, clothing, wedding and prom dresses, costume pieces, curtains, blankets, home decorations, and any other items you think might be useful to me. I don't care if it's broken, ripped, or out of style! Do you have a 10x10 canopy you're not using? Something that will make a good display piece? Adjustable dress forms, portable washing machine, sewing machine, or serger? Things I could use to make the perks I've mentioned? If you live within a 2-3 hours drive of Hillsborough, NH or along the route between there and Columbus, OH, I can arrange to pick things up. Otherwise, talk to me about arrangements for shipping.

You can also check out the products I currently have for sale in my Etsy shop and online store. Feel free to pin the stuff you like on Pinterest or share it on Facebook or Twitter! Also check out my website, like my Facebook page, follow me on Twitter and Pinterest, and subscribe to my blog.

And don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you for taking a look at my campaign, and thank you for your contribution (monetary or otherwise).  I very much appreciate it!
story_txt:
Thanks to all who helped with this campaign!  I'm working on a second one to expand my product lines, check it out at http://www.indiegogo.com/rewondered2
Repurpose – What are we doing here?
The results relied upon for this campaign will allow Rewondered to replenish resources and receive revenue, in order to reveal new product lines and wedding designs using repurposed materials, reclaim supplies that are in storage, reconnect with customers and fans in person, redesign formal wear and wedding dresses, and rediscover new markets.
Rewondered – What is Rewondered?
Rewondered is a one-woman handmade fashion business specializing in items for anyone who wants to express their style in a distinctive and unconventional fashion.
When I decided to start my own business, I wanted it to express my creativity, as well as do some small part to save the world (I'm not a superhero in real life, but I play one online). I started designing jewelry using a variety of new and used materials, old broken pieces, found objects, leftover craft supplies, and anything else I thought was interesting. I try to reuse and recycle as much as possible, thus keeping perfectly good objects out of the landfills. I love taking something that could be considered “junk” and “rewondering” it into something... well, wonderful.
I have been planning to expand my product lines for some time, but Rewondered took a bit of a back seat when I relocated to New Hampshire last summer. However, I now have a studio restored and I'm ready to start reinvigorating my business. I'm getting remarried in August, and plan to make as much of the attire and decorations for the wedding as possible, so these designs will also be incorporated into my new product lines. In addition, I'm planning to start a line of “rewondered” wedding and prom dresses. I would love to create one-of-a-kind pieces for other brides and special occasions. A once-in-a-lifetime day deserves a once-in-a-lifetime dress!
Request – How Can You Help?
My campaign here on Indiegogo respectfully requests your assistance in helping me get these product lines made and available for sale. I think everyone deserves to express their own distinctive style however they wish, and it's my goal to provide them with products that can help them do so. I love doing custom work, and particularly look forward to helping brides bring their vision of their perfect wedding to life.
There are several phases to my plans for Rewondered, and this campaign's goal is to raise money for the first phase, at least. Additional funds raised will allow me to implement additional phases. All money raised will go toward Rewondered's expansion plans and operating expenses. If I don't reach my fund-raising goal, I'll implement as much as I can and any leftover monies will pay for things like listing fees and supplies.
Reveal – Phase 1
I'll be adding pictures to the gallery here of my new designs as I get them made, with a goal of one new item for each day of the campaign.  Here are just a few of the new product ideas I'm working on: earrings, bracelets, corset jewelry, corsets and waist cinchers, shrugs and jackets, skirts, tutus and petticoats, bustles and overskirts, vests, jabots and neckties, fabric and paper flowers, brooch bouquets, boutonnieres, framed text-based art prints, veils, fascinators, wedding favors, decorations, key chains, photo booth props, “flair” (buttons or pins), and various bags. Posting 500 new products on Etsy will cost me $100 for listing fees and one year of my online store subscription is about $240. I will need ink for my printer, labels, cardstock, and plastic bags to create tags and packaging, as well as mailing supplies. I'm estimating another $160 for these. Total Reveal phase: $500.
Reclaim – Phase 2
When I moved to New Hampshire, most of my supplies were put into storage in Ohio. This includes tons of old jewelry and beads, scrapbooking paper and embellishments, clothing (including some formal dresses), fabric, miscellaneous craft supplies, and some furniture that I could use in my studio. Phase 2 is reclaiming these supplies and moving them from Ohio to New Hampshire. I am estimating this will cost around $500. Total Reclaim phase: $500. Total of Reveal + Reclaim phases: $1000.
Reconnect – Phase 3
The next phase is connecting to my customers in person. My goal is to have a table or booth at at least one convention, festival, or fair each month. I would love to return to Ba-Con, which is at the end of June. I am estimating that vending fees and travel will cost approximately $350. I am planning on appearing once a month (June-October) at the Concord Arts Market. This will cost me $200, plus I will be required to have a 10x10 canopy with 25-pound weights for each leg, which I found on Amazon for $188. I'll be looking for things I can buy used and/or repurpose for displays, such as garment racks, wire cubes, jewelry displays, hangers, and mannequins. I'm not sure exactly what I need until I figure out what products I want to take to the shows, so I'll estimate $262 just to bring me to an even $1000 for this phase. Total Reconnect phase: $1000. Total of Reveal + Reclaim + Reconnect phases: $2000.
Redesign – Phase 4
This is where I implement the Rewondered Wedding Dress product line. Three adjustable dress forms (small, medium, and large), will give me the ability to customize to a wide range of sizes. These will cost around $300. A portable washing machine that I can use to dye fabrics will cost about $100. I'll need a supply of wedding dresses I can alter, so a $500 shopping spree at various thrift stores should net me 5-10 dresses to start with. I'll also need additional material, trims and embellishments, thread, zippers, etc. so I'm adding another $500 for supplies. Total of Redesign phase: $1400. Total of Reveal + Reclaim + Reconnect + Redesign phases: $3400.
Rediscover – Phase 5
While all of the above will help me get my name out there, I'll still need to do some advertising. I want to become a Lifetime Member of OffbeatBride.com ($50) and get listed as a vendor for one year ($345). I've received some good traffic from Facebook and Google ads, so I'd like to try spending $100 a month on each for six months ($1200). Total of Rediscover phase: $1595. Total of Reveal + Reclaim + Reconnect + Redesign + Rediscover phases: $4995
Repercussions – What will fully funding this campaign accomplish?
What this will do for me is get my business off its training wheels and riding down the big hill without fear. My dream is to run Rewondered full-time and actually make a living at it.
What this will do for my customers is get them something uniquely “them” at an affordable price. Those who own my necklaces often get complimented on them. And those who get one of my Rewondered Wedding Dresses can be confident that they are getting a truly unique dress, custom designed to their taste and style, and they're not breaking the budget to get it!
What this will do for the world is keep more items out of landfills. I will also be offering designs to various charities that I believe in, which they can auction off for their cause, as well as creating special signature pieces where the proceeds will go to a specific charity.  Eventually, when I no longer need to reinvest every penny into my own business, I plan to invest in other people who are trying to start a one-person handmade business on their own.  My ultimate goal is to give back everything I earn through this campaign, and more, to others like me.
What this will do for you....
Rewards – What's in it for you?
Ah yes, the perks! First of all, everyone who contributes at least $5 will have my Regard and receive a special thank you tweet from @Rewondered on Twitter or a thank you post on Rewondered's Facebook Page, as well as their name listed on a special thank you page on my website. For a $25 contribution, I will send you an autographed 8x10 from my photo shoot last December (see the gallery for options), and a 2-minute recording of me reading from one of the erotica stories by Teresa Noelle Roberts.

This includes ensembles for the wedding party, such as dresses, jackets, vests, veils or fascinators, headbands or other hair accessories, jabots or neckties, and jewelry. It also includes bouquets, boutonnieres, centerpieces and other decorations, wedding favors, invitations, and programs. Another is to contribute your unwanted jewelry, craft and sewing supplies, fabric, trims and embellishments, clothing, wedding and prom dresses, costume pieces, curtains, blankets, home decorations, and any other items you think might be useful to me. story:
Short Summary

Sawasdee ka. My name is Nut. I am the founder and designer of PHIORY. From the brand's motto; versatile beauty, my dream is to make leather handbags that are not only beautiful but are functional as well. Q is my latest model that is created with the L-Hub or Lifestyle Hub concept in mind. It is to design a bag that serves women with urban lifestyle well.

It took almost 7 months in developing this from just an idea to the perfect bag. Many samples were made in order to find a proper technique, design and material. Most importantly, after the production of each sample, I have used them in my daily life to find what needed to be improved and also to test how sturdy each bag was.

Now is the time to introduce my handbag to the world and I would love to have your support to make this comes true.

 

What We Need & What You Get

I have selected high quality leather and accessories in the making of Q. The cost of making this bag is considerably high and since I am the sole entrepreneur, I do not have a lot of capital to produce this bag commercially. If you love my bag and would love to support me, pre-ordering the bag will give me a chance to put this bag into a full production line and to be able to produce a good quality leather bag that is totally worth your spending.

Besides a special 15% off the original retail price from pre-ordering Q, you will also be part of the charitable campaign that I am currently participating in. For each bag, I will be deducting another 15%, taken from my profit, from the pre-ordering price and donate this sum to build an accident and emergency building for Maharaj Nakhonrajsima Hospital in Thailand on your behalf. Not only you will get a great beautiful handbag to use at a special price, you will be able to help those in need at the same time. Isn't it wonderful? :D

 

Risks & Challenges

The shading of the leather might be slightly different for each batch of production.

The risk of this project would be to receive your goods a little behind schedule, however I will try to prepare an early stage production while this campaign is running, so I hope to get the products shipped to you within the planned schedule, which is by the early of August.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute to this campaign, it does not mean that you cannot support my brand. Please support me by sharing this campaign to your beloved family members and friends.

Thank you so much for stopping by to find out more about my campaign. I hope you will love the product and give this a go.

Have a great day.

Nut PHIORY

story:
Inspired by the French lifestyle, Monsieur captures the essence of bold living with an eclectic taste for adventure.

 

 

Monsieur (French pronunciation: [mə.sjø]) aka Gentlemen etches throughout our watches as we believe that every gentleman deserves to celebrate their inner self and the watch is an extension of their outlook - Simple & Bold

It is your own signature piece – something that you wear so often that people end up identifying it with you.

 

 

 

 

 

 

A timepiece is not just an accessory but also to showcase a lifestyle. Monsieur proves that high quality does not come with a high price tag. We want to focus on a lifestyle that not only boosts an individual but also a collective representation of a gentleman’s essential.  

 

If it is to emit a certain emotion linked to the watch, you got it. Some of us wear it to simply tell the time, others wear it to showcase their worth. We match our wardrobe and pair accessories - a watch does that trick very well for men, to accentuate the essence of timeliness, precision, and boldness. 

The lifestyle of living in a modern society does not include being on a mobile device for hours but interacting with the world. Having a conversation with people you meet at the workplace, in a cafe or even on an adventure around the globe builds the character that defines a person.

 

Drawing inspirations from the classic sensibilities of French design, but updating and refining them in a sleek and contemporary package.

We want to focus on the minor details that will make the watch simple yet bold. The designing phase was a tough process as we ran through many prototypes to get the final design for production.

Hands are laser cut with precision. It sits on a matte dial with boxed numerals encased in a brushed stainless steel case.

Each leather strap is equipped with a quick release spring bar for a convenient swap when comes to changing straps.

Every single watch is rigorously tested and proven durable to withstand 5ATM. Sapphire crystal protects the dial while a signed screw on case back protects the heart of the watch.

Each watch comes with a 1-year warranty* and FREE silicone strap for the adventurous.

 

 

The ALLIAGE Series is inspired by the distinct alloy materials that birth the Gold, Silver & Bronze case we offer. We are defining champions amongst ourselves and that through our timepieces.

 

ALLIAGE SERIES GOLD: Bold hands pop against a discrete matte black dial framed with stylish and modernized numerals. Artistically placed accents match the noble gold case and signed crown, both cast in brushed 316L stainless steel. The gold is further complemented by a time-honored black band crafted from genuine leather.

 

ALLIAGE SERIES BRONZE: Bold hands pop against a discrete matte black dial framed with stylish and modernized numerals. Artistically placed accents match the dignified bronze case and signed crown, both cast in brushed 316L stainless steel. The bronze is further complemented by a time-honored black band crafted from genuine leather.

 

ALLIAGE SERIES SILVER: Bold hands pop against a discrete matte black dial framed with stylish and modernized numerals. Artistically placed orange accents match the clean silver case and signed crown, both cast in brushed 316L stainless steel. The silver is further complemented by a time-honored black band crafted from genuine leather.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

During our months of preparation and experimenting, we have experienced many setbacks due to manufacturing process and delivery. 

We have now partnered and working very closely with one the best manufacturers to produce a high-quality watch at the fraction of the price. We strive to create a product that not only of good craftsmanship but appealing to everyone. 

 

We have made sure that every watch is carefully inspected and tested before distribution. We will post regular updates from the start till the end of our campaign and would love to answer any questions backers might have.

Monsieur believes that customer relations are of the top priority to build a strong relationship with our valued backers. 

 

WE ARE READY TO SHIP! ARE YOU?

story:
Who We Are

Rose Blvd is a unique and distinctive concept for a line of modern streetwear clothing. With your support you can help Rose Blvd become a reality. We are a group of four high school students from Hamilton, Ontario in our final year of secondary schooling  attempting to realize and manifest our vision of a Rose Blvd clothing line.

What We Need & What You Get

Pre-Orders and Donations

  • Black and grey Rose X hoodies are available for pre-order as well as grey BLVD. crewnecks and will be shipped starting the week of December 10th 2017
  • Donations are also greatly appreciated

Our Vision

Our goal is to create a line of fashionable, unique, and comfortable streetwear created by youth to allow for a modern innovative designs

Other Ways You Can Help

If donations or purchases are not possible for you, you can still support our vision by sharing this Indiegogo page on social media. Your time, support and interest is greatly appreciated. We hope you can join us on our journey - Rose Blvd

Our goal is to create a line of fashionable, unique, and comfortable streetwear created by youth to allow for a modern innovative designs

Other Ways You Can Help
If donations or purchases are not possible for you, you can still support our vision by sharing this Indiegogo page on social media. Your time, support and interest is greatly appreciated. We hope you can join us on our journey - Rose Blvd

story:
No harsh chemicals or nanotechnology, those were our guidelines. We wanted to make a line of beautiful knitwear with outstanding natural performance. The Intelligent Everyday Sweater keeps the you cool as your body temperature rises, while the hollow fiber structures provide light-weight insulation when the temperature drops. 

 

Sweaty after that intense commute to work? Anyone?

We’re from Stockholm, Sweden - a place where the weather and temperature always are topics of discussion. Cold winters and warm summers. Blasting office AC:s and bursting elements.   For the last year we have been working to create an everyday garment that can keep us comfortable in these changing conditions.  


To make this vision a reality we knew that we had to team up with the best knitwear manufacturer out there. In the small town of Reggio Emilia, outside Parma we found Mauro and his team of skilled artisans. 

 

The Intelligent Sweaters are lightweight and knitted in 12 gauge. This makes them a great mid layer alternative. Throw it under a coat or your favourite blazer for a refined look.

 

 

 

 

We set out to challenge the established pricing model of today, where traditional luxury brands markup their prices up to 800%. Their business model includes distributors, agents, up-street retail locations and excessive marketing. As all these middlemen need their margin, the apparel ends up overpriced and silly expensive.

We decided to change that.

We believe that the this traditional model has to be updated and improved. By teaming up directly with our manufacturers, cutting out the middlemen and selling our products directly to you, we can now offer this luxury line of knitwear at factory direct prices.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

In May earlier this year we launched our first Kickstarter campaign. Since then we have been blown away with the response from you guys and we knew that we had to come back. This time we wanted to set the bar even higher!

 

 

 

 

 
ABOUT US

Grand Frank was founded to give men the opportunity to wear formal clothing without compromising with their individuality and personal style. Founder and CEO Erik Bergström was working in a corporate automative environment at the time, and struggled to find clothing and accessories which reflected his personality, indeed any personality. He decided to create it himself and Grand Frank was born.

Ever since then our company has been built around creating staple pieces in a man’s wardrobe with richer stories and greater personality. Our simply philosophy is that if you love what you’re wearing, you’ll feel great, easy as that.

story:
DUN FOLD - World's first contactless wallet - is a compact and beautiful premium wallet. Minimalist Dutch design makes clever use of contactless cards, so you can pay and commute effortlessly. Handmade in Europe from the finest top-grain leather.

 

 

DUN FOLD's quick slot..

optimises the use of your contactless cards, making it very easy for you to commute. 

DUN FOLD's 'RFID pocket'..

is lined with the best RFID blocking foil available. This pocket secures 1-2 cards against RFID skimming. The RFID pocket is positioned in the centre of the wallet so that the cards in the front and back pocket don’t interfere with each other; optimising the use of contactless payments.

Our signature cash strap.. 

makes sure that all international bill sizes fit without folding. In case you’re not using cash, you can fit an extra 2 cards behind the cash strap. The cash strap is also a great place to temporarily store a ticket, receipt or business card. 

 

The DUN FOLD has a unique tri-fold design that can keep all your essentials, but still remains very compact and discreet.

The minimalist design of the DUN FOLD works in unison with the gorgeous matte black leather and gun metal clip to create a modern elegant wallet. Handmade from top-grain calf leather, DUN FOLD’s quality is up there with the top luxury brands.

story:
LIVALL returns to IndieGOGO with new smart helmets. Click here to know more about the new smart helmets.


LIVALL Bling Helmet

LIVALL Bling Helmet is smart because it has built-in Windbreak Mic, 3-axis G-sensor, Bluetooth Speaker and LEDs on the top and back of the helmet. All these things together make our Bling Helmet extraordinary.



Media

“I have to admit, the helmet does look rather awesome, lights and all. For hardcore riders, the ability to communicate with other riders via walkie-talkie and to send emergency SOS messages will definitely be USP’s.” – T3

“The $356 smart helmet packs in Bluetooth speakers, walkie-talkie functions, a cadence sensor to measure activity, and a three-axis gravity sensor that can detect falls and send out an SOS alert to a Smartphone contact.  An included wireless remote clips to the handlebars and allows bikers to activate turn signals in some of the built-in 80 LED lights.”-Twice

"New 'smart' helmet lets you make calls and listen to music while you ride"  --  Cycling Weekly

"As the team has aptly named the helmet, the Bling Helmet is jam packed with tech functionality."  --  Tech.co

"Adding lights to a bike helmet is one way to improve visibility at night, but Chinese company Livall has gone a step further – its LED-loaded helmet also serves as a walkie-talkie and sends out an SOS alert when you fall down."  --  gizmag

"Livall Bike Helmet Lights Up, Acts As A Walkie Talkie"  --ubergizmo

“the very first smart helmet to provide bike riders a safer, more joyful experience. Now you can look cool, and ride safe too.”  --  TECHDRIVE


Stay Connected

With the Windbreak Mic and Bluetooth Speaker, you can answer or make phone calls when it's necessary. You can enjoy your 'me time' without worrying people may not be able to reach you.


No More Need to Yell

When riding in a group, the Windbreak Mic and Bluetooth Speaker enables cyclists to communicate with each other by walkie-talkie. Furthermore, text messages sent through the LIVALL Riding App will automatically be converted into voice messages for riders that are in riding mode. No more need to yell at each other.


Cycle to the Beats

With the built-in Bluetooth speakers, you can listen to songs with LIVALL Bling Helmet and select/start/pause songs with LIVALL Bling Jet (remote control). Choose the music that matches your speed and cycle to the beats!


Get Help In Time

We add the 3-axis G-sensor to the helmet to make sure you can get help in time in case you fall when cycling alone. Once the G-sensor senses a unusual gravity acceleration, the emergency signals on the helmet will be turned on and an SOS alert will be sent to your emergency contacts automatically.


Stand Out and Be Safe

LIVALL Bling Helmet also comes with colored LED tail lights at the back of the helmet which serve as direction indicators. Furthermore, colored outline LEDs at the top of the helmet will make it very easy for you to be seen. The earlier others see you, the further danger is away from you.


LIVALL Bling Jet

Bling Jet can be attached to your handlebar. It allows you to easily control other part via it. You can remain stable and focused with the Bling Jet during the riding.


Predict Your Next Move

You need the Bling Jet to control the colored LED tail-lights to blink like the indicators. You can press the button ‘left’ or ‘right’ to make people behind you see where you are going.


Make the Journey Memorable

The photo-taking button on the Bling Jet enables you to easily take photos and record videos with your phone and store them in the LIVALL Riding App. You can review your journey or share your story.


LIVALL Nano Cadence Sensor

With the Nano Cadence Sensor set on your bike’s crankset hole, the LIVALL Riding App can show the cadence of your cycling, and (based on that) your speed, traveled distance and burned calories. Seeing the numbers go up will boost your performance! The LIVALL Riding App can also show slope rate, altitude, and heart rate when you connect designated extension devices to your phone.


LIVALL Riding App

LIVALL’s Bling Helmet, Bling Jet, and Nano Cadence Sensor all work together with LIVALL Riding App. The App can play music, send out SOS alerts, control the lighting on the helmet, and show your journey’s stats. You can share stats, photos and videos via Facebook or Twitter.

Furthermore, the App also allows you to import data from other device such as pedometer and smartwatch. With the parameters from other device, the stats will be even more extensive and trustable.





TECH SPECS



Certifications


                       Stretch Goal



"Cycling Across the U.S." 

-Starting from June 3rd

-Ended in Los Angeles on August 7th.

The “Cycling Across U.S.” team is sponsored by LIVALL and led by Mr. Feibao Jin, who earlier climbed 7 summits and walked from the South to the North Pole in 19 months. The team departed on June 3rd in Plymouth and plans to arrive in LA on August 7th.

They have arrived in Santa Monica, the end of Route 66 recently with their LIVALL gear!



Creating a safe and joyful cycling experience is the reason we created LIVALL smart riding equipment. We want the world to get to know the vast possibilities of cycling, and show that it can be more fun than one can imagine. Also, by drawing more attention to cycling, we want to promote a healthy and low-carbon life style.

In order to put our product into mass production and to let more people get to know our product, we need funds. Our target customers are —just like Indiegogo’s users— open to innovation, they care about the quality of their life and others’, and value the natural environment. Indiegogo is one of the most influential crowdfunding platforms, and it already helped to make a lot of dreams come true. We hope it can help us to achieve our common goal as well.


How LIVALL was founded?


The full name of the company is Shenzhen Qianhai LIVALL IOT Technology Co., Ltd, simplified as LIVALL. One of our founders fell off his bike and broke his arm. He wanted to help others avoid the same situation, and provide riders a safer yet more joyful riding experience. That was the initial reason of LIVALL’s existence. 

LIVALL is not just our product’s brand name, it’s also our team’s spirit. We want to engage together to create something different, innovative and useful, and to make people live a better life all together. LIVe and ALL, LIVALL.


Brian majored in Scientific and Technological Information and Management from Wuhan University (China) and an MBA from Massey University (New Zealand). He has broad management experience and is good at developing marketing strategies, especially when it comes to innovative products that are new to the market. As a founder of SWT Holdings Co., Ltd. he found new business opportunities and broke sales records before. And now, with his enthusiastic character and his love for cycling, he’s eager to share the joy of cycling with the rest of the world.


Remember the guy we mentioned earlier, who fell off his bike and broke his arm? That’s our founder and CTO Ken. Ken is an extreme sports fan, a technology geek, and above all an incredible engineer. He has a major in Radio Technology from Chongqing University (China) and an MBA from Hong Kong Baptist University. Ken has been an internet entrepreneur for over 10 years, and was the co-founder and CTO of AVLIGHT acoustics. Ken is good at fore sighting technological developments and transforming them into usable products. Combining sport and technology makes this geek most happy.


A shared hobby unites us here at Shenzhen Qianhai LIVALL IOT Technology Co., Ltd. Our team members are not only experts in their field and passionate about their work, we are all sports fans and cycling enthusiasts.

We focus on the R&D and operation of smart riding equipment, and aim to create a safer and more enjoyable riding experience, for you and for ourselves. The management team has an out-of-the-box thinking style, rich operating experience, a wide network, professional knowledge and deep love for their work, which enables the team to develop rapidly.

We wish the LIVALL Riding Devices can bring you as much JOY as they brought us. We hope we can spread LIVALL's idea all over the world.


Delivery

We will dispatch products to our supporters in October 2015.

U.S.: We will first send the products to a local delivery company in the US, from where they will be further distributed.

Rest of the world: Products will be sent directly from China.

We are ready for mass production. Once we raise enough funds, mass production will start immediately.Products will most likely be delivered in the second half of October. Delivery times may vary, and not all our supporters may receive the products at the same time. We appreciate your understanding and guarantee that LIVALL will be worth the wait. Once we start shipment, we will send you an update.


FAQ

1.  How many products does LIVALL have? Do I need to purchase them all?

LIVALL’s product line consists of the Bling Helmet, the Bling Jet (remote control), the Nano Cadence Sensor, a Phone Holder and the LIVALL Riding App. The Bling Helmet and the Bling Jet are the core products, and they heavily depend on each other. The other products are optional. The Nano Cadence Sensor works separately from the other hardware, but syncs with/requires the LIVALL Riding App. The Phone Holder works independently.

2.  How to attach the Nano Cadence Sensor to the bike?

Put the sensor in the crankshaft’s bolt hole and you’re done. Alternatively, the package also includes a plastic band so you can tie the sensor to a paddle.

(See the picture at the bottom)

3.  Which phones does the LIVALL Phone Holder support?

LIVALL’s Phone Holder supports almost all kinds of smart phone between 4 and 6 inches.

4.  How to control the LIVALL Bling Helmet’s indicators?

Once the Bling Helmet and Bling Jet are connected via the Riding App, you can push the turn left (<-) or turn right (->) button on the Bling Controller, to make the indicator blink three times in the chosen direction.

5.  Besides controlling the indicators, what else can the Bling Jet do?

The Bling Jet enables you to use the walkie-talkie, play/pause music, take photos or shoot videos.

6.  How to use the LIVALL Riding App?

The LIVALL Riding App is available for free in the Apple App Store and Google Play Store, or you can go to http://www.LIVALL.com/appdownload/ and follow the instructions. You can log in with your Facebook account, or sign up for a LIVALL account using the app.

7.  LIVALL’s Bling Helmet is made of which materials?

For the outer part, we improved high strength PC material of 1mm thickness. For the inner part, we use a special kind of foam called EPS, which is imported from the US, to make the helmet comfortable to wear. The helmet’s streamlined design doesn’t only reduce air resistance, it also keeps the helmet cool. The Bling Helmet has passed all the required tests and is qualified by professional organizations.

8.  How to charge each LIVALL product? How about battery life?

You can charge LIVALL’s Bling Helmet through the USB port (located at the back of the helmet, right below the indicator) using a standard Android cable/charger. The helmet can be used for 30 hours after it’s fully charged.

The Bling Jet has a similar USB port at the top of the device. It takes 3 hours to fully charge it, after which it can be used for 100 hours.

The Nano Cadence Sensor runs on a CR2032 battery, which lasts 6 months.

The Phone Holder can also be used as a 5000mhA mobile charger. It has a USB port at the side which allows you to charge it with a standard Android cable/charger. Because of its big capacity, it takes 5 to 8 hours to fully charge the holder.

story:
The Problem?

Outerwear is the last critical barrier separating us from the outside but yet, jackets haven't evolved even with all the technological innovations and discoveries. Rather than looking at traditional methods such as layering or just different levels of heated wires, our team at Flexwarm was determined to create an intelligent line of clothing starting with the jacket with technology that adapts to you.


Our Answer

Over the last 5-years, our team has been researching a new technology based on thin-film techniques we call Flexwarm. In the last few years, we have made developed patented breakthroughs that have allowed us to embed smart sensors and a completely unique flexible heating layer that is both extremely thin (0.5 mm) and completely safe. Utilizing Flexwarm, we have created the Flexwarm Jacket and Vest that will change everything about wearable technology!





What People Say About Flexwarm



50% More Battery Life

Compared to traditional Carbon Fiber heating technologies, Flexwarm is 50%+ more energy efficient. This means, the same battery can keep you warm all day max. for 13 hours* with Flexwarm vs. 8 hours with Carbon Fiber technologies.

*battery claims depend on heat level settings and bluetooth connectivities and many other factors; actual results will vary. 


The First Climate Control Jacket

Flexwarm uses 2 integrated sensors to measure the temperature inside the jacket, and the temperature outside the jacket. Just set your perfect temperature from the iOS or Android App, and your jacket will automatically adjust the heating levels to maintain a constant internal temperature. Flexwarm is a smart jacket that adapts to you.



Control Your Jacket Through The App

Flexwarm is the first jacket to be controlled through your iOS or Android smart device. Control the temperature of each individual region accurate to 1 degree. This is just the beginning of the revolution starting with the Jacket. Imagine a future where smart wearable clothing can be controlled from your smart watch!


Use Your Own Battery Pack

Due to the increased efficiency of the Flexwarm technology, we are the only smart jacket to feature comprehensive 4-region panels without a proprietary 12V battery. Flexwarm uses your everyday typical 5V USB battery pack. This means if you lose your battery, your can easily replace the battery with one from a local electronics store.

Photo Credit: The Wire Cutter

More Heat Area

Flexwarm patented technology evenly distributes heating areas as compared to traditional carbon fiber heating wires which are thick and sparse. This means no cold spots and less warm up time.


As Seen On


Flexwarm is the next generation in smart wearable technology


How Does Flexwarm Compare?

Flexwarm is a pioneer in intelligent wearable technology that is both smarter and more energy efficient than any of the available products. Be a part of the revolution today!





Keeping Your Hands Warm

Integrated into each sleeve are built-in gloves to keep hands warm both indoor and outdoor. The perfect solution for your freezing office!


Sensors Detect the Perfect Temperature

What really sets Flexwarm apart from just another heated jacket is the climate control feature. Heating elements automatically adapt depending on the exterior and interior temperature so your personal temperature remain perfect, no matter the weather.

Fully adjustable temperature across 4 controllable regions including front chest, back, and hands.


Set your ideal temperature with just a push of a button or through an app with distributed heat up to 149F. 


(Our lab test standard is IEC 60335-2-17)


Setting up is Easy

>

Flexwarm is your everyday jacket




*You will select the size after the campaign ends through a survey.

[IMPORTANT] The sizes mentioned above are the sizes of the jacket and vest itself, NOT the size of the person who is going to wear it.


Flexwarm is based on thick film technology which is widely used in fail-safe applications such as sensors for releasing airbags, automotive engine and chip resistors. Sandwiched between the heat resistant layers, our patented substrate is layered, sintering*, and sealed. This is what makes Flexwarm completely waterproof, durable. 
Although based on thick film technology, Flexwarm is far from thick. Flexwarm panels are extremely thin measuring 0.5 mm in thickness. This allows the Flexwarm layer to be barely noticeable vs carbon fiber heating wires which can often be felt inside traditional heating clothing. Being uniquely thin and flexible allows Flexwarm to be rolled or twisted without risk of damage.  

*Sintering is the process of compacting and forming a solid mass of material by heat and/or pressure without melting it to the point of liquefaction


Just in time for the cold winter season!

story:
Short Summary

Our EZ-On BaBeez team is comprised of four professionals who each has over 30 years of experience in the fashion apparel industry.  Our talents cover all of these special areas; senior level technology and finance, designers, developers, production experts and buyers with well-known global brands. 

Our vision is a company that will make the lives of the consumers, moms, dads, hospital nurses and babysitters easier while providing babies with a more comfortable experience. 
We have utilized all of our experience and knowledge in order to solve a very cumbersome problem… making diaper changes easier for everyone involved. Our goal is to build a new brand of children's apparel, with the same innovation and creativity of our EZ-On BaBeez "onesie". 

Please help us spread the joy of using EZ-On BaBeez globally.

EZ-On BaBeez Founding Team

What We Need & What You Get

We have so far invested over $50,000 of our own capital over the last year and a half.  The funds were spent on product concept, design, development, and sourcing for our introductory line of EZ-On BaBeez "onesies".

We are seeking $12,500 to complete the development of our expanded, Spring-2018/Fall-2018 line of EZ-On BaBeez "onesies" and complimentary clothing & accessories.  We are also planning to produce 10 sets of salesman samples in order to show the line to all types of retailers.  A small amount of inventory will also be produced for sale on our e-commerce website.

We look forward to providing you with several of our innovative EZ-On BaBeez "onesies".
As a parent, you may find this an indispensable addition to your baby’s wardrobe.  New parents or parents of toddlers still in diapers, would be very grateful to receive this as a gift.  We gratefully accept a donation of our EZ-On BaBeez “onesies" to charitable institutions which we will send to them in your name. You will make the nurses at the hospital a very happy group!!!

Our EZ-ON BaBeez Products  

We are excited to share with you some of our new design collections for Spring and Fall 2018. These and more will soon be available in many baby boutique stores and online stores.

Our EZ-On BaBeez "onesies" are made of the softest and most comfortable fabrics.  Our fabrics are made of super fine, soft and stretchy jersey knit material.  They are comprised of 95% Cotton, 5 % Spandex or in 100% Cotton 1x1 rib knit.  All our "Onesies' are constructed with our unique features, using a soft, scratch-free velcro at the front opening, and a wet resistant liner. Available in sizes: Newborn, O-3 months, 3-6 months, 6-9 months, 9-12 months, and 12-18 months. Machine Washable.  Made in USA or Imported.

 

 

 

 

 


The Impact

The EZ-On BaBeez "onesie" will change the lives of many people and babies around the world. We plan to continue to increase our contributions to children's causes as our assortment of children's products and sales continue to grow.

You can feel proud that you are a part of making this world a happier, better place.
Your support is the catalyst that will help us transform our mission and vision into a reality.
Again, a portion of our profit will go to Children’s causes everywhere including children's hospitals and research.

Risks & Challenges

Our innovative redesign of the "onesie" has an excellent chance of success in the baby apparel market. We believe when parents are faced with the choice between the EZ-On BaBeez "onesie" and the traditional "onesie", they will always choose our "onesie" because of the additional features and benefits.

However, the reality is, there are always risks with every new business or venture.  Besides the function and utility of the EZ-On BaBeez "onesies", people are attracted to their aesthetics, styling, fabrics, and prints that make their babies more comfortable and stylish. It's all about making babies comfortable and making parents feel good about what their babies are wearing. It's a more comfortable and stylish "onesie" with greater convenience.

We are also faced with the challenge of getting into retail stores who will carry our products and successfully increase awareness of our “onesie’s” features and benefits over the traditional "onesie". 
Finally, we face the challenge competing on cost with traditional "onesie" brands and retailers who purchase very large quantities of comparable quality “onesies” at a significantly lower cost. As we are able to order larger quantities we will be competitively priced while providing a better product overall.

That being said, we have all worked on the launch of new concepts in retail apparel and the creation of successful new retail brands, giving us the experience necessary to succeed in this endeavor.

With the uniqueness of our “onesie” and its benefits, we believe we can successfully develop products parents will love for their children, and formulate strategies to produce them at a price everyone can afford.

Other Ways You Can Help

You can make a difference in the world. Today, we all strive to make a difference, even when we are unable to do so financially. Please share our campaign with your friends and family and on social media to educate and bring awareness of our baby apparel solutions. Moms, dads, grandparents and baby caregivers will breathe a sigh of relief when they can change diapers faster and more easily. Your efforts will be greatly appreciated by us, our customers, and those who strive to cure children's diseases and illnesses worldwide.

Let's leave the world better than we found it… Thank you for your support!

Blason Louis is a collection of fine wines from France’s best parcels, handcrafted and co-signed by talented winemakers.
We also bring innovation by offering our wines in bottles and by-the-glass flacons so you can offer a full collection to your guests.

Blason Louis wines comes from France's most exclusive terroirs and the best winemakers. Selecting the best soils & parcels, growing organically the vines, handpicking the grapes, conducting traditional winemaking all contribute to the uniqueness of the wines.





Our collection in unique and covers 6 different regions and 9 varietals which brings together the best of France has to offer.


You can enjoy our wine in traditional bottles and in perfume like flacons. The flacons include the equivalent of a glass of wine.

Champagnes RATING* AROMAS VALUE
Champagne Solera
45% Pinot Noir, ...
 95 Pink pepper / Quince / Strawberry $120
Champagne Grand Cru Blanc de Blancs 2009
100% Chardonnay
 91 Pear / Apple / White fruits $65
 
White wines RATING* AROMAS VALUE
Chassagne Montrachet 1er Cru Morgeot 2011
100% Chardonnay
 92 Honey / Praline / Hazelnuts $75
Château Chalon 2008
100% Savagnin
 93 Chestnuts / Honey / Spices $75
Santenay Sous la Roche 2013
100% Chardonnay
 91 Citrus / Brioche / Almond $44
Anjou 2005
100% Chenin Blanc
 90 Pear / Flint / Dried apricot $40
 
Red wines RATING* AROMAS VALUE

97% Syrah, ...
 93 Blackcurrant / White pepper / Violet $70
Pommard 2012
100% Pinot Noir
 91 Cherry / Rose / Violet $60
Châteauneuf-du-Pape 2011
70% Grenache, ...
 94 Forest fruits / Chocolate / Vanilla $48
Saint Emilion Grand Cru 2012
100% Merlot
 92 Blackcurrant / Pepper mint $45
Sancerre 2014
100% Pinot Noir
 88 Fresh red fruits / Smoky / Ripe fruits $35
Chinon 2013
100% Cabernet Franc
 89 Raspberry / Redcurrant / Violet $32

(*) Average rating from attendees to our Paris and London tasting including wine experts and top executives

Our collection is intended to make an impression during any event. Share an unforgettable evening with a loved one, enjoy lunch with friends, impress your business partner, or just discover new tastes.

Selected Wines
Champagne Solera - Rated 95

Solera is made blending all vintages between 1982 and 2011 in oak barrel with young wines ageing with older wine. Only 0,03% of the Champagne production is made under this very unique technique, which provides full flavor and complexity to this wine. More...
Châteauneuf-du-Pape 2011 - Rated 94

Châteauneuf-du-Pape 2011: This cuvée comes from old vines cultivated under biodynamic technique. The organic growing grants this wine a fresher and more complex style, and also lower alcohol level than the other typical Châteauneuf. More...
Saint Emilion Grand Cru 2012 - Rated 92

This cuvée is made 100% of Merlot, which is unusual and provides more roundness and freshness to the wine. It comes from a single parcel on the St Emilion plateau, where it is surrounded by Grand Cru Classés. More...
Chassagne Montrachet 1er Cru Morgeot 2011 - Rated 92

Probably the most powerful Chardonnay from Burgundy together with The Montrachet Grand Cru. Concentrated, round, voluptuous, words are missing to describe the opulence of this cuvée. More...
We are a Franco-American team stationed in Paris, Chicago, NYC, and San Francisco who share a passion for good wine and have a strong and legitimate track record with respect to both wine and entrepreneurship.

Our ambition is to share the finest wines from the most revered terroirs in France, not yet widely explored in the United States.

Funding part of our winemakers’ costs and our unique packaging requires a significant investment for future productions. We already have the date secured for our first 12 wine barrels and the first bottles are ready to be sent.

With every 10k USD donated, we can secure enough bottles with a single winemaker to get listed by distributors and retailers in a given state. If we get enough support, we will launch in at least three states and establish a collection between 8 to 25 wines.

We need ambassadors who appreciate what we are doing and could relay our story to their friends and close networks.
You will play a crucial role in shaping the wines we choose. We have built a unique system to make tasting notes approachable to all. With your feedback forms, we can create a palate profile unique to you and choose our future collection based on your tastes.

We will grant you access to our Blason club, where we will provide you with articles, wine courses, quizzes, games for you to learn about the wine universe and embark on a discovery journey through French terroirs and their unique stories.


Blason Friend Wine Conoisseur Diamond Member Brand Ambassador Angel Investor Member of the Jury
Contribution (USD) 50-500 500-1000 1000-2000 2000-5000 5000+ Top 3
Receive exclusive invitation to join Blason club platform before official release
Get invited to launching events (Nov: Paris 6th, London 11th, SF 30th / Dec: Chicago 2nd, NYC 8th)
Join our club as Diamond member, benefit from exclusive limited offer and invitation to our annual wine tasting
Join us for a gastronomical dinner with the team (in Chicago, Paris, NYC, London, San Francisco)
Go to a private visit to one of our partners vineyards
Join our investors syndicate in 2016 capital raising
Become part of the wine jury to choose one wine for the future collection
How old must I be to purchase Blason Louis Wine?
You must be 21 years of age at the time of purchase. This is the law, so it’s best not to employ creative—nay, misguidedly hopeful—mathematics.

Can I buy Blason Louis Wine now if I’m not 21 but will be 21 before delivery?
Again, you must be of legal drinking age AT THE TIME OF PURCHASE.

Can I buy Blason Louis Wine now if I’m not 21 but am giving it as a gift to someone who is 21?
No.

How does the Voucher works?
At the end of the campaign, you will receive a Redeemable Voucher for your Blason Louis perks. This voucher will be transformed into an order to our partners, having an official retail licence. Then, our partner will directly send you the perks to your delivery address.

Are you able to deliver everywhere?
In US, our retail partners can deliver on these following states: AZ, AR, CA, CO, CT, DE, FL, GA, ID, IL, IN, IA, KS, KY, LA, ME, MD, MI, MN, MS, MO, MT, NE, NV, NH, NJ, NM, NY, NC, ND, OH, OK, OR, RI, SC, TN, VT, VA, WA, WV, WI, WY.

Will I be delivered before Christmas?
For delivery in France & UK, ordered before 15th Novembre: YES
Otherwise, you will have to wait until March 2016.

Can I make my own tailored package?
Yes you can create your own voucher and receive a 20% discount if you buy at least 6 bottles.
Access to our online calculator

Champagnes All in USD excluding VAT Retail value
(per bottle)		 Indiegogo value
(per bottle)
Champagne Solera 120 96
Champagne Grand Cru Blanc de Blancs 2009 65 52

White wines

Château Chalon 2008 75 60

Red wines

Châteauneuf-du-Pape 2011 48 38

Sancerre 2014 35 28

Do not forget to add VAT and shipping cost, using our online calculator.
Then, make a donation of the total amount and email us with your desired mix to: contact@blason-louis.com
Do not hesitate to contact us if you need any support.

We already have the date secured for our first 12 wine barrels and the first bottles are ready to be sent.

With every 10k USD donated, we can secure enough bottles with a single winemaker to get listed by distributors
and retailers in a given state.
If we get enough support, we will launch in at least three states and establish a collection between 8 to 25 wines.

We need ambassadors who appreciate what we are doing and could relay our story to their friends
and close networks.







You will play a crucial role in shaping the wines we choose.
We have built a unique system to make tasting notes approachable to all.
With your feedback forms, we can create a palate profile unique to you and choose our future collection
based on your tastes.

We will grant you access to our Blason club, where we will provide you with articles,
wine courses, quizzes, games for you to learn about the wine universe and embark on a discovery journey
through French terroirs and their unique stories.









Blason Friend
Wine Conoisseur
Diamond Member
Brand Ambassador
Angel Investor
Member of the Jury


Contribution (USD)
50-500
500-1000
1000-2000
2000-5000
5000+
Top 3


Receive exclusive invitation to join Blason club platform before official release








Get invited to launching events (Nov: Paris 6th, London 11th, SF 30th / Dec: Chicago 2nd, NYC 8th)










Join our club as Diamond member, benefit from exclusive limited offer and invitation to our annual wine tasting








Join us for a gastronomical dinner with the team (in Chicago, Paris, NYC, London, San Francisco)








Go to a private visit to one of our partners vineyards









Join our investors syndicate in 2016 capital raising









Become part of the wine jury to choose one wine for the future collection












How old must I be to purchase Blason Louis Wine?
You must be 21 years of age at the time of purchase. This is the law, so it’s best not to employ creative—nay, misguidedly hopeful—mathematics. 

Can I buy Blason Louis Wine now if I’m not 21 but will be 21 before delivery?
Again, you must be of legal drinking age AT THE TIME OF PURCHASE.

Can I buy Blason Louis Wine now if I’m not 21 but am giving it as a gift to someone who is 21?
No.

How does the Voucher works?
At the end of the campaign, you will receive a Redeemable Voucher for your Blason Louis perks.
This voucher will be transformed into an order to our partners, having an official retail licence.
Then, our partner will directly send you the perks to your delivery address.

Are you able to deliver everywhere?
In US, our retail partners can deliver on these following states: AZ, AR, CA, CO, CT, DE, FL, GA, ID, IL, IN, IA, KS, KY, LA, ME, MD, MI, MN, MS, MO, MT, NE, NV, NH, NJ, NM, NY, NC, ND, OH, OK, OR, RI, SC, TN, VT, VA, WA, WV, WI, WY.



Will I be delivered before Christmas?
For delivery in France & UK, ordered before 15th Novembre: YES
Otherwise, you will have to wait until March 2016.

Can I make my own tailored package?
Yes you can create your own voucher and receive a 20% discount if you buy at least 6 bottles.
Access to our online calculator

Do not hesitate to contact us if you need any support.

story:
I need your help to launch my project. Funding levels starting at $25 and up! 

This is an all-or-nothing project! 

The design is complete, everything is done! The only thing needed is the funds to produce these watches and launching Arrow Project. This is where I need you to help me get this off the ground! 

Any funds is better than nothing, with your support I can get this started and you'll receive rewards! GO to the Perks now! 

Want to make a fashion statement? This is the watch to wear!
For men who want to look uniquely different, add this to your watch collection, and for the woman, add this to your accessories!

It's the first watch that makes wearing wood stylish - a great conversation starter for sure! It feels awesome on your skin as the watch is made from the highest grade sandalwood, which is not affected by the weather, such as heat or cold. 

Another great feature of sandalwood is it has a luxurious lasting natural aroma. And the wood gives you long life durability unlike leather bands.It's extremely light weight, in that it's not heavy on the wrist. 

It's natural, unique, simple and one of a kind. It's fashionable and looks great on!If you're allergic to metal backing watches, Arrow Project wooden watch has a wooden backing, so you won't have that metal affect.

The design is funky, modern and unique with a simplicity that attracts attention! The olive green sandalwood color makes your style look different, fashionable and stand out from the crowd. 

If you can't contribute, please share our link! :)

Creator of Arrow Project Introduction Video! Watch it! 


Examiner picked up the Indiegogo campaign page and written a Press Release about Arrow Project! 

Pre-design of the watch: 

Wooden watch design with logo design.

Face of Watch:

Simple and gorgeous design with silver color elements to make the face of the watch really pop out! It Includes the date.

The hands of the watch also glows in the dark after light exposure.

Backing of the Watch:

The beautiful wooden design backing of the watch, "Arrow Project"


Receive an awesome reward on top of your support!

As an Indiegogo supporter of Arrow Project, you receive an awesome wooden key chain with the design of the back of the watch! Perk rewards from $25, $80, $160 & $320!

Attach it to your house key chains or on your handbag zip clip! 



Wooden Key chain sketch concept.

Arrow Project initial logo. I sketched it :)

What kind of wood is the watch made from ?

Sandalwood is the name of a class of fragrant woods from trees in the genus Santalum. The woods are heavy, yellow, and fine-grained, and unlike many other aromatic woods they retain their fragrance for decades. As well as using the harvested and cut wood, essential oils are also extracted from the woods for use.

This is not just any kind of wood, in the East, it's considered to be an attractive, and special kind of wood.

Sandalwood comes from the Sandal Tree, known scientifically as Santalaceae Santalum Album and in Sanskrit as chandana. In English it is called White Sandalwood or Yellow Sandalwood depending on the age of the tree. An evergreen tree that grows only in the southern areas of India, Indonesia and somewhat in Australia.

The hard, yellow, outer wood is mostly used for carving statues and decorative articles such as combs, beads and boxes.

Watch movement ? 

A movement is the internal mechanism of a clock or watch, as opposed to the case, which encloses and protects the movement, and the face which displays the time. The term originated with mechanical timepieces, whose clockwork movements are made of many moving parts. Japanese movement.

Benefits of a wooden watch!

Unlike leather band watches, Arrow Project wooden watches won't have that smell after sweating. 

The design is gorgeous and the simplicity of the design attracts attention and a great conversation starter :)

Where will the funds go?

Arrow Project unisex wooden watches will go straight into production once the pledge reaches it's goal!

The project's funds will be used to jumps start Arrow Project's first initial production of the watches for the supporters, and furthering the career of Arrow Project fashion creation.

How will Indiegogo supporters make it possible ?

This project has been in the making for 5 months and with the support of the crowd and reaching the Goal, Arrow Project can finally jump start, create and manufacture the first production watch design, as well as future designs and creating additional stylish and fashionable products.

Receiving the watch?

In order to successfully receive the watch, the campaign funding goal has to reach it's goal! Without this, no watch :( BUT! there is way, by sharing this project with friends and family! Click the below social media to Join, Follow, Like and Share the project!

Arrow Project's Social Network!

Facebook

Instagram

 Twitter

 Tumblr

 Newsletter subscription

  Website

story:
Idea

I felt that the need to express the feelings was one of the fundamental themes of our society, and the easiest way to do it is through the expressions of our face.

This is a language used all over the world.

A language that everybody can understand!

But who's around us, doesn’t always understand what we feel: for example: You are at work, have a lot to do and the stress is increasing... the joking colleague arrives starts to goof off.. and the only things that passes through your head is: "how doesn’t understand that he has to Stay Away?"

This is how my project began. I wonted make anyone free to express themselves through a jewel.

At the same time, changing the design and the way of wearing jewels: they should not be an accessory of our days but thanks to Oval they become a compass of our feelings and an indicator for those around us.

Quality

Oval jewels are made exclusively in Italy, no production step takes place out of the country!

Oval jewelery is designed to be worn everyday, all day long.

The material is a hand-colored Nylon. This material has been chosen for its incredible features, in fact it is extremely light and elastic and very resistant, especially suitable for people allergic to metals. Our products can be easily washed with soap and cool water.

 

Get in the game!

Every change leads to an aesthetic and mechanical improvement.

Every new creation makes me fall in love more and more with my little jewels.

But in the end everyone has its own opinion, and it's here that I’ll need yours!

The jewels I propose during this campaign are perfect in my eyes. Only your contribution is missing: I will ask you to report any aspect that can be improved in order to make Oval jewels ready for the market.

As a further thank you for your contribution, for each perk sold (with an amount above 20€) we will give you a small "Emotion Chip" that will be produced in limited edition, made exclusively for you founder.

The strategy

Oval jewelry will only be available online.

The decision not to sell jewels through traditional channels was dictated by the simple logic: the jewel price, from the producer to the seller, rises noticeably before getting into the hands of customers, often more than 70% of what we pay for a Jewel does not go to the producer, but is split among the intermediaries. By these considerations comes our decision.

Our strategy is not without risk but it comes to us to decide how to invest our profits. Where to advertise, what new prototypes to produce, and we will be happy to say that our customers have chosen our jewelry, they didn’t just passed by a store and picked the first thing they saw!

The next steps

For each sold perks (chart)

-60% will be spent on the creation and improvement of Oval jewels

-20% maintenance of the structure

-10% invested in advertising

-10% purchase machinery in order to improve our product

 

Our future goals are the creation of a new Emotion every 6 months, studying new expressions, and to surprise you with more and more innovative materials!

 

You just have to become co-creators of this new adventure, that has the intention to change the jewelry world.

story:
V

V

THE BIKINIS

RECYCLED | SUPPORTING ARTISTS | STAY ON (EVEN IN BIG WAVES) | SURF WORTHY

A collaboration with three female surf artists, our ocean art bikinis are made in a mix of ECONYL® , which is 100% regenerated from plastic waste, and LYCRA® XTRA LIFE™. When tested against competitor's fabrics in real life conditions, this mix proved to be two times more resistant to chlorine, suntan creams and oils. Our artist partners receive a commission on every sale, so you'll be helping us support their work as well.

 

 

 

V

V

10% TO PROTECT CORAL REEFS

As a Dive Instructor and surfer, I've seen firsthand the damage beneath the surface. Damage from coral bleaching, pollution, and unsustainable fishing practices, the results are heartbreaking and overwhelming.

Surf Worthy is my way of becoming part of the solution, donating 10% of profits to worthy projects. After much in-depth research, I hit upon the Coral Triangle Center. Based in Indonesia, they declare, and protect national marine reserves, plant new mangroves and corals, and educate the local population on how to be more sustainable with their fishing practices. I used to teach diving around the reefs of Indonesia, so I have a deep love for the marine life and coral systems there.

 

V

V

THE ART

As well as featuring on our beautiful eco-friendly bikinis, we're also offering each original piece of art as a series of Limited Edition prints! There are only 10 available for each piece, so head to our perks and bring the soul of the ocean into your home.

Artist: Sasha Luchkova

Sasha is a Russian-born travelling mural painter, surfer, tattoo artist, and participant in the ‘Art to be Stolen’ movement, leaving her art on streets around the world for lucky passers-by.

"Seahorse" by Sasha Luchkova

Artist: Abri Racheal

Abri is a surfer based in San Diego. She paints beautiful ocean and surf inspired art, currently playing with Gouache paint, a kind of acrylic-water-colour mix. "I want my art to make an impact on everything around it, from changing people's emotions to helping protect the ground we walk on and the sea we swim in."

Wave by Abri Racheal

Turtles by Abri Racheal

Artist: Caroline Istas

Originally from Belgium, Caroline worked as a Dive Instructor for many years in
Vietnam. She’s now a nomadic creative entrepreneur, beginner surfer tackling waves in Bali, talented illustrator, and creator of ethical jewellery brand ‘Djinn’.

Wave by Caroline

Lionfish by Caroline

V

V

DESIGNED FOR PERFORMANCE

 

 

 

V

V

THE BOARDIES

NO-DRAG | REVERSE-FIN CUT | LIMITED EDITION | SURF WORTHY

The most flexible & drag-resistant boardies you'll ever wear.

V

V

V

DESIGNED FOR PERFORMANCE

 

V

V

THE PEOPLE MAKING OUR CLOTHES

My research to find the right factory who pays a fair wage has been gruelling. As a traveller of 15 years, I've been blessed to experience the hospitality of so many wonderful people and different cultures. When I decided to start a business that relies on manufacturing, finding a factory who shared my ethics was top of my list.

I researched different factories, national averages, what a 'living wage' means in different countries, and asked people what a fair living wage meant to them. Then I found the one! They pay their employees double the minimum wage, and provide medical care. The people there are stoked to be working for them, and that's why the quality of their work is so high.

V

V

WILL YOU STILL RECEIVE YOUR ORDER IF WE DON'T REACH OUR TARGET?

Yes! Our target is based on meeting minimum order requirements for a one-stop-shop production house. This means they have our fabric, they have digital printing capabilities, and can do all the hand-cutting and sewing required, PLUS label printing in-house. If we don't reach our target, we will still be able to produce a smaller collection and fulfill your orders, it just means that we'll be using our existing suppliers. They are all small companies who specialise in one thing: printing, fabric sourcing, sewing, etc. We've visited them all individually and can vouch for their healthy working conditions, it just means we'll be doing a lot more running around to produce a much smaller order of our designs. 

V

V

SIZE GUIDE

To check your measurements against our sizing, refer to the table below. For the bust measurement, measure around the fullest part of your bust, (over the nipple!). For the pants, measure around the fullest part of your hip; roughly 20cm below your waistline.

V

V

OUR STORY

V

V

WHO WE ARE

 

V

V

THE ARTISTS

 

V

V

TESTIMONIALS FROM OUR WORTHY CREW

Our team have been charging around the world, putting our bikinis to the test in some real gnarly conditions. Here's what they have to say:

 

 
 

V

V

THANK YOU TO ALL OUR SUPPORTERS

A HUGE thank you to all of our supporters! Our friends, family, team of Worthy ambassadors, big wave testers, and especially to David from Indoeye, the honorary Worthy WoMAN who filmed and edited our campaign video. If you love his work - hit him up! (Tell him we sent you..)
